description.hltext_display: Elf of Regent St
description.content:
NATALIE Davidson may not have laid the bricks of her family’s Putney home, but it is her hard work and cheer that has built its reputation as “that house on Regent St”.
Ms Davidson, now 27, made her family home a neighbourhood attraction for the past 12 years with her wooden Christmas Decorations. Woodwork was her favourite subject at school but Ms Davidson said her love of the craft began when she was a small child.
“There was a man living next door and he had a workshop and he would let me sit and watch whenever he was doing woodwork. I loved it,” she said.
When she was 15 she decided to put her skills to use by making a Santa and sleigh to celebrate the festive season. From that point her homemade Christmas decorations became a regular thing and created such a buzz locals refer to the property as “that house on Regent St”.
“After about two years we found cars were stopping every night and people would get out to have a look,” she said. “You really get something out of seeing the kids get excited about it.”
Every year she adds something new to her collection, lit by spectacular Christmas lights.
This year’s additions included a festively-attired dinosaur, two dogs and a stunning gingerbread house.
“Dogs and dinosaurs aren’t things most people would associate with Christmas, but you can make anything Christmassy,” she said.
She said she loves everything about woodwork, from using her precious jigsaw to painting the decorations.
She said Christmasses were always a great occasion at the house.
The family also decorates “that house of Regent St” for other special occasions, like Australia Day and Halloween.

description.hltext_display: Schmitt hat wieder "Sicherheit und Vertrauen"
description.content:
Skispringer Martin Schmitt geht optimistisch in die Vierschanzentournee. Bei einer Trainingseinheit holte sich der Vize-Weltmeister nach eigener Aussage "Sicherheit und Vertrauen".
Vize-Weltmeister Martin Schmitt hat während seiner Weltcup-Pause Selbstvertrauen für die Vierschanzentournee getankt. "Die Entscheidung, in Lillehammer zu trainieren, war richtig. Ich habe mich in den vergangenen Tagen vor allem mit Anfahrt, Absprung und der ersten Flugphase beschäftigt. Dabei bekam ich wieder Sicherheit und Vertrauen in den Sprung", sagte der 32-Jährige nach dem Kurz-Trainingslager in Norwegen.
Schmitt hatte sich nach durchwachsenem Saisonstart entschlossen, auf die Tournee-Generalprobe im Schweizer Engelberg zu verzichten. Stattdessen hat er auf der Olympiaschanze in Lillehammer versucht, verschiedene kleine Probleme zu beheben. "Wir hatten in Norwegen gute Bedingungen und so konnte ich intensiv und konzentriert trainieren", sagte Schmitt. Laut Bundestrainer Werner Schuster hat sich Schmitt "deutlich stabilisiert".
Bis Mittwoch gilt es für Schmitt und seine Mannschaftskollegen jetzt, sich auf der Schattenbergschanze in Oberstdorf auf das dortige Tournee-Auftaktspringen vorzubereiten, ehe es in die kurze Weihnachtspause geht. Am 28. Dezember wird es dann mit der Qualifikation in Oberstdorf ernst.
© 2010 SID Multimedia

Lufthansa rechnet mit "nahezu normalen Flugbetrieb"
Die Lufthansa rechnet trotz des anhaltenden Winterwetters für heute mit einem "nahezu normalen Flugbetrieb" am Flughafen Frankfurt am Main. Die Situation sei aber auch der Lage an anderen Flughäfen wie London-Heathrow abhängig.

description.hltext_display: Cristian Diaconescu, desemnat oficial candidatul UNPR la Presedintie
description.content:
Presedintele de onoare al Uniunii Nationale pentru Progresul Romaniei, Cristian Diaconescu, a fost desemnat, marti, in sedinta Comitetului National Executiv al UNPR, candidatul partidului la Presedintia Romaniei, informeaza Agerpres.
Potrivit presedintelui UNPR, Marian Sarbu, Comitetul National Executiv al partidului a adoptat, in unanimitate, o rezolutie prin care Cristian Diaconescu este desemnat candidatul partidului la functia de presedinte al Romaniei, iar Neculai Ontanu - candidatul la Primaria Generala a Capitalei.
Marian Sarbu a precizat ca in acest moment, din punctul de vedere al partidului, Cristian Diaconescu este rezultatul votului unanim din teritoriu, iar UNPR il va sustine fara niciun fel de rezerva."Il consideram un candidat care poate sa castige alegerile din 2014. Diaconescu e extrem de bine pozitionat pentru aceasta competitie. O consideram o competitie onesta, pentru ca el insusi e un om onest si are toate calitatile necesare indeplinirii unui astfel de mandat. Poate prezerva onorabilitatea institutiilor statului, are capacitatea, vocatia internationala de a discuta cu liderii lumii. Are capacitatea de a vorbi pe intelesul tuturor, pentru ca participa la dialogul politic si social de foarte mult timp si, in afara de asta, e un om de stanga, cu vocatie sociala si credem ca poate sa indeplineasca extrem de bine acest mandat, inclusiv pentru omul obisnuit, care nu stie intotdeauna tot ce se intampla la Bruxelles sau Washington. Poate explica omului obisnuit cum e influentata viata lui prin deciziile de la Washington, Bruxelles, Bucuresti", a explicat Sarbu alegerea progresistilor.
El a adaugat ca UNPR nu va nominaliza candidati pentru functii acolo unde, din sondaje, va rezulta ca partidul nu are sanse. "UNPR e un partid predictibil. Noi nu facem politica de conjunctura, cu doua zile inainte de alegeri si, doar de dragul de a avea un candidat, sa punem acolo un candidat. Si nu ne referim doar la Presedintie", a completat liderul progresist.

description.hltext_display: Renato vibra com possível volta de Ronaldinho: "Ninguém desaprende"
description.content:
Treinador do Grêmio participou de uma partida na praia do Leme, Zona Sul do Rio
Antes de uma partida comemorativa na praia do Leme, zona sul do Rio de Janeiro, na tarde desta terça-feira, o técnico Renato falou sobre a possível volta de Ronaldinho ao Grêmio. O comandante da equipe mostrou estar empolgado com a possibilidade de contar com o craque no grupo na próxima temporada. As informações são do site GloboEsporte.com.
– Quem pode responder melhor sobre isso é a diretoria, o presidente. Mas quando me consultaram, eu dei o ok. Se vier, vai ser ótimo, uma grande contratação, é um craque. Ninguém desaprende a jogar. Mas agora depende da direção – disse o treinador.
Foto: AP
A contratação de Ronaldinho deve ser anunciada após as festas de final de ano. O irmão e empresário do atleta, Assis, viaja para Milão nos próximos dias para tentar a liberação do jogador. Como o vínculo com o Milan se expira em junho de 2011, a tendência é que o clube italiano não ofereça muita resistência. Pelo menos é o que acreditam os dirigentes do Grêmio.
Compartilhe O que é isso?

description.hltext_display: Euro este cotat pentru martie la 4,32 lei
Ufo-lunta släppt i Nya Zeeland
description.content:
Nya Zeelands försvar har offentliggjort alla vittnesmål om rymdskepp som strömmat in sedan 1954. På 2 000 sidor berättar folk om ufon (oidentifierade flygande objekt) och rymdvarelser.
Uppdaterad Wed Dec 22 09:20:45 CET 2010
Militären poängterar att man inte bedömer materialet.
- Vi har bara varit en samlingspunkt för vittnesmålen. Vi utreder inte, rapporterar inte, vi har inte belagt något av vittnesmålen, säger flygvapentalesmannen Kavae Tamariki till tidningen The Dominion Post.

description.hltext_display: Top Disney Exec Yanover Exits Company
description.content:
12:00 EST – Record Labels | TV film | Digital & Mobile | Retail
One of Disney's top digital executives is leaving the company, according to Deadline.com.
Paul Yanover, evp and managing director of Disney Online -- who logged 16 years at Disney across two separate stints -- announced he's exiting in January.
During Yanover's tenure, Disney underwent significant changes to its digital products, including multiple relaunches of the flagship Disney.com, while also making major pushes in online games and the parenting vertical. For example, Yanover oversaw the acquisition of the kids virtual world Club Penguin, as well as Web-based games tied to the Pirates of the Caribbean and Cars movie franchises, among others.
Plus, last year Disney acquired the Canadian company Kaboose, which included several kid- and mom-oriented sites. Kaboose's BabyZone.com was seen as helping Disney gain a larger foothold in the new mom market -- not traditionally a Disney strength.
But more recently, Disney CEO Bob Iger has moved to shake up the company's digital management with new, non-Disney blood. Iger brought on former Yahoo media head Jimmy Pitaro to serve as co-president of the Disney Interactive Media Group. The group's other co-president is John Pleasants, CEO of Playdom, which Disney acquired over the summer.

entity.property: Top Disney Exec Yanover Exits Company

description.hltext_display: 临夏州政府就《政府工作报告》征求
description.content:
本报讯 (记者 马蓉) 12月16日下午，州委常委、副州长戴超与州政府相关人员一起来到州政协机关，征求政协委员对2011年《政府工作报告》(征求意见稿)的意见和建议。州政协主席戴耿、副主席马世仁、马文丕等参加座谈。
与会人员围绕完善《政府工作报告》、推动经济社会发展踊跃发言。大家认为，《政府工作报告》(征求意见稿)总结“十一五”和过去一年的工作客观全面、实事求是，安排部署“十二五”及2011年的工作紧密结合州情，目标明确，措施具体可行。大家还对《报告》中涉及的产业发展、教育社会保障、文化旅游业发展等方面的问题展开讨论，积极建言献策。
戴耿指出，《政府工作报告》(征求意见稿)结构合理、文字精练，内容实。希望报告在扶贫、三农、特色产业等方面给予更多关注，把这些方面的工作措施更具体化，更便于操作。
戴超就2010年政府工作和2011年政府工作的思路、措施、目标等重点内容向政协委员们作了全面系统的介绍。并指出，各委员对《政府工作报告》提出了许多宝贵的意见建议，充分反映了广大政协委员对临夏州经济社会发展的高度关注，对政府工作的高度支持，对人民群众生产生活的高度重视。他表示，《政府工作报告》将认真吸纳大家的意见和建议，希望州政协及各委员继续发挥人才聚集优势，围绕经济发展、民生改善、社会建设，深入开展调查研究，多提宝贵意见建议，为政府科学决策、民主决策提供帮助，推进全州经济跨越式科学发展。

description.hltext_display: China Airlines to start Taoyuan-Wuhan service
description.content: - Taiwanese China Airlines (TPE:2610) said on Tuesday that it will start flying between Taoyuan, Taiwan, and Wuhan, China, from January 26, 2011. The company will operate the service two times a week using Airbus 330-300 aircraft.

description.hltext_display: PrismaLife: Versicherung wehrt sich erfolgreich gegen Bewertungsportal dooyoo.de und erwirkt Löschungen kampagnenhafter Falschbehauptungen
description.content:
Ruggell (ots) - Der führende Liechtensteinische Lebensversicherer
PrismaLife AG setzt im anwaltlichen Verfahren die Löschung von
Falschbehauptungen auf dem Bewertungsportal dooyoo.de durch.
In mehreren Beiträgen auf dooyoo.de, die ganz offensichtlich auch
gegen die eigenen AGBs des Unternehmens Dooyoo GmbH verstoßen und vom
Betreiber des Bewertungsportals bis dato nicht gelöscht wurden, sind
Falschbehauptungen platziert, die offenbar Kunden davon abhalten
sollten, Versicherungsprodukte von PrismaLife zu kaufen.
So wurde zum Beispiel fälschlicherweise behauptet, dass die
Staatsanwaltschaft Düsseldorf gegen das Unternehmen ermittle.
Markus Brugger, CEO der PrismaLife AG: "Wir sind nicht länger
bereit, offensichtliche Kampagnen hinzunehmen, die im Internet gegen
uns betrieben werden, um uns als aufstrebendes und dynamisches
Unternehmen zu behindern."
Über PrismaLife: Die PrismaLife AG ist der führende
Liechtensteinische Lebensversicherer mit Sitz in Ruggell. Das
Unternehmen entwickelt Fondspolicen und Vorsorgeprodukte zur
Absicherung biometrischer Risiken für den deutschen und
österreichischen Markt und verwaltet Kundengelder in Höhe von über
565 Millionen Euro. Die Beitragseinnahmen 2009 betrugen rund 180
Millionen Euro. Infos: www.prismalife.com
Originaltext: PrismaLife AG
Digitale Pressemappe: http://www.presseportal.de/pm/81381
Pressemappe via RSS : http://www.presseportal.de/rss/pm_81381.rss2
Pressekontakt:
Alexandra Becker, Communications Manager, PrismaLife AG,
Tel.: +423 237 00 46, E-Mail: alexandra.becker@prismalife.com

description.hltext_display: Recap: Oregon vs. Idaho
description.content:
Brandon Wiley scored 14 points as he helped lead the Idaho Vandals to a 69-65 win over the Oregon Ducks in non-conference action at McArthur Court.
Wiley, who shot 5-of-10 from the floor for the Vandals (6-5), pulled down six rebounds and blocked five shots as they snapped a two-game slide. Landon Tatum dropped in 11 points off the bench.
The Ducks (7-5) were paced by Joevan Catron who tallied a game-high 18 points, followed by E.J. Singler and Malcolm Armstead with 11 and 10 points, respectively, in their second straight setback.
Oregon moved out to an early two-point lead in the first half, but over the course of the period the hosts shot only 32.4 percent from the floor, compared to 60.9 percent for Idaho which recorded a 40-35 lead at the break.
In the second half both squads shot less than 38 percent from the field, but thanks to a 10-of-15 effort at the free-throw line Idaho was able to hold on for the four-point win.
In a game that saw six ties and 11 lead changes, the Vandals survived 16 turnovers by shooting 6-of-13 beyond the arc.
Game Notes
Similar stories:
Idaho fends off Oregon's rally, tops Ducks 69-65
Brandon Wiley scored 14 for Idaho and the Vandals held off Oregon's second-half rally to win 69-65 Tuesday night.
Landon Tatum added 11 points for Idaho (6-5), which won the last nonconference game on Oregon's McArthur Court. The Ducks will move into Matthew Knight Arena in two weeks.
Joevan Catron led all scorers with 18 points for Oregon (7-5), which made just 7 of 29 3-point attempts and was outshot 61-32 percent in the first half and 49-34 percent overall.
Montana (6-4) at Idaho (5-4)
GAME NOTES: Idaho will look to continue its strong play at home when the Vandals host the Montana Grizzlies in non-conference play at Memorial Gym.
The Grizzlies head into this game playing strong basketball having won three of their last four games. The last time Montana was in action the team claimed a hard fought 71-66 decision over Oregon State. Everything has not gone perfectly however, as the Grizzlies have struggled on the road, posting just a 1-3 ledger away from home.
As for the Vandals, they saw their four-game winning streak come to an end with a 66-56 setback to Seattle. The majority of the success for Idaho has occurred at home, as the team has claimed a win in four of its five games at Memorial Gym.
Idaho (5-5) at Oregon (7-4)
GAME NOTES: Non-league foes will clash at McArthur Court this evening, as the Oregon Ducks play host to the Idaho Vandals.
Idaho has suffered back-to-back defeats to fall to 5-5 overall, and they are just 1-3 in true road affairs. The Vandals were most recently in action on Saturday when they dropped a heart-breaking 64-63 decision to Montana in front of a disappointed home crowd.
As for Oregon, it carried a three-game win streak into last Friday's road clash with Virginia. Unfortunately, the Ducks put forth their worst offensive effort of the season in that tilt and fell by a 63-48 final. The club is now 7-4 overall, and all seven victories have come in Eugene.
Recap: Idaho vs. Montana
Derek Selvig drained a jump shot with six seconds remaining in regulation to give the Montana Grizzlies a thrilling, 64-63 victory over the Idaho Vandals in non-conference play at the Cowan Spectrum.
Kareem Jamar led the way for Montana (7-4) with 17 points, while Will Cherry tallied 14 points, to go along with six rebounds and six assists. Mathias Ward posted 12 points off the bench in the win.
Deremy Geiger registered 14 points for Idaho (5-5), while Brandon Wiley and Kyle Barone chipped in 12 points apiece in the loss.
Aden, WSU hold off Idaho 88-71
PULLMAN -- Faisal Aden finished with 26 points and Klay Thompson added 23 as Washington State defeated Idaho 88-71 on Tuesday night.
Patrick Simon contributed 12 points and DeAngelo Casto had 10 for the Cougars (2-0).
Jeff Ledbetter led the Vandals (1-1) with 18 points, all on 3-pointers, while Luiz Toledo added 13 and Landon Tatum had 12.

description.hltext_display: News from the Cellar: Top Red Wines under $25
description.content:
Home > Wichita Falls Crave > The Wine Cellar
About this time every year I write about my favorite red and white wines. This year is no exception, but I will be doing it a little differently. This week is the list of red wines and next week will be the list of white wines. The following week will be about my favorite red and white wines over $25 and included will be my selection of top winery for the year. So with out further delay, here are my 2010 Top Red Wine Selections under $25.
5) 2008 Diseno Malbec is dazzling in the glass with its deep dark garnet color, followed by enormous aromas of cherries, blackberry, currant and tea, with a finish of smoke, spice and caramel, that is full-bodied with ample tannins. This wine retails around $9.99.
4) 2008 Valley of the Moon Syrah is full-bodied and expressive with its blackberry, cherry, sage and truffle aromas and flavors, followed by a velvety smooth finish that is rich and warm with hints of vanilla, smoke and cedar. This wine retails around $14.99.
3) 2008 Vaca Cabernet Sauvignon is smooth and refined with its dark garnet color followed by aromas and flavors of ripe blackberry, plums and currant, and finishing with hints of clove and vanilla that is absolutely seamless. This wine retails around $11.99
2) 2008 Duckhorn Decoy Napa Valley Red leads with a beautiful nose of dark berries, with notes of vanilla and chocolate, followed by flavors of dark plum and raspberry and an elegant, lingering finish of clove and spice. This wine retails around $24.99
And the top selection for 2009 drum roll please!
2007 Ray’s Station Cabernet Sauvignon is dark and rich, with aromas and flavors of blackberry, blueberry and cherry, followed by a toasty finish of vanilla and cedar with ample amount of backbone. This Cabernet has intrigued me since my first taste. From its Texas star on the label to the great juice in the bottle, this wine is easy to drink with great aromas and flavors, and extremely food friendly. This wine retails around $11.99.
Thanks to all the readers and Merry Christmas!
Doug Harmon of Wichita Falls is a wine consultant. He can be reached at 642-7336 or by e-mail at toad42@sbcglobal.net.

description.hltext_display: CIO Think Tank to Bring Together Senior IT Leaders from the Media & Entertainment Industry
description.author: CDM Media
description.content: --(PR.com)-- The CDM Media team announced today the launch of two CIO Think Tank events for senior technology executives representing the media and entertainment industry. The CIO Think Tank events will focus on the topic of Business Transformation Services.The CIO Think Tanks, to be held March 29, 2011 in Los Angeles and March 31, 2011 in New York, will bring together an exclusive group of 10 IT thought leaders, including CIOs, CTOs, COOs, CFOs and Chief Procurement and Sourcing Officers from the media and entertainment industry.The one-day events will be supported by HCL, the leader in bringing end to end IT & Technology transformation to the media and entertainment industry segments. The Think Tanks are an opportunity for attending executives to meet, network and discuss the latest technology topics and trends, including:- Business aligned sourcing strategies for technology-lead business transformation in the one-on-one convergence marketplace- Risk-reward partnership: output-based pricing for software services- Transformational sourcing modelsThe CIO Think Tank agendas will include a roundtable, networking and a Q&A session to encourage idea sharing and in-depth discussion.CIO Think Tanks are a unique opportunity for technology executives to make new business contacts and discuss the critical IT strategies they need to get ahead and stay ahead of the technology curve. The events are an opportunity for executives to get away from their desks and be productive without taking a lot of time away from the office, said Ross Abbott, VP North America, CDM Media.If you are interested in participating in or speaking at a CIO Think Tank, contact Rob Simms, VP Business Development and Event Management, CDM Media at rob.simms@cdmmedia.com or 808-694-3684. For more information about the event, visit http://www.ciothinktank.com/media_and_entertainment.phpAbout CDM MediaCDM Media is a business-to-business media company serving Fortune 1000 clients. CDM Media develops unique marketing platforms for high-level IT professionals across several verticals and is the custom design marketing organization for companies who are looking to influence and build relationships with CIOs and senior level technology executives.###The CDM Media team announced today the launch of two CIO Think Tank events - which will focus on Business Transformation Services - for senior technology executives representing the media and entertainment industry.

description.hltext_display: 「優勝の力に」横浜入団の渡辺 記者会見で抱� (12/21)
Basescu scrie partidelor sa ia o decizie privind CSM in aceasta sesiune parlamentara
description.content:
Presedintele Traian Basescu a trimis, marti, o scrisoare partidelor reprezentate in Senat si presedintelui acestei Camere, Mircea Geoana, prin care solicita luarea unei decizii, in cursul acestei sesiuni parlamentare, in ceea ce priveste Consiliul Superior al Magistraturii, transmite Mediafax.
In scrisoare, Basescu invoca "importanta deosebita" pe care o are Consiliul Superior al Magistraturii in remedierea problemelor legate de progresele ce trebuie inregistrate de catre Romania in privinta Mecanismului de Cooperare si Verificare si aminteste ca, la inceputul lunii ianuarie 2011, mandatul actualilor membri ai Consiliului expira, iar modul de alegere a unor reprezentanti ai magistratilor in noul Consiliu Superior al Magistraturii este contestat sau chiar invalidat de unele instante judecatoresti, sustin surse parlamentare.
Presedintele Basescu solicita luarea unei decizii de catre Senat, in cursul acestei sesiuni parlamentare, in ceea ce priveste Consiliul Superior al Magistraturii.
Senatorii nu au reusit, miercuri, pe cei unsprezece judecatori alesi sa faca parte din Consiliul Superior al Magistraturii (CSM), dupa ce dezbaterile in contradictoriu daca acestia sa fie votati in corpore sau fiecare in parte s-au prelungit peste programul de lucru.

description.hltext_display: FCC rules aim to level field for Web content
description.content:
WASHINGTON_ The on Tuesday adopted first-ever regulations for broadband Internet service, rules designed to foster the fast-evolving market for TV and movies over the Web. The network neutrality rules are meant to prevent broadband operators such as Comcast and AT&T from favoring their own content over rival online video sites such as Netflix, or wireless companies from blocking Internet phone applications such as Skype.
Consumers increasingly are using their Web connections to watch their favorite TV shows and movies at a fraction of the cost of a cable subscription a threat to Internet providers that also have lucrative pay-TV
franchises they want to protect.
The rules are designed to give Internet entrepreneurs the peace of mind that they will have unfettered access to Web users without having to negotiate with broadband networks owners for access to their pipes.
The regulations, approved in a 3-2 vote, would bar broadband companies from managing their networks in ways that unfairly discriminate against competitors.
Internet providers would also have to disclose how they are managing traffic over their networks exposure that FCC Chairman Julius Genachowski believes would head off bad behavior.
Wireless Internet operators would be subject to somewhat more lenient regulations.
The rules could be tested in a few ways. A complaint could be filed alleging a violation, which the FCC could investigate under an expedited process.
Or, opponents could
challenge the regulations
in court, arguing that
the commission lacks authority under telecommunications law to enact the regulations.

description.hltext_display: WALDNER: Don't underestimate AEG in NFL stadium plans
description.author: Mike Waldner
description.content:
No visions of sugarplums for Tim Leiweke.
He's far too busy.
Staples Center, L.A. Live, Home Depot Center, the Galaxy and the Kings only begin to fill the plate of the Anschutz Entertainment Group president. He oversees AEG's worldwide operations. However, he does have a vision dancing in his head. It is of a downtown Los Angeles football stadium.
This is why you paid attention, this is why readers asked questions when AEG held a press conference to announce three finalists to design and build the proposed stadium next to Staples Center.
We're talking big-time political maneuvering as well as trolling.
The same can be said about the previous stadium package Ed Roski put together for the City of Industry. AEG appears to have blown Roski out of the water.
There is an urge to identify each plan as a pipedream.
Don't.
Not if you have knowledge of stadium/arena building.
This goes beyond Philip Anschutz, with Leiweke doing the heavy lifting, building Staples Center and Home Depot Center.
Veteran observers will recall how those lined up with the Coliseum/Sports Arena old boy network scoffed when Jack Kent Cooke threatened to build an arena. Cooke shrugged at the doubters and built the Forum in Inglewood.
This said, the building of a stadium by either AEG or Roski is not etched in stone. Not even close.
They are trolling, promoting and lobbying.
Roski is marketed as "billionaire Ed Roski" to
generate confidence in his ability to get his stadium project done.
Clearly, he is well-heeled. His Majestic Reality commercial real estate development company is a powerhouse.
However, Roski was unable to run the Kings after buying into the NHL. He had to bring in Anschutz as a partner and eventually ceded majority ownership to AEG. This prompts speculation that he has been so public about his stadium plans because he is trolling for financial assistance.
Leiweke is maneuvering, or trolling, on several fronts.
His stadium project requires demolition of part of the Convention Center. This requires approval of the Los Angeles City Council.
AEG is fanning the fire. It seeks to build enthusiasm for a stadium, enthusiasm it hopes to convert into pressure to push the City Council to approve a deal.
Since 10 or so NFL games a season will not generate the required revenue, AEG's master plan has the facility serving as an extension of the Convention Center for a projected 75 events a year.
If the number sounds ambitious, no one has accused Leiweke of lacking in that department.
What must be considered, however, is the ease, or lack thereof, in which stadium and Convention Center might work together. Such deals tend to look good on paper and work otherwise in reality.
A key detail yet to be explained concerns parking. Where are 68,000, 72,000 or 78,000 patrons, depending on which projection you use, going to park their vehicles on Sunday?
This is central to any deal beyond the obvious - people have to park somewhere. Parking is a major revenue stream. Nothing happens without wide and deep revenue streams.
The political picture, and therefore the trolling, expands to the state level because an environmental exemption to protect AEG from lawsuits is necessary.
The press conference also was a way to publically get the attention of the NFL, of NFL commissioner Roger Goodell and his people as well as of NFL owners. The package does not happen if a team does not opt to move to Los Angeles.
Need you be reminded NFL owners tend to agree on only one thing - profit margin and that the title commissioner is a misnomer because Goodell is an employee of the owners. He is their CEO/chief marketing executive.
Leiweke made it clear he needs to get the boss to buy into all of this because there is no AEG stadium if Anschutz does not sign off on the project.
Excuse the cynicism, but Leiweke claiming Anschultz has yet to sign off could be a signal to NFL owners that AEG's project is not open-ended.
Some spectators believe nothing will happen in the near future because the NFL is consumed with labor negotiations.
This is not necessarily correct. The NFL is not a three-man shop. Goodell has enough captains, lieutenants and grunts to deal with Los Angeles as well as with the union.
If the stadium stockings are hung with care, you know you never know. Just don't hold your breath.
Clearing out the notebook before taking a week off for some rest and relaxation ...
Opinion: Both the decision and manner in which UCLA coach Rick Neuheisel fired defensive coordinator Chuck Bullough and wide receivers coach Reggie Moore indicated Neuheisel is in panic mode.
More opinion: Washington Redskins coach Mike Shanahan blew it when he benched Donovan McNabb.
Quoting: When Ben Howland played UCLA walk-on Tyler Trapani, John Wooden's great-grandson, in the Wooden Classic in 2008 and 2009 as a gesture for Wooden it was a demonstration Howland did not understand the famed coach. "He'd better not do it for that reason," Wooden barked.
Job market: Former star running back at South Torrance High and USC Chad Morton, a 7-year NFL vet, is special teams assistant coach for the Green Bay Packers.
Bottom line: Congratulations to Coach Geno Auriemma and the UConn women for winning 89 consecutive basketball games.
Etc.: See you next year.

description.hltext_display: Inter renova com Celso Roth
description.content:
O Inter anunciou na noite desta terça-feira, através do seu site, a renovação do contrato do técnico Celso Roth. Após reunião com a direção colorada, o treinador acertou com o clube até o final de 2011.
Nessa segunda, quando a delegação colorada retornou de Abu Dhabi, Giovanni Luigi, presidente eleito do Inter, havia afirmado que a tendência seria a permanência de Roth no comando da equipe. Mesmo com o fracasso no Mundial, a diretoria resolveu manter o técnico.
Celso Roth chegou ao Beira-Rio em junho de 2010 para assumir o lugar de Jorge Fossati. O técnico pegou o time na semifinal da Libertadores e conduziu a equipe ao título da competição.
No Brasileirão, a campanha do Inter com Celso Roth foi irregular. Focado no Mundial de Clubes, o Colorado terminou o nacional na sétima colocação, com 58 pontos.
Em Abu Dhabi, na disputa mais esperada do ano, o Inter de Roth decepcionou e foi eliminado na semifinal, ao perder para os africanos do Mazembe. Nos seis meses que dirigiu o clube em 2010, Roth venceu 18 partidas, perdeu 10 e empatou 10 — aproveitamento de 56%.

description.hltext_display: SoundExchange Payments Up 55% In 2009
description.content:
SoundExchange, the organization that collects royalties for streaming sound recordings, increased its payouts to artists and rights owners by 55% in 2009, according to information in its recently filed IRS Form 990.
Distributions to artists increased 55% to $156 million, while income received during the year rose 20% to $204.2 million. SoundExchange collects royalties on behalf of recording artists and owners of the master rights owners for streaming in the United States. Publishing revenues for webcasting are collected by the performing rights organizations ASCAP, BMI and SESAC.
These numbers show the incredible growth of webcasting as a revenue source for artists and record labels. SoundExchange expects to make 2010 payments to artists and copyright owners in excess of $250 million, an increase of about 60% over 2009 payments.
Three numbers in particular point to SoundExchange achieving greater efficiency in 2009: during the year the balance of unpaid royalties increased only 13% in 2009 while collections rose 20% and payments jumped 55%. In other words, money went out the door at a faster rate than it came in and stayed in the unpaid account.
In spite of improving the rate at which money has left the building, one number is likely to draw some attention: the $294 million balance of SoundExchange's payable account as of Dec. 31, 2009. The organization's 2008 Form 990 drew a great deal of criticism earlier this year -- although much of it came without proper understanding of how SoundExchange works and the accounting issues at play.
Perhaps as a result of this criticism, SoundExchange released its latest Form 990 with much more transparency than in past years. It proactively offered the following information about the components of payable balance of $294 million:
-- $88 million of "pipeline" funds that were in transit at the time
-- $43 million for royalties without sufficient data to pay out
-- $25 million not paid until royalty disputes with some webcasters are resolved
-- $16 million on hold for various administrative reasons
-- $11 million in uncashed checks
-- $111 million in "unpayable funds" in four categories: amounts unclaimed by foreign societies ($23 million), royalties related to problematic data ($23 million), unclaimed royalties ($43 million) and account issues ($22 million).
SoundExchange had 5,335 artists and copyright holders registered at the end of 2009. The average annual payment to artists rose 57% to $1,550 from $986, while the average annual payment to copyright holders increased 35% to $10,040 from $7,415. Operating costs rose to $16.7 million, or 7.7% of revenue.
Aware of public concern, SoundExchange points to progress it has made recently. The organization claims to have paid out $38 million in unpayable funds in Q1 through Q3 of 2010. It says that $15 million of the $25 million in "rates under appeal" were paid out in 2010. The $16 million of royalties under administrative hold balance at the end of 2009 was reduced by 40%. And SoundExchange claims that 16,000 resolved entries that were taken off the unpaid list.
Stakeholders have every right to expect SoundExchange to improve at resolving problems and registering artists and copyright owners. As that happens, a greater percentage of royalties will flow out in a timely manner. That's important. Webcasting revenues are becoming truly significant and the market's legitimacy would suffer if SoundExchange does not continue to become a more efficient conduit.

description.hltext_display: Nachholspringen am 23. Januar in Zakopane
description.content:
Das in Harrachov ausgefallene Weltcup-Skispringen wird am 23. Januar ab 15.00 Uhr im polnischen Zakopane nachgeholt. Dies gab der Ski-Weltverband FIS am Montag bekannt.
Das im tschechischen Harrachov ausgefallene Weltcup-Skispringen wird am 23. Januar ab 15.00 Uhr im polnischen Zakopane nachgeholt. Dies gab der Ski-Weltverband FIS am Montag bekannt. Damit werden in dem Wintersportort in der Hohen Tatra nun drei Wettbewerbe ausgetragen. In Harrachov waren in der vergangenen Woche die beiden geplanten Konkurrenzen wegen starken Schneefalls und Windböen abgesagt worden. Ein Springen wurde bereits am Freitag in Engelberg/Schweiz nachgeholt.

Lufthansa rechnet mit "nahezu normalen Flugbetrieb"
Die Lufthansa rechnet trotz des anhaltenden Winterwetters für heute mit einem "nahezu normalen Flugbetrieb" am Flughafen Frankfurt am Main. Die Situation sei aber auch der Lage an anderen Flughäfen wie London-Heathrow abhängig.

description.hltext_display: 州政府就《政府工作报告》征求政协委员意见
description.content:
本报讯 (记者 马蓉) 12月16日下午，州委常委、副州长戴超与州政府相关人员一起来到州政协机关，征求政协委员对2011年《政府工作报告》(征求意见稿)的意见和建议。州政协主席戴耿、副主席马世仁、马文丕等参加座谈。
与会人员围绕完善《政府工作报告》、推动经济社会发展踊跃发言。大家认为，《政府工作报告》(征求意见稿)总结“十一五”和过去一年的工作客观全面、实事求是，安排部署“十二五”及2011年的工作紧密结合州情，目标明确，措施具体可行。大家还对《报告》中涉及的产业发展、教育社会保障、文化旅游业发展等方面的问题展开讨论，积极建言献策。
戴耿指出，《政府工作报告》(征求意见稿)结构合理、文字精练，内容实。希望报告在扶贫、三农、特色产业等方面给予更多关注，把这些方面的工作措施更具体化，更便于操作。
戴超就2010年政府工作和2011年政府工作的思路、措施、目标等重点内容向政协委员们作了全面系统的介绍。并指出，各委员对《政府工作报告》提出了许多宝贵的意见建议，充分反映了广大政协委员对临夏州经济社会发展的高度关注，对政府工作的高度支持，对人民群众生产生活的高度重视。他表示，《政府工作报告》将认真吸纳大家的意见和建议，希望州政协及各委员继续发挥人才聚集优势，围绕经济发展、民生改善、社会建设，深入开展调查研究，多提宝贵意见建议，为政府科学决策、民主决策提供帮助，推进全州经济跨越式科学发展。

description.hltext_display: Spartans' Cunningham to miss bowl with foot injury
description.content:
The seventh-ranked Spartans face 15th-ranked Alabama in the Capital One Bowl on Jan. 1.
Cunningham led the team with 50 receptions during the regular season, for 611 yards and nine touchdowns. Michigan State does have other options, though. Mark Dell caught 49 passes for 761 yards, and Keshawn Martin added 29 catches.
Cunningham is trying to make the best of the situation. "Bored at home . . . mom won't let me move unless its to go use the bathroom lol," Cunningham tweeted yesterday. "B.J. had another outstanding season, and I know that he'll work hard during his rehab and set himself up for a big senior year," Michigan State coach Mark Dantonio said. "Fortunately, wide receiver is a position of strength for this football team, so B.J.'s injury will provide opportunities for others to step forward and make plays for us offensively." Noteworthy
* West Virginia senior cornerback Brandon Hogan has officially been ruled out of the Dec. 28 Champs Sports Bowl against North Carolina State with a torn ACL in his left knee, according to a report on ESPN.com. He suffered the injury in the regular-season finale victory over Rutgers. Hogan, who was suspended for one game earlier this year after a DUI arrest, had 37 tackles and three interceptions this season.
* Syracuse senior punter Rob Long will have to undergo post-operation treatment after doctors found malignant cells in a brain tumor removed a week ago.
Orange coach Doug Marrone says Long is expected to be at the Pinstripe Bowl when Syracuse plays Kansas State on Dec. 30 at Yankee Stadium. Marrone says treatment is expected to begin after New Year's.
Long said in a statement released by the university that "we remain optimistic and positive toward a favorable outcome." * Pittsburgh football coach Mike Haywood apparently doesn't plan to retain any of coach Dave Wannstedt's assistant coaches.
Haywood interviewed Wannstedt's staff after being hired on Thursday, but no announcement has been made about any staying.
Miami assistant head coach Bill Elias is accompanying Haywood to Pitt. Elias formerly was the head coach at Gannon.
Pitt has not yet said if Wannstedt will coach the Panthers (7-5) in the Jan. 8 Compass Bowl against Kentucky (6-6). Wannstedt was forced to resign following a 7-5 season.
* No special plans for Joe Paterno on his 84th birthday - just two Penn State practices.
The Nittany Lions spent the day drilling in the morning and afternoon in Clearwater, Fla., as they get ready for the Outback Bowl against Florida on Jan. 1.

description.hltext_display: ロッテの福浦は１億円で更改 １千万増で３年契約 (12/21)
Beaton, Ronchi guide WA to solid total
description.content:
TASMANIA claimed the first point on offer in their one-day cup match against Western Australia on Wednesday evening, but lost both opening batsmen on the way.
The Tigers were 2-96 at the dinner break, a lead of 13 runs, with Ed Cowan 19 not out and skipper George Bailey unbeaten on 14.
Mark Cosgrove and Rhett Lockyear set a cracking pace in the early overs for the Tigers, taking the score past 60 in the 11th over.
But Lockyear was brought undone for 28 when he spooned a catch to Michael Hogan off the bowling of Nathan Coulter-Nile, while Cosgrove was caught and bowled by discarded Test batsman Marcus North for 34.
The Warriors were sent in after losing the toss and reached 1-83 at the first changeover, with Shaun Marsh unbeaten on 34 and Luke Pomersbach eight not out.
Marsh and Liam Davis batted sensibly and took the score to 70 before Davis was trapped in front off the bowling of Jason Krejza for 35.
Start of sidebar. Skip to end of sidebar.
Related Coverage
End of sidebar. Return to start of sidebar.
Marsh should have been run-out on the first ball of the innings, but the throw from George Bailey was wide of stand-in keeper Travis Birt.
Birt is filling in for the injured Tim Paine, who was named to play, but failed to recover in time from a finger injury.
Teams:
Tasmania: George Bailey (capt), Travis Birt, Luke Butterworth, Mark Cosgrove, Ed Cowan, Matthew Day, Xavier Doherty, Brendan Drew, James Faulkner, Jason Krejza, Rhett Lockyear, Jon Wells, Alex Doolan (13th man).
WA: Marcus North (capt), David Bandy, Tom Beaton, Nathan Coulter-Nile, Liam Davis, Brett Dorey, Aaron Heal, Michael Hogan, Shaun Marsh, Luke Pomersbach, Luke Ronchi, Adam Voges, Ryan Duffield (13th man).

description.hltext_display: Richer gibt Posten als Freezers-Coach auf
description.content:
Der DEL-Klub Hamburg Freezers wird zukünftig von dem Kanadier Benoit Laporte trainiert. Noch-Coach Stephane Richer will sich auf seine Aufgaben als Sportdirektor konzentrieren.
Stephane Richer ist als Trainer der Hamburg Freezers in der Deutschen Eishockey Liga (DEL) zurückgetreten. Der 44-Jährige will sich zukünftig ganz auf seine Aufgaben als Sportdirektor konzentrieren. Als Nachfolger präsentierten die Hanseaten den Kanadier Benoit Laporte, der damit seine vierte Station im deutschen Eishockey antritt.
"Auch wenn die Ergebnisse zuletzt gestimmt haben, konnte ich mich nicht in dem Umfang um beide Positionen kümmern, wie ich es gern getan hätte", sagte Richer, der im Sommer von den Kassel Huskies an die Elbe gewechselt war. In der DEL liegen die Freezers mit 33 Punkten nur auf dem elften Platz, auch wenn zuletzt zwei Siege in Folge herausgesprungen waren.
Richer: "Benoit hat bereits bewiesen, dass er in der DEL sehr erfolgreich arbeiten kann"
"Die Neuausrichtung und die Umsetzung unserer Konzepte verlangt meine volle Konzentration. Mit Benoit Laporte haben wir einen Trainer verpflichtet, der unseren eingeschlagenen Weg geht und sich mit unseren Vorstellungen identifiziert. Benoit hat bereits bewiesen, dass er in der DEL sehr erfolgreich arbeiten kann", ergänzte Richer.
Laporte ist in der DEL ein alter Bekannter. Von 2003 bis 2005 trainierte der 50-Jährige die Augsburger Panther, danach stand er drei Jahre bei den Nürnberg Ice Tigers hinter der Bande und in der Saison 2008/09 war er für den ERC Ingolstadt tätig. Außerdem war der Kanadier in der Vergangenheit auch für mehrere Schweizer Klubs tätig.
"Ich freue mich auf das Engagement bei den Freezers, Hamburg ist eine Topadresse in Deutschland", sagte Laporte. "Mein Ziel ist es, den positiven Trend der letzten Wochen fortzusetzen." Am Dienstag leitet er erstmals das Training der Hamburger.

description.hltext_display: Grêmio vai apresentar contraproposta a Jonas na semana que vem
description.content:
O Grêmio vai concentrar todas as suas forças na possibilidade de contratar Ronaldinho durante toda esta semana. Na próxima, promete apresentar uma contraproposta para Jonas, que tem o contrato encerrando com o clube gaúcho no final de 2011, e que já apresentou uma oferta à diretoria tricolor.
– Vamos retomar na próxima semana e encaminhar uma contraproposta ao representante do jogador. Vamos avaliar a proposta que ele nos fez e responder até a semana que vem. Queremos contar com o jogador até a Copa do Mundo de 2014. Como o contrato dele vai até o fim de 2011, seria prolongado por mais três temporadas – disse Antônio Vicente Martins.
Em relação ao lateral-esquerdo Lúcio, as negociações estão muito adiantadas:
– O Lúcio tá muito perto da renovação. Estou otimista e acho que poderemos fechar até o final da semana – disse Vicente.
O meia Souza tem sondagens de Flamengo e Fluminense. O dirigente confirmou que foi procurado, mas garantiu que nenhuma proposta pelo atleta foi apresentada.
Aos gaúchos, Souza desmentiu a informação publicada em um jornal carioca de que estaria perto de um acerto com o Fluminense.
– Eu disse que tinha o interesse, mas jamais falei que tinha recebido uma proposta – disse Souza.

description.hltext_display: Day 2 of Steam?s holiday sale discounts The Witcher: Enhanced Edition, BioShock 2 and plenty others
ARM chips get Windows compatibility
description.content:
At CES next month, Microsoft will reportedly unveil a full-featured version of Windows that runs on ARM processors--a big departure from the x86 architecture.
Bloomberg, which broke the news, reported that sources familiar with Microsoft's plans said this version of Windows will continue to work on x86 processors, but that it should improve battery performance on devices like tablets and other devices that use ARM processors.
Additional confirmation of Microsoft's plans came from The Wall Street Journal, which added that this new version will not be available for another two years. CNET heard similar reports from a source who added that Microsoft plans to detail this version of Windows at an invite-only press event several hours ahead of its CES keynote.
Microsoft declined to comment.
Rumors kicked up earlier this month about Microsoft previewing an early version of Windows 8 at the company's CES keynote speech, scheduled for January 5. The New York Times had also reported that Microsoft CEO Steve Ballmer would be demonstrating a Samsung-made iPad competitor with a slideout keyboard. Little else is known about the company's keynote plans.
Microsoft already has a version of Windows called CE that runs on ARM, however it's been designed for embedded systems. This version is also able to run on x86, Hitachi SuperH, and MIPS. Additionally, there's a version called Windows Embedded Compact 7 that's been built for tablets and other small devices. However, that does not quite match up feature-to-feature with a full-fledged version of the desktop OS, which this new version is said to do. Microsoft first introduced Windows EC7 as a public technology preview back in June.
ARM has remained the dominant architecture in small electronics devices like cell phones, both for its processing power and power efficiency--two things that have led to faster electronics with longer battery lives. PC makers like Dell have even dabbled with including ARM processors within PCs, as a way to provide instant-on capability for users who don't mind using Linux to do things like check e-mail or fire up a quick Web page versus doing a full boot into Windows. Much of this was in response to some of x86's shortcomings. Despite Intel pushing down things like power consumption, while boosting chip speed and the number of cores in product like the company's Atom chips, battery life did not see the same kind of massive gains.
But as far as its move to traditional personal computers, ARM has not gotten there quite yet. In the last year or so there has been a big movement in that direction with products like Apple's iPad, which utilizes an ARM processor and blurs the line between traditional computers and standalone entertainment devices--so much so that some of its features are headed to Apple's Mac OS. There's also Google's Android, which runs on ARM and is in the beginnings of making its move toward the tablet form factor. Worth a mention too is the nascent Chrome OS, which is largely being built to be CPU-agnostic.
Also, despite Microsoft's ambitions to get small and powerful tablets into the hands of users several years ago, projects have fizzled due to a combination of high prices, bulky designs, slow performance, and poor power consumption. This was especially true of a range of products dubbed the Ultramobile PC category, which ended up being the precursor to Netbooks (which now face problems of their own).
Will ARM be able to fix all these things and bring beefier versions of Windows into places it could not go before? We should have a much clearer picture in about two weeks.
Via Crave CNET
Filed under: Notebooks
Leave a comment| Bookmark | Share
close this
Tags: windows, ces, microsoft, arm, x86

description.hltext_display: Le Japon devrait voir sa croissance réduite de moitié en 2011-12
description.content:
La croissance économique du Japon ralentira durant l'exercice 2011-2012 qui débute le 1er avril prochain et ne représentera plus que la moitié de celle de l'exercice en cours en raison d'un fléchissement des exportations et de la consommation intérieure, selon les prévisions diffusées mercredi par le gouvernement.
Toutefois, les prix de détail sortiront de leur spirale baissière, prévoit aussi le gouvernement japonais.
Tokyo anticipe une croissance du PIB de 1,5% réel en 2011-2012 contre 3,1% en 2010-2011.
L'inflation mesurée par les prix de détail serait nulle sur le prochain exercice, et non plus négative comme elle l'aura été sur les trois exercices précédents, et le gouvernement anticipe une inflation à nouveau positive d'ici la fin de l'exercice 2011-2012, le 31 mars 2012.
"Mais il faudra peut-être attendre encore longtemps avant que le gouvernement n'annonce que le pays est sorti définitivement de la déflation car il faut prendre en compte plusieurs indicateurs économiques", a déclaré un haut fonctionnaire ministériel.
Le gouvernement ne donne de prévision que pour les prix de détail dans leur ensemble, alors que la Banque du Japon préfère suivre ces prix hors produits alimentaires frais pour se faire une meilleure idée de l'évolution de l'inflation.
Par ailleurs, le gouvernement a révisé en baisse, dans son rapport de décembre, son opinion sur les exportations et le sentiment des entreprises en raison du ralentissement de la reprise en Asie et d'un yen qui reste fort.
Toutefois son diagnostic d'ensemble de la situation économique n'a pas varié. Il estime que l'économie reste au point mort et que sa situation est délicate, avec en particulier un taux de chômage élevé.
C'est dans son rapport d'octobre que le gouvernement avait pour la première fois depuis février 2009 revu en baisse son diagnostic d'ensemble de la situation économique.
Beaucoup d'économistes anticipent une contraction du PIB au quatrième trimestre 2010, l'expiration de mesures publiques de relance se faisant sentir sur le secteur industriel. Ils prévoient toutefois une reprise de la croissance l'an prochain, dans le sillage des exportations et de la demande intérieure.
Tokyo réaffirme enfin que l'une de ses grandes priorités est la lutte contre la déflation, avec le concours de la Banque du Japon.

description.hltext_display: Inter estreia dia 16 de fevereiro contra o Emelec na Libertadores de 2011
description.content:
O caminho para o Inter tentar o tricampeonato da América já tem dia, hora e local marcados. A Conmebol divulgou a tabela da Libertadores da América de 2011. No dia 16 de fevereiro, às 19h (horário de Brasília), o time de Celso Roth vai ao Equador enfrentar o Emelec, em Guayquil.
Sete dias depois, os colorados recebem o vencedor da partida entre Jaguares e Alianza Lima, às 19h30min. A terceira partida do Inter ocorrerá no dia 16 de março. Em Cochabamba, na Bolívia, a equipe enfrenta o Jorge Wilstermann.
A quarta rodada reserva o segundo jogo colorado diante de sua torcida no torneio continental. Os adversários serão, novamente, os bolivianos, em confronto previsto para as 21h50min. Na semana seguinte, o Inter viajará para o México ou Peru. A participação colorada na fase de grupos termina dia 19 de abril, contra o Emelec, no Beira-Rio
Confira os jogos do Inter na primeira fase da Libertadores.
16/2 – 19h - Emelec x Inter – Guayaquil
23/2 – 19h30min – Inter x Jaguares (MEX) ou Alianza Lima
16/3 – 18h30min – Jorge Wilstermann x Inter
30/3 – 21h50min – Inter x Jorge Wilstermann
6/4 - sem horário definido - Jaguares (MEX) ou Alianza Lima x Inter
19/4 – 20h15min - Inter x Emelec

description.hltext_display: Free refuserait de payer la taxe sur la copie privée
description.author: Dominique Rodriguez
description.content: PARIS (Reuters) - Free, filiale d'Iliad, ne veut pas payer la taxe sur la copie prive de 35 euros par appareil que devrait normalement supporter sa nouvelle Freebox, rapportent mercredi Les Echos. Le fournisseur d'accs Internet considre que sa Freebox Revolution n'est pas un simple dcodeur intgrant un disque dur et qu'elle fonctionne en outre sur plus de trois systmes d'exploitation, ce qui devrait l'exclure de l'assiette de la taxe sur la copie prive, crivent Les Echos. Selon le quotidien, l'conomie s'lve 35 euros par Freebox Revolution, soit une conomie de 17,5 millions d'euros en prenant en compte l'installation de la nouvelle Freebox chez 500.000 clients d'ici la fin 2011. Alexandre Boksenbaum-Granier, dit par Dominique Rodriguez

description.hltext_display: オリックス入りの朴賛浩が会見 「先発の期待に応... (12/21)
Ehrhoff und Canucks feiern nächsten Sieg
description.content:
Die Vancouver Canucks um Eishockey-Nationalspieler Christian Ehrhoff haben 3:1 gegen St. Louis Blues gewonnen. Dennis Seidenberg und die Boston Bruins verloren gegen Anaheim.
Eishockey-Nationalspieler Christian Ehrhoff und die Vancouver Canucks haben in der nordamerikanischen Profiliga NHL die Spitze der Northwest Division erobert. Bei den St. Louis Blues feierten die Canucks einen 3:1-Sieg und überholten damit in der Tabelle die Colorado Avalanche. Für Dennis Seidenberg und die Boston Bruins lief es weniger erfolgreich. Vor heimischer Kulisse mussten sich die Bruins den Anaheim Ducks mit 0:3 geschlagen geben.
Die Pittsburgh Penguins um ihren Superstar Sidney Crosby feierten einen 6:1-Kantersieg gegen die Phoenix Coyotes. Olympiasieger Crosby steuerte ein Tor und zwei Assists bei. Eine Überraschung gab es in Philadelphia. Die Flyers, mit 22 Saisonsiegen derzeit bestes NHL-Team, kamen gegen die Florida Panthers mit 0:5 unter die Räder.

description.hltext_display: Announcing: I AM EQUAL PROJECT 2011 Photo World Tour
description.author: I AM EQUAL FOUNDATION
description.content: --(PR.com)-- Today, project creator Jason Beckett and photographer Matt Spencer announced the 29 U.S. city stops for the 2011 I AM EQUAL Photo World Tour as they set out to gather more than 100,000 individual photos from around the world as part of this human rights & equality campaign.Were excited to reveal the 22 states and 29 cities we will be visiting in 2011 as we kick off the first in our 8-year global tour, announced Beckett to a gathering of volunteers and I AM EQUAL participants at the Salt Lake City photo studio of Matt Spencer. While we couldnt get every city in the schedule for this year, we did our best to spread the tour around to as many cities as possible, Beckett continued.The first four legs of our tour cover the Western U.S. and then we are headed to the East Coast and Central States, explains Spencer as he points to the regions targeted for the event. Along with these states, we will also take the I AM EQUAL project to three Canadian cities before the end of the year.The complete list of 2011 I AM EQUAL tour cities are:Albuquerque, Baltimore, Billings, Boise, Calgary, Cheyenne, Chicago, Columbus, Denver, Detroit, Idaho Falls, Kansas City, Las Vegas, Los Angeles, Louisville, Nashville, New York City, Philadelphia, Phoenix, Portland, Reno, Sacramento, Salt Lake City, San Francisco, Seattle, Spokane, Toronto, Tulsa, Vancouver.The 2011 tour will launch with the first leg starting at The Citizen Hotel in Sacramento California on January 6th, 2011 and quickly move to San Francisco, Los Angeles, and Las Vegas, before returning to Salt Lake City. By the end of the year, explains Beckett, we hope to add more than 9,000 new photos to the collection and empower people in all 29 cities to take an active role in the cause of equality and human rights for themselves, our neighbors, and our communities.About The I AM EQUAL PROJECTThe I AM EQUAL PROJECT was created by Jason Beckett and fashion photographer Matt Spencer in January 2010 in an effort to empower individuals to speak out about the causes that inspire them. The project goal is to capture more than 100,000 photos of people from all walks of life with the I AM EQUAL logo emblazoned on the palm of their hand as a symbol of their commitment stand up for their rights, and the rights of others around the world.Learn more at: http://www.iamequalproject.orgSee the photo collection at: http://photos.iamequalproject.orgFind event details at: http://www.iamequalproject.org/events###Human Rights & Equality photo project to visit 29 US cities in 2011

description.hltext_display: Katich eyes fifth Test
description.content: Injured Australia opener Simon Katich has revealed he is set to make a shock return in time for the fifth Ashes Test, increasing the pressure on Phillip Hughes to find form in the Boxing Day meeting in Melbourne. Katich damaged his Achilles tendon during the second Test defeat to England in Adelaide and was initially expected to miss the rest of the summer."I'm doing all the rehab and pulling up well from the strength work so the physio's pretty happy with where I'm at and actually thinks I'm ahead of schedule," Katich said.The veteran left-hander has revealed that his comeback plans are ahead of schedule and he may be fit for the Sydney Test, starting January 3.Hughes replaced Katich for the third Test in Perth but failed twice as Australia pulled off a series-saving win over England.Knowing Katich is looking over his shoulder will place further heat on the out-of-form Hughes in the biggest Test of the summer."Normally it takes a couple of months to settle down but it's settling down pretty quickly," he added."I've been having treatment on it every day for the last few weeks and it's all going really well."Asked if he'd be fit in time for Sydney, Katich replied: "I'm a long shot but you never know."You can't really put a date on it because with tendon injuries you never know until you fully test them, but if I test it next week and pull up well then who knows."Copyright PA Sport 2010, All Rights Reserved

description.hltext_display: Betty Ford Fires Employee Who Accused Lindsay Lohan
description.content:
The Betty Ford Center fired an employee who claimed that Lindsay Lohan attacked her at rehab.
The rehab facility told the Associated Press that the female staffer was fired for giving press interviews and "disclosing a privileged document," thus breaching patient confidentiality.
Lohan is being investigated by police after she allegedly got into a fight with the staff member in question at Betty Ford, where she's currently residing.

description.hltext_display: Lista noilor membri CSM, discutata miercuri de plenul Senatului
description.content:
Senatorii se vor intruni miercuri dimineata, la ora 9.30, intr-o sedinta de plen, pentru a lua in discutie validarea, respectiv invalidarea listei procurorilor si judecatorilor propusi sa faca parte din noul Consiliu Superior al Magistraturii, a anuntat marti, dupa sedinta Biroului permanent, chestorul PSD Ioan Chelaru, potrivit Agerpres.
Potrivit acestuia, pe ordinea de zi a sedintei plenului mai figureaza si ratificarea catorva tratate cu Republica Moldova, existand o solicitare expresa a Guvernului de a nu se amana aprobarea acestora pe anul viitor.
Chelaru a precizat ca sedinta de miercuri va fi ultima de plen in acest an, in cursul saptamanii viitoare senatorii urmand sa se reuneasca luni si marti in comisiile de specialitate pentru a pregati sesiunea urmatoare.
Presedintele Traian Basescu a trimis, marti, o scrisoare partidelor reprezentate in Senat si presedintelui acestei Camere, Mircea Geoana, prin care , in cursul acestei sesiuni parlamentare, in ceea ce priveste Consiliul Superior al Magistraturii.
Senatorii nu au reusit, miercuri, pe cei unsprezece judecatori alesi sa faca parte din Consiliul Superior al Magistraturii (CSM), dupa ce dezbaterile in contradictoriu daca acestia sa fie votati in corpore sau fiecare in parte s-au prelungit peste programul de lucru.

description.hltext_display: Look-N-Cook: Texas Tenderloin
description.content:
Home > Wichita Falls Crave > Crave Look and Cook
Serves 8
INGREDIENTS
1 (3-pound) beef tenderloin, trimmed
1 cup soy sauce
1 cup bourbon
1 cup brown sugar
¼ cup red wine vinegar
¼ cup Worcestershire sauce
4 cloves garlic, minced
1 cup chopped onion
DIRECTIONS
1. Combine soy sauce, bourbon, sugar, vinegar, Worcestershire, garlic and onion. Pour over tenderloin. Cover, seal well and refrigerate for 24 hours, turning twice.
2. Preheat oven to 450 degrees. Remove tenderloin from marinade (dispose of marinade) and pat dry. Sprinkle generously with salt, pepper and granulated garlic.
3. Place on roasting pan and cook 12 minutes at 450 degrees. Lower temperature to 325 degrees and cook an additional 20 minute or until medium rare (130 degrees on meat thermometer placed at center of roast). Let rest 15 minutes before slicing.
4. For outdoor cooker, preheat grill 20 minutes on high. Sear roast on each side about 5 minutes. Lower fire and cook 15 minutes more on each side. Check doneness with meat thermometer.

description.hltext_display: Anelka agent eyes US switch
description.content: Nicolas Anelka's brother and agent has claimed the striker could move to the United States when his Chelsea contract expires. The 31-year-old's deal at Stamford Bridge runs until 2012, by which time he will have spent 11 seasons in English football. And he could be tempted to follow former France team-mate Thierry Henry to the States in search of a fresh challenge.Claude Anelka said, in comments reported by the Daily Star: "Nicolas told me he is interested in playing in the United States. We could see him crossing the Atlantic, and I'm serious when I say this."He added: "He asked himself what he will do once his current contract runs out."The US is quite something, and a dream destination. He says he will give it a try, even though he would earn less money than in somewhere like Qatar."Copyright PA Sport 2010, All Rights Reserved

description.hltext_display: Angry Samba seeks Rovers exit
description.content: Captain Christopher Samba is intent on leaving Blackburn after being angered by the decision of new owners Venky's to sack manager Sam Allardyce. The Indian food group axed Allardyce within a month of completing their takeover of the club, with Steve Kean currently in temporary charge as a long-term replacement is sought."If this is the way the club's going to be run from now on, I don't want to be part of it and I want to leave," said the 26-year-old in remarks reported by the Sun."As captain it's very difficult to say this but I've thought long and hard about it. Nobody in football understands the decision to sack Sam."We could have been relegated last year and Sam saved the club, so how can he be treated like this now?"Samba exempted chairman John Williams from blame, though, before pleading for a swift decision over Allardyce's replacement."I'm sure Mr Williams would not have made this decision. He's a football man and respects what a great job Sam has done," he said.He added: "The players and fans need answers about the club's future. Unless we commit to who the manager is, how can we attract big players in January?"Copyright PA Sport 2010, All Rights Reserved

description.hltext_display: Health Supplements for Everyone
description.content:
We all have the right to lead a healthy and content life no matter where we come from. However, in today's times, everyone has become so busy that all we think about is business, job, mortgage, bills, credit cards, and the likes; and simply turn our backs to our very own self. The truth is, no one can be happy or even content without a healthy body. There is no chance that you may feel good while your body is experiencing the opposite. Some of the most common symptoms of poor health include tiredness, fatigue, wheezing, recurring ailments, skin allergies, etc.
We all know that the food we eat plays the most critical role in deciding our health. Yes, other factors such as climatic conditions are also there; however, none of them are as influencing as food. When it comes to our meals, most of us believe that the food we eat is good enough to enrich our bodies with all the required nutrients; however, in most case this comes out to be untrue. Malnutrition is not a disease and hence cannot be detected at early stages. People get to know about their deficiencies only when they start showing up on their bodies. This is the reason it is very important to include health supplements in your diet.
Today, the market is flooded with a wide range of health supplement option; therefore, you must always be very careful while selecting a manufacturer. Always buy health supplements manufactured by a trusted brand such as Homedics, Nature's Way, Metagenics, Garden of Life, and the likes. Buying cheap quality of healthcare supplements may actually work against your health rather than for it.
It is undeniable that healthcare supplements are a must for everyone consider the adultery in food items and our erratic eating habits. If you are planning to turn to a healthier way of life, you can simply use any search engine to find online stores selling health supplements. These stores offer a wide variety of health supplements to suit different needs; hence, no matter whether you are looking to buy Homedics health supplements or Metagenics', you will surely find the best deals on the supplements you need.

description.hltext_display: Crackdown on sledging behind Australia's poor form: ACA chief
description.content:
Melbourne (PTI) -
Since the notorious India series of 2007-08, Australia’s on-field behaviour has been under extra scrutiny and for the past two years, the Aussies have toned down their aggression on the field fearing a backlash from Cricket Australia.
“I think there’s no doubt the team’s performance has been affected. Hard, aggressive cricket is in the Australian team’s DNA and unfortunately the players started second-guessing their natural instincts in the heat of battle for fear of reprisal from Cricket Australia or public backlash from the vocal minority,” Marsh told the Sydney Morning Herald.
“I know for a fact that many of the opposition teams were seeking to exploit what they now saw as a weakness in the Australian team,” he added.
However, in Perth last week a new-found aggression was on display when Australia produced one of its finest performances since July, crushing England 267 runs in the third Ashes Test.
Marsh said after the 2008 Sydney Test against India - during which alleged racial insults from both the sides made headlines, CA came out with a directive that Australian players need to curb their on-field banter.
“After the Indian Test in Sydney, CA called a meeting of all players, CA senior management, some board directors and myself to discuss the way the Australian team was playing the game and being perceived by the public.
“There was a directive given by CA that the team needed to change its on-field behaviour. At the time many of the players disagreed with this directive, however they took the feedback they were receiving on board and there was an immediate noticeable change in the way the team played the game,” he said.
“Unfortunately the Australian cricket team was a victim of its own success. They were winning everything there was to win and all of a sudden this success wasn’t enough for some people.
“The team had to not only win but win in a manner that was different from how the Australian cricket team had played over several decades. In my view it was a classic tall poppy syndrome story and I said so at the time,” Marsh said.
CA spokesman Peter Young added: “After Sydney there was significant public backlash which surprised Cricket Australia and surprised the players, and I think it’s fair to say that we went through a period of introspection.
“But the public has consistently told us since then, through three years of research, that they are totally comfortable with on-field aggression as long as it is hard but fair cricket,” he said.
“What the public saw in Perth, from my understanding of the public mood, was completely acceptable.”

event_or_fact.property: ?After Sydney there was significant public backlash which surprised Cricket Australia and surprised the players, and I think it?s fair to say that we went through a period of introspection
racial insults from both the sides made headlines, CA came out with a directive that Australian players need to curb their on-field banter

description.hltext_display: Drexel goes for another Top 25 upset at Syracuse
description.content:
The 2006-07 Dragons beat a Top 25 team on the road, won 10 straight games, knocked off three of their more respected Philly foes and went 23-9 overall. Not bad, just not sparkling enough to earn an NCAA tournament at-large bid. The Dragons instead lost in the first round of the NIT.
This year, the Dragons (8-1) are off to their best start since 1993-94, have won six straight games, beat a Top 25 team on the road and received votes this week in The Associated Press men's basketball poll.
Instead of thinking about how the streaking start might help the Dragons in March, Flint learned his lesson from the bitter disappointment of four years ago.
It's not the start the counts, it's how the Dragons fare during the Colonial Athletic Association season and the conference tournament that matters if the program wants to play in the NCAA tournament for the first time since 1996.
"I don't even look at '06-07," Flint said this week. "When you do what we did in '06-07 and still don't get in the tournament, it's all about winning your conference. I don't even like to reference back to it because we did everything we needed to do and still didn't get in. It's all about the conference."
True, but it always helps to build a sturdy resume to have handy on selection day.
So far, the Dragons have done their part, highlighted by a 52-46 win at then-undefeated No. 20 Louisville. Flint joked that he received about "10,000 text messages" after the upset and players saw their cell phones and Facebook pages blow up.
"We know we want to get there in the NCAA tournament in March and that was a big win for us," senior Gerald Colds said. "Now we've got to keep it progressing throughout the season."
Waiting at the airport to fly back to Philadelphia, Drexel pulled off its second upset in less than 24 hours: Cardinals fans were gracious in defeat.
"Louisville fans were like, 'You all did a good job last night," junior forward Samme Givens said. "They were a little bit disappointed, but they were more like, 'Wow, I can't believe you really came in here and won.' They weren't too mad about it. Just shocked."
The Dragons believe they can add a second shocker at No. 5 Syracuse (12-0) on Wednesday.
They've done it before, way back in that almost-special 2006-07 season. The Dragons surprised the 23rd-ranked Orange 84-79 for their first win over a ranked team since 1996.
Flint, in his 10th season at Drexel and without an NCAA tournament bid, hasn't talked about that upset with this year's team.
"That team was confident they could win those games," Flint said. "That team was more junior-seniors and this team is more freshman-sophomores."
Chris Fouch, a sophomore guard, leads the Dragons with 19.6 points per game. The Dragons start two sophomores and a freshman (Fouch comes off the bench because he's not a strong defender) but are led by veterans Givens and Colds. Colds averages 10.8 points, and Givens is a terrific rebounder averaging 11.8 boards and 11.8 points.
"Going into Syracuse, it's going to be a tough atmosphere," Givens said.
Givens has helped the Dragons outrebound their opponents by a whopping 14.2 per game. It could be an even matchup against Syracuse , led by forward Rick Jackson, the Orange average 40 boards a game to 43 for the Dragons.
"I think (a win) would open a lot of people's eyes," Colds said.
Flint and his team might have been the only ones at the start of the season who thought the Dragons would be in position to make it two straight Top 25 road wins. The program was rocked over the summer when starting point guard Jamie Harris and backup forward Kevin Phillip were indefinitely suspended over robbery, theft and weapons charges.
"Tragedy happens everywhere and unfortunately it happened to us," Givens said.
The departures left the Dragons, picked sixth in the CAA preseason poll, dangerously thin.
Flint uses seven players and knows the Dragons can't afford foul trouble or serious injuries if they want to contend for a conference championship. Drexel also has to avoid losses against conference teams that cost them that tournament bid four years ago.
The Dragons pushed aside the distractions from the arrest during a bonding summer trip to Turkey. They played the Egyptian under-20 squad and Turkish pro teams in the week they were there, allowing Flint an early look at his team.

description.hltext_display: Maria Riesch ausgeschieden - Poutiainen führt
description.content:
Maria Riesch ist nach einem Einfädler im ersten Lauf des Weltcup-Slaloms in Courchevel (Frankreich) ausgeschieden. Es führt die Finnin Tanja Poutiainen, Susanne Riesch ist Neunte.
Maria Riesch ist beim Weltcup-Slalom im französischen Courchevel bereits im ersten Durchgang ausgeschieden. Die "Sportlerin des Jahres 2010" fädelte an einer Torstange ein. In Führung liegt die Finnin Tanja Poutiainen vor Marlies Schild aus Österreich und Tina Maze aus Slowenien. Beste Deutsche im Zwischenklassement ist Susanne Riesch auf Rang neun. Neben Maria Riesch schied auf dem schwierigen Kurs auch die im Gesamtweltcup führende Amerikanerin Lindsey Vonn aus.

description.hltext_display: PNL a sesizat CCR privind Legea salarizarii pe 2011
description.content:
PNL a sesizat, marti, Curtea Constitutionala a Romaniei in legatura cu neconstitutionalitatea legii privind salarizarea in anul 2011 a personalului platit din fonduri publice. Potrivit Agerpres, liberalii reclama incalcarea normelor constitutionale referitoare la procedura de legiferare prin angajarea raspunderii de catre Guvern."Prin acceptarea ideii potrivit careia Guvernul isi poate angaja raspunderea pe un proiect de lege in mod discretionar, ar insemna acceptarea faptului ca acesta se transforma in putere legiuitoare interferand cu atributiile Parlamentului. In aceasta situatie, Parlamentul devine un simplu spectator, legile fiind impuse si nu rezultatul unei dezbateri parlamentare democratice", a afirmat deputatul PNL Alina Gorghiu.
Liberalii atrag atentia asupra faptului ca Guvernul nu-si poate angaja raspunderea asupra unui proiect de lege oricand, oricum si in orice conditii. Pozitia PNL este aceea ca Guvernul doreste sa se substituie Parlamentului in activitatea de legiferare, incalcand astfel Constitutia.
In opinia liberalilor, angajarea raspunderii pe Legea salarizari nu se justifica, deoarece exista o majoritate parlamentara care sa sustina vointa Executivului astfel incat legea sa fie votata si in Parlament."Legea salarizarii pe 2011 a personalului platit din fonduri publice este dovada a incompetentei si a deciziilor falimentare ale acestui Guvern care nu solutii pentru contracararea efectelor crizei, iar cele mai la indemana instrumente sunt taierile de pensii salarii, indemnizatii pentru mame sau ajutoare sociale", a mai spus Alina Gorghiu.

description.hltext_display: Kallis emerges unhurt from car accident
description.content:
Cape Town - South African batsman Jacques Kallis was involved in a freak car accident here in the wee hours Tuesday but was unhurt and will be available for the Boxing Day Test against India in Durban.
South Africa's team manager Mohammed Moosajee said the incident took place when Kallis, who was the man of the match in the first Test against India, was driving back to his home after midnight and rammed his Audi R8 into the gate of a house in Wynberg, a suburb in the south of Cape Town.
"Jacques had no injuries at all and is totally fine. But the front side of his car was damaged. It was a freak, minor accident and there was nothing untoward about the manner in which it happened," Moosajee said.
Kallis' agent, David Rundle, maintained that he was not drunk and was also not over speeding. "Jacques was sober behind the wheel and wasn't speeding," said Rundle.
Kallis struck his maiden double century in the first Test against India which South Africa won by an innings and 25 runs.
