description.hltext_display: Demand in Men’s Jewelry Rises and Retailer, Emitations.com, Jumps on Board with Solitaire Stud Earring Collection
description.author: Emitations.com
description.content: --(PR.com)-- Emitations.com has expanded its jewelry collection to include mens solitaire earrings. The online sterling silver retailer now offers single, silver fake diamond studs, gold fake diamond studs and solitaire gold hoops.More men are now wearing earrings to show off their personal style. Due to the increasing popularity, there is a much larger selection than in the past. Men have the option of buying a classic faux diamond stud, all the way to a trendy CZ studded gold hoop.Department stores and e-tailers have recognized the opportunity in the men's fashion market. Gilt Groupe will launch Gilt Man, an e-commerce site dedicated to mens fashion and accessories in the Summer of 2011. JCPenney has already expanded their fashion apparel collections to include big and tall men.The market for mens fashion jewelry has grown. For example we have received requests from men wanting stud solitaire earrings, said Au-Co Mai, the Founder and CEO of Emitations.com. They wanted classy, real looking studs for everyday use. We took this information and created a terrific mens jewelry collection that has really helped generate new customers.Emitations.com allows men to buy earrings as a pair or individually. Men have the option of purchasing a pair of faux diamond studs, or they can shop for single stud earrings for a different look. The mens earrings selection comes in a wide variety of stone cut, color and carat size. Most men prefer the solitaire stud style, with the 2 carat round cut faux diamond stud garnering the highest ranking among the male demographic. Emitations.coms most popular men stud earrings are the 2 carat black faux diamond earrings and the 4 carat fake diamond magnetic stud earrings.The online retailer also offers options for men who are looking for a non-permanent solution to this jewelry trend. Clip on earrings, screw back earrings and magnetic earrings are great alternatives to men without pierced ears. These options are great ways to transition men into wearing jewelry. The non-pierced varieties can help ease them into this stylish accessory.Since 1998, Emitations.com has been the leader in bringing celebrity style to the everyday woman by using cubic zirconia and sterling silver. Emitations.com is a popular resource for celebrity and fashion media, with sterling silver jewelry frequently appearing on The View, The Today Show, and in magazines such as InStyle, O! Magazine and Glamour.###

description.hltext_display: [サッカー] 高� �サッカー 九国大付 永井超え！！ (10:35)
description.content:
永井先輩を超える！ 第８９回全国高校サッカー選手権大会（３０日開幕、東京・国立競技場など）に、九州国際大付（福岡）が４年ぶりに挑む。前回出場した第８５回大会はＪ１名古屋入りを決めたＵ－２１（２１歳以下）日本代表ＦＷ永井謙佑（福岡大４年）を擁したものの、２回戦で敗れた。徹底的なＰＫの特訓を積み、福岡県予選決勝では２１－２０という歴史的なＰＫ戦の末に東福岡を下した精神力と、永井のような自由奔放な攻撃サッカーで「国立行き」を目指す。
歴史に残る一戦をものにしてつかんだ全国切符を無駄にしない。「県予選決勝のＰＫ戦は別人がやっているような不思議な感覚に包まれていた。全国ではもっと楽しくプレーし、出るからには優勝したい」。ＤＦ工藤真仁（３年）は誓った。
準決勝もＰＫ戦で勝ち抜き、決勝では２２人全員が枠内に入れ、２１人がゴール。驚異の集中力がクローズアップされたが、実はもともと勝負弱かった。昨年の全国選手権県予選準決勝では東海大五に、１月の新人戦県大会準決勝では東福岡に、それぞれＰＫ戦で敗れた。
「以前はＰＫをくじ引きのようなものと考えていた。負け続けて、実力で決まるものだと思った」と工藤。そこで春先から徹底的なＰＫ練習を繰り返した。全選手が誰一人しゃべらず、じっと見つめる本番さながらの緊張感の中で練習。８月に関西大で行った合宿では、平静を保ちづらい状況をつくるため朝練習前に抜き打ちで行うなど、大舞台でも動じない精神力を培った。
もっとも、杉山監督は選手の判断力を伸ばすために「自由主義」を掲げている。４年前はどんな場所からでもシュートを放つ永井にコーチがパスを指示すると「前を向いてゴールを狙う選手を止めたらいけない」といさめた。「寒いから」と監督や永井らが相談して練習を休んだこともあった。
今回も攻撃は基本的に選手の判断に委ねる。果敢にオーバーラップするサイドバックの工藤や、工藤とともに福岡大への進学が内定している長身ＭＦ田村友（３年）ら創造性豊かな選手がサイドアタックを仕掛ける。「決められた中で個性を発揮する、アフリカンサファリのようなチーム。４年前より、どこからでも攻められる今年の方が面白い」と杉山監督。アジア大会でも物おじしなかった先輩に続き、今冬は大暴れする。
＝2010/12/22付 西日本スポーツ＝

description.hltext_display: Sensus: Populasi AS Kini Lebih dari 308 Juta
description.content:
Ini berdampak pada kekuatan politik di AS karena bisa mempengaruhi jatah kursi di parlemen
Rabu, 22 Desember 2010, 15:50 WIB
Renne R.A Kawilarang
Suasana Pemilu AS 2008 di negara bagian New Hampshire (AP Photo)
BERITA TERKAIT
VIVAnews - Jumlah penduduk di Amerika Serikat (AS) kini sebanyak lebih dari 308 juta jiwa dan mengalami pertambahan hampir 10 persen sejak satu dekade lampau. Dari perspektif politik, hasil sensus kali ini dipandang menguntungkan Partai Republik ketimbang Partai Demokrat, yang tengah berkuasa.
Demikian hasil cacah jiwa yang diumumkan Biro Sensus AS, Selasa 21 Desember 2010, dan dikutip kantor berita Associated Press (AP). Menurut hasil sensus, jumlah populasi di AS per 1 April 2010 sebanyak 308.745.538 jiwa.
Jumlah itu menandakan pertambahan penduduk sebanyak 9,7 persen dari data sepuluh tahun lalu, yaitu sebanyak 281,4 juta jiwa. Tingkat pertumbuhan penduduk tiap sepuluh tahun ini merupakan yang terendah sejak Era Depresi Besar di akhir dekade 1920-an. Jumlah penduduk AS dari 1990 hingga 2000 meningkat 13,2 persen.
Kali ini, Nevada merupakan negara bagian di AS yang paling banyak mengalami pertambahan penduduk. Sebaliknya, negara bagian Nevada merupakan wilayah satu-satunya di AS yang mengalami penurunan populasi, dibandingkan data sepuluh tahun lalu.
Hasil sensus ini berdampak pada kekuatan politik di AS karena bisa mempengaruhi porsi jumlah perwakilan negara-negara bagian di parlemen, dalam hal ini Dewan Perwakilan Rakyat (DPR), untuk pemilihan umum 2013. Negara bagian yang mengalami pertambahan penduduk yang besar bakal mendapat tambahan jatah kursi di DPR, sedangkan wilayah yang penduduknya akan mendapat jatah kursi yang sedikit.
Menurut AP, wilayah-wilayah yang selama ini menjadi basis Partai Republik tengah mengalami pertumbuhan penduduk yang signifikan. Di DPR, Texas akan mendapat tambahan empat kursi, Florida dua, dan ekstra satu kursi untuk wakil rakyat dari Arizona, Georgia, Nevada, South Carolina, Utah, dan Washington.
Sebaliknya, akibat hasil sensus ini, Ohio dan dan New York masing-masing bakal mengalami pengurangan jatah sebanyak dua kursi. Penurunan jatah satu kursi melanda Illinois, Iowa, Louisiana, Massachusetts, Michigan, Missouri, New Jersey, dan Pennsylvania.
Padahal, wilayah-wilayah yang mengalami pengurangan jatah kursi itu dikenal sebagai andalan Partai Demokrat dalam menggalang dukungan Pemilu. Namun, juru bicara Kepresidenan, Robert Gibbs, tidak yakin bahwa hasil sensus itu bakal menimbulkan dampak yang besar bagi politik nasional.
• VIVAnews

description.hltext_display: Toyota will pay $32.4M in fines
description.content:
TOKYO Toyota Motor Corp. has agreed to pay the U.S. government a record $32.4 million in additional fines to settle an investigation into its handling of two recalls at the heart of its safety crisis. The civil penalties will settle investigations into how Toyota dealt with recalls over accelerator pedals that could get trapped in floor mats and steering relay rods that could break and lead to drivers losing control.
The latest settlement, on top of a $16.4 million fine Toyota paid earlier in a related investigation, brings the total penalties levied on the company to $48.8 million. It caps a difficult year for the world's No. 1 automaker, which recalled more than 11 million vehicles globally since the fall of 2009 as it scrambled to protect its reputation for safety and reliability.
The company said it agreed to the penalties without admitting to any violations of U.S. laws. However, that does not free Toyota from potential civil and criminal penalties in private lawsuits and other federal investigations.
Steve St. Angelo, Toyota's chief quality officer for North America, said in a statement that the company has "worked very hard over the past year to put these issues behind us and set a new standard of responsiveness to our customers. These agreements are an opportunity to turn the page to an even more constructive relationship with NHTSA (National Highway Traffic Safety Administration)."
He said Toyota was grateful to its customers for "their confidence in the quality and reliability of our vehicles."
In April, Toyota agreed to pay the maximum fine allowed under law for a single case $16.4 million for failing to promptly alert U.S. regulators to safety problems over sticking accelerator pedals. Under federal law, automakers must notify the National Highway Traffic Safety Administration within five days of determining that a safety defect exists and promptly conduct a recall.
At the time, Toyota denied attempting to hide a safety defect and said it agreed to the penalty to avoid a lengthy legal battle with the government.
Brand loyalty suffers
Jesse Toprak, vice president of industry trends and insight at TrueCar, an automotive consulting firm in Santa Monica, Calif., said Toyota was trying to put its recalls behind it at a time when the company's U.S. sales have been flat while many rivals have taken advantage of a recovering auto landscape.
"It's going to be a far lengthier process. Consumer loyalty is not what it used to be. The choices are plentiful now," he said.
Mizuho Investors Securities auto analyst Ryoichi Saito described the payment as part of the company's efforts to regain customer confidence.
"It is one positive step forward for the company to move on from the recall crisis," he said.

description.hltext_display: وزير الخارجية الايراني بالانابة يزور تركيا في اول زيارة خارجية له
description.content:
يشارك وزير الخارجية الايراني بالانابة علي اكبر صالحي اليوم في الاجتماع ال 19 لوزراء خارجية الدول الاعضاء في منظمة التعاون الاقتصادي (اكو) المقرر عقده في مدينة اسطنبول التركية.
وسيلقي صالحي الذي يرأس (منظمة الطاقة الذرية الايرانية) بعد تعيينه وزيرا للخارجية بالانابة الاسبوع الماضي كلمة امام الاجتماع الوزاري وسيجري لقاءات ثنائية مع بعض وزراء خارجية الدول المشاركة في الاجتماع.
ويعقد المؤتمر يومي الاثنين والثلاثاء على مستوى الخبراء في حين يعقد الاربعاء على مستوى وزراء الخارجية فيما تعقد الجلسة الأخيرة للقمة يوم الخميس على مستوى قادة الدول الاعضاء في المنظمة.
ومن المقرر ان يشارك الرئيس الايراني محمود احمدي نجاد في القمة ال 11 لمنظمة التعاون الاقتصادي (اكو) الذي سيعقد يوم غد الخميس في مدينة اسطنبول.
وتضم المنظمة 10 دول بما فيها ايران وتركيا وباكستان وافغانستان وجمهورية اذربيجان وكازاخستان وقرقيزيا وطاجيكستان وتركمانستان واوزبكستان.

description.hltext_display: Plus de peur que du mal
description.content:
Le Temps-Agences - Un colis suspect trouvé hier matin dans un wagon de la ligne B du métro de Rome ne pouvait pas exploser, a déclaré le maire de Rome Gianni Alemanno à la presse.:namespace prefix = o ns = "urn:schemas-microsoft-com:office:office" /
"Après vérification avec les artificiers, il apparaît que l'engin ne pouvait pas exploser, son mécanisme rudimentaire n'était pas en mesure de provoquer une explosion", a indiqué le maire.
Un porte-parole de la mairie avait fait état auparavant de la découverte vers 10H00 HT d'un paquet par un employé d'Atac, la société de transport de Rome, "contenant une charge prête à exploser et apparemment munie d'une antenne".
:namespace prefix = o ns = "urn:schemas-microsoft-com:office:office" /
Selon l'agence Ansa citant les enquêteurs, la boîte contenait deux tubes de :namespace prefix = st1 ns = "urn:schemas-microsoft-com:office:smarttags" /20 cm
Le convoi vide se trouvait alors dans une zone de manuvre de la station Rebbibia, dans la banlieue nord-ouest de Rome, éloignée de la zone passagers d'environ 3 à 400 mètres
La zone a été isolée mais les rames du métro ont continué à circuler et le trafic n'a été à aucun moment suspendu, selon des porte-parole de la mairie et de la société Atac.

description.hltext_display: Colorado family still 'ringing' in the Christmas season
description.author: noreply@allvoices.com
description.content: It's the 55th year that Merrill Fie has been out on the streets of Denver ringing a bell for the annual holiday charity appeal. To draw donors near, he uses a giant Swiss cowbell made in 1896 a tribute to his family heritage. "It's my grandfather's bell," he said. "Part of a matched set of four."

description.hltext_display: Demokrasi Bisa Lunakkan Kelompok Radikal
description.content:
"Membuat orang-orang atau tokoh-tokoh akan saling mencari titik temu dan kesepakatan."
Rabu, 22 Desember 2010, 15:50 WIB
Elin Yunita Kristanti, Mohammad Adam
Bentrok ormas dengan polisi (www.japanfocus.org)
BERITA TERKAIT
VIVAnews -- Peneliti Setara Institute, Ismail Hasani meyakini cara demokrasi dapat melunakkan aksi yang dilakukan oleh organisasi-organisasi radikal selama ini dalam kehidupan masyarakat yang ingin terciptanya kebebasan beragama dan berkeyakinan.
"Cara demokrasi akan melunakkan, karena membuat orang-orang atau tokoh-tokoh akan saling mencari titik temu dan kesepakatan," kata Ismail dalam jumpa pers rilis riset Setara Institute, "Radikalisme Agama di Jabodetabek dan Jawa Barat: Implikasinya terhadap jaminan kebebasan beragama/berkeyakinan", di Hotel Atlet Century Park, Jakarta, Rabu 22 Desember 2010.
Menurut catatan lembaga itu, soal kebebasan bergama/berkeyakinan selama tiga tahun terakhir agak mencemaskan, karena intoleransi semakin menguat.
Pada 2007 terjadi 185 tindakan dalam 135 peristiwa pelanggaran kebebasan beragama/berkeyakinan. Pada 2008 terjadi 367 tindakan dalam 285 peristiwa pelanggaran kebebasan beragama/berkeyakinan. Sementara 2009 terjadi 291 tindakan dalam 200 peristiwa pelanggaran.
Riset Setara Institute ini menemukan intoleransi terjadi karena faktor sosial, politik, dan ekonomi. Frustasi sosial dan merasa teralienasi akibat ketidakpuasan terhadap pemerataan pembangunan dan ekonomi. Di tengah situasi demikian kehadiran organisasi-organisasi radikal menjadi salah satu faktor yang meradikalisasi masyarakat menjadi intoleran.
Selain itu, faktor kondisi sosial keagamaan masyarakat di Jakarta dan Jawa barat menurut Setara Institute juga telah menjadi lahan terbuka dan menghimpun daya dukung eksistensi organisasi Islam radikal di kedua wilayah tersebut.
Temuan riset ini menunjukkan organisasi Islam radikal di Jakarta, dan Jawa Barat selain memiliki akar kesejarahan yang sama dengan kelahiran radikalisme masa lampau, yakni menegakkan syariat Islam di bumi pertiwi.
Untuk itu, Ismail memandang apabila para tokoh organisasi tersebut diakomodasi dalam politik dan sistem demokrasi yang sedang berjalan, maka akan memoderasi ekspresi politik keagamaannya yang radikal melalui jalur-jalur demokrasi. "Rekomendasi kanal politik ditujukan untuk tokoh elit di organisasi-organisasi ini," kata Ismail.
Dari pemetaan setara institute, lanjut Ismail, organisasi radikal semacam FPI (Front Pembela Islam), Garis (Gerakan Reformis Islam), FUI (Forum Umat Islam), FUI (Forum Ukhuwah Islamiyah), dan LP3SYI (Lembaga Pengkajian Penegakan dan Penerapan Syariat Islam), para elit menempati level pertama yang didukung murid dan masyarakat di bawahnya.
"Nah yang di bawah ini, kita rekomendasikan penciptaan kanal ekonomi yang diharapkan mampu mentransformasi intoleransi dari aktif menjadi intoleransi pasif," kata Ismail.(np)
• VIVAnews

description.hltext_display: Naisy nets new deal
description.author: GARETH LAW
description.content:
STEVIE NAISMITH has handed Rangers fans an early Christmas present after signing on until 2015.
SunSport revealed 12 days ago that the Ibrox side were locked in talks in a bid to keep Scotland ace Naisy who still had 18 months left on his deal after signing from Kilmarnock three years ago.
But Gers gaffer Walter Smith and boss-in-waiting Ally McCoist were keen to tie the talented 24-year-old up for longer and avoid a battle, like they have with Kenny Miller right now, to hold on to him this time next year.
Talks with Naismith's camp had been delayed as the club entered into takeover discussions with Craig Whyte.
But Ibrox chief executive Martin Bain was confident Naismith would put pen to paper when he spoke last week.
Now he has his man signed up for another four and a half years in what will be seen as a major statement of intent by Gers.
Naismith has been one of the club's star players this season after battling back from a devastating cruciate injury in 2008.
He has scored eight times and his displays saw him become one of Craig Levein's first picks for Scotland and he grabbed his first goal for his country in the 3-2 defeat to World Cup winners Spain in October.
Now Naisy has committed himself to being one of the main players for Gers in the future under McCoist.
Gers hope his signing will persuade others to follow suit.
Talks with Miller have stalled and with his contract up in the summer the Scotland striker could be set for an Ibrox exit.
But Bain hopes to thrash out a new deal to hold onto Bosnian full-back Sasa Papac.
Meanwhile, Naisy, a �2million capture from Kilmarnock in 2007, has no fears about Gers' ability to cope with a potential fixture backlog in the New Year.
But he admits the players are growing increasingly frustrated at their lack of games recently.
He said: "We just really want the games to be back on. In the first part of the season we liked having the games midweek and at the weekends.
"It keeps you ticking over, you get into a rhythm of playing and we went on a good run.
"So hopefully we can pick that back up and keep that going towards the end of the season.
"Although the games are mounting up, we will be happy if we keep playing and getting good results." Advertisement

We just really want the games to be back on.

Den kommer att ske måndagen 28 mars i Tegs kyrka. Med sig till spelningen har Plura sin bror, gitarristen Carl ?Carla? Jonsson. Under kyrkospelningen kommer också Umeåmusikern Lina Högström att uppträda. Biljetter till arrangemanget släpps inom kort.

description.hltext_display: Les passagers d'Eurostar et d'Heathrow attendent encore
description.content:
Intempéries en Europe
Le Temps-Agences-
Des milliers de passagers en attente d'un train Eurostar faisaient déjà la queue tôt hier devant la gare de Saint Pancras, tandis qu'à l'aéroport de Heathrow seulement un tiers des vols étaient assurés.
Les températures de la nuit ont replongé dans la nuit sur la plupart du pays, sauf à Londres, où le thermomètre s'est maintenu au-dessus de zéro. Les services météo ne s'attendent pas à voir la neige fondre avant plusieurs jours, mais le temps devrait s'adoucir après Noël.
Au sixième jour de la vague de froid qui frappe le pays, les autorités de l'aéroport londonien d'Heathrow, l'un des plus actifs d'Europe, ont prévenu qu'un tiers seulement des vols pourraient être assurés au moins jusqu'à aujourd’hui 07H00 HT.
Côté Eurostar, la situation n'était guère plus réjouissante: à 08H00 HT, une queue de plusieurs milliers de passagers s'étalait dans le froid sur plus d'un kilomètre autour de la gare et de la bibliothèque voisine, la "British Library".
Il lui faut ajouter les quelque 4 heures de trajet, Eurostar ayant prévenu que compte tenu des vitesses réduites imposées par les intempéries, il fallait presque doubler la durée normale du trajet.
Des milliers de passagers prévus dans les trains vers Paris et Bruxelles dimanche et lundi ont dû passer la nuit à Londres, et se voyaient proposer de nouveaux créneaux horaires à partir de 5 heures hier matin. Eurostar leur promettait un départ hier dans la journée.
--------------------------
Chaos «inacceptable» dans les aéroports
Le Temps-Agences- Le chaos qui règne dans de nombreux aéroports européens en raison du mauvais temps est "inacceptable" et "ne devrait pas se reproduire", a estimé hier le commissaire aux Transports Siim Kallas.
"Je suis extrêmement préoccupé par le niveau des perturbations que la neige a causé pour voyager en Europe. C'est inacceptable et ne devrait pas se reproduire", a dit Kallas dans un communiqué.
Le commissaire européen a prévu de réunir "dans les prochains jours" les représentants des aéroports européens pour leur demander "des explications". Il faudrait que les transports aériens soient en mesure de mieux fonctionner à l'avenir dans des situations similaires, a-t-il dit.

description.hltext_display: USC basketball's road show ends victoriously
description.author: Beth Rucker
description.content:
KNOXVILLE, Tenn. - It didn't matter to USC coach Kevin O'Neill if his Trojans got a win at Tennessee, Kansas or anywhere else. He was just glad to get a road win, and even happier that it came against a ranked opponent.
The Trojans, three days after losing at No. 3 Kansas by just two points, got a 65-64 upset Tuesday at No. 19 Tennessee, the place where O'Neill coached from 1994 to '97.
"It was great to get the win no matter who it was," O'Neill said. "There are great fans here and they really support their team. And we won in a tough environment, which says a lot about our team."
It was the Trojans' first road win in seven attempts dating to a Feb. 18 win at Washington last season.
USC had a two-point
GO INSIDE USC:
For the best around-the-clock coverage of the Trojans, visit Scott Wolf's Inside USC blog.
lead against the Jayhawks on Saturday, but Josh Selby made a 3-pointer with 24 seconds left, and Maurice Jones' potential winning shot with six seconds left was blocked.
Jones led the Trojans on Tuesday with 15points, and this time they survived a late run by Tennessee, which dropped its third consecutive game after beating then-No. 3 Pittsburgh and starting 7-0. It was coach Bruce Pearl's fourth nonconference home loss in six seasons.
Tennessee leads the series between the teams 4-3, but USC defeated the then-No. 9 Volunteers 77-55 on Dec. 19, 2009, at Galen Center during O'Neill's first season.
"They've got to find a way to clear their heads," Pearl said of his players.
Donte Smith hit a 3-pointer from
the wing over the heads of three Tennessee defenders to give the Trojans (7-5) a 65-60 lead with 2:13 left. He missed another with 1:00 left.
Scotty Hopson and Melvin Goins each made a pair of free throws for the Volunteers, with Goins cutting the margin to 65-64 with 47 seconds left. Tennessee (7-3) got the ball back after Jones missed a short jumper with 15 seconds to go, but Cameron Tatum struggled moving the ball down the floor against USC's press and called a timeout with 3.5 seconds left to set up a play.
Tobias Harris, who led the Volunteers with 14 points, missed a 3-pointer as time expired.
Alex Stepheson and Jio Fontan each had 13 points for USC, and Bryce Jones added 11.
"We're learning. We're improving. We're getting better," said Stepheson, a Harvard-Westlake graduate. "We're getting used to each other. We're just jelling as a team right now. We're making strides each day."
Tatum had 12 points and Goins 10 for the Volunteers.
"(We) were hoping to get the ball to Tobias at the top of the key, but the young man guarding Tobias didn't bite on the flare, and when he stepped out, he was too far from the basket to be able to have time to make some kind of play," Pearl said.
Tennessee committed 18 turnovers, including 11 in the first half, which led to 27 points for USC. The Trojans hit 57.7 percent of their shots in the first half and 47.2 percent for the game, and hit nine 3-pointers.
"When we went to the basket, they just stripped us and ripped us way too often. Too many passes to the post players got deflected," Pearl said.
The Volunteers stayed close thanks to their second-chance points and free-throw shooting. Tennessee outrebounded USC 38-23 and had 20 second-chance points compared to the Trojans' five.
USC also committed 24 fouls - twice as many as Tennessee - and the Volunteers went 24 of 29 from the free-throw line.
The Volunteers shot 38.3 percent against the Trojans compared to 35 percent in a loss at Charlotte on Friday, when Tatum missed a winner at the buzzer.
"It's a little out of sync right now," Tatum said. "We just have to get back together, everything back as a unit to get things flowing.
"We've just got to get back to understanding everybody's roles and everybody's position and getting it all back intact together."

description.hltext_display: Alasan Mobil Barang Enggan Pakai Pelat Kuning
description.content:
Padahal, peralihan ke pelat hitam untuk menyiasati kenaikan ongkos angkut transportasi.
Rabu, 22 Desember 2010, 15:49 WIB
Antique, Iwan Kurniawan
Ilustrasi Mobil Boks (VIVAnews/ Inin Nastain)
BERITA TERKAIT
VIVAnews - Rapat Koordinasi Direktorat Jenderal Minyak dan Gas Bumi (Migas), Direktorat Jenderal Perhubungan Darat, Mabes Polri, dan DPP Organda menemukan fakta bahwa banyak kendaraan angkutan barang kelompok usaha kecil menengah (KUKM) saat ini menggunakan pelat hitam.
Namun, sebagian besar menyatakan keengganannya untuk beralih dari pelat hitam ke pelat kuning, meski rencana peralihan pelat tersebut untuk menyiasati kenaikan ongkos angkut transportasi seiring adanya pembatasan bahan bakar minyak (BBM) bersubsidi atau premium.
"Hal ini disebabkan di beberapa kota dan kabupaten di daearah, pelat kuning dilarang masuk ke kota pada jam-jam tertentu," kata Dirjen Migas, Evita H Legowo, saat sosialisasi persiapan pengaturan BBM bersubidi tahun 2011 di Jakarta, Rabu 22 Desember 2010.
Menurut Evita, agar kelompok usaha kecil menengah ini tetap menggunakan BBM bersubsidi, Kementerian Energi Sumber Daya Mineral (ESDM) akan menyiapkan surat yang ditujukan kepada Menteri Perhubungan dan Kapolri dengan tembusan Menteri Dalam Negeri dan Organda terhadap rencana pengaturan BBM bersubsidi.
"Surat ini nantinya meminta agar pihak-pihak terkait melakukan pengaturan khusus di provinsi, kabupaten, dan kota mengenai batasan berlalu lintas dalam kota bagi kendaraan pelat kuning," kata Evita.
Selain itu, agar program 'kuningisasi; kendaraan angkutan barang dapat berjalan, Kementerian ESDM akan meminta rekomendasi kepada Kementerian Perhubungan dengan dasar SIUP untuk menjadi dasar perubahan pelat hitam ke pelat kuning di kepolisian.
"Selain itu, kami akan adakan sosialisasi bersama antara Kementerian Perhubungan, Kepolisian, Kementerian Dalam Negeri, Kementerian ESDM, dan Organda," kata Evita. (art)
• VIVAnews
Belum ada komentar untuk ditampilkan pada artikel ini.

description.hltext_display: Sammon: I should've smoked 'em
description.author: PAUL HUGHES
description.content:
A PLACE in the the history books was right there for the taking. Conor Sammon had a dream chance to become a Kilmarnock legend.
The Irish striker had already scored once when he was given a late opportunity to fire Killie to their first Parkhead win in 55 years.
But in-form Sammon cleared off the line as Celtic held on to claim a point.
But Sammon is gutted he wasn't able to make his late chance count, seconds after Thomas Rogne levelled for the Hoops.
He sighed: "We are really disappointed to have come so close and then not hold on.
"I think we were about five minutes away from winning so it's a big blow to miss out.
"We haven't played well but we've scrapped and fought to try and get the win.
"It's been 50-odd years since we won here and we had a few chances after scoring.
"The lads thought we were close, we knew it could be our night so it's disappointing to come off the park having drawn.
"When I scored it was too soon to start thinking about winning. There was a lot of football left to be played.
"We expected Celtic to come at us hard, which they did, but I thought we held out really well.
"I thought we were going to see it out but we've given away a free-kick and they've got a goal from it."
Silky Sammon waltzed through the lightweight Hoops defence to grab his 15th of the season.
But after he danced round keeper Fraser Forster in the dying minutes he saw his shot cleared by Daniel Majstorovic.
And Sammon reckons he cost Killie victory by being too honest.
His team-mates told him he should have hit the deck after rounding Forster but Sammon said: "I'm not sure how much contact the keeper got on me but I think he did touch me.
"All I was thinking about was trying to score, however, and for a split second it was going through my head I was going to score the winner - but it wasn't to be.
"I think it says a lot we can come here, not play that well and still come away with a result. But to have won it would have been sweeter.
"We're improving all the time. The manager is working hard with us on the training ground to make sure we keep progressing."
Sammon didn't need to work very hard for his goal and he reckons that's because the Celtic defence is too soft.
He added: "Celtic were so fragile. The fans get on their backs and we had chances to get down the park and get a second. That would have been really MASSIVE.
"They keep creating chances though, they keep coming at you. You have to give them credit for that.
"Our goal happened so quickly and we managed to get in behind them."Maybe the full-back thought I was going to shoot but I managed to get in an get a shot away.
"Thankfully it went in so I was delighted with it.
"I always had a lot of belief I could score goals in this league. I have worked very hard away from training so I'm very pleased with my total so far.
"Hopefully I can keep working hard, adding to my total and progressing as a player."
Killie boss Mixu Paatelainen, right, was GUTTED with the draw - insisting his side should have won.
He said: "I'm disappointed. Football is a funny game. I think this was probably the worst we have played in terms of passing the ball.
"The first half was horrendous. All credit to Celtic because they put us under pressure but we should have done better in possession.
"The second half was better and we scored a goal from a good counter-attack. We defended solidly after that and Celtic couldn't get anywhere.
"But we lost a goal from a set-piece where there was poor man-marking. It was very disappointing.
"I felt we should have won in the end. Not because of the way we played but because we had a lead. We should have defended better at their goal.
"In my mind, we should have held on. But it shows how dangerous we are that we scored a goal despite playing like that."
Paatelainen just hopes he does not lose his best stars in January - with the Killie boss fearful striker Sammon will be at the top of rival clubs' wanted list.
He added: "All our players might leave in January!
"If someone comes in and offers the right money then they are all for sale. I don't think anyone is here forever.
"If the chairman says yes to an offer then it happens."

description.hltext_display: Elförbrukningen nära rekordnivåer
description.author: Tidningarnas Telegrambyr
description.content:
Kylan får elförbrukningen att skjuta i höjden. I morse förbrukades över 26 300 Mwh per timme. Prognoserna talar om över 27 000 Mwh senare i eftermiddag, vilket i sådana fall skulle innebära en tangering av den högsta förbrukningen hittills. Det tidigare rekordet är från januari 2001.
Men det är ingen fara för effektbrist i dagsläget sedan Oskarshamn nu fått fart på sin reaktor 3.

description.hltext_display: Wuksachi Lodge Weathers High Sierra Storm in High Spirits
description.content:
Gas Tracker
Find the cheapest gas prices in the area with our Gas Buddy! More>>
Information contained on this page is provided by companies via press release distributed through PR Newswire, an independent third-party content provider. PR Newswire, WorldNow and this Station make no warranties or representations in connection therewith.
SOURCE Wuksachi Lodge
A series of winter storms temporarily closes Sequoia National Park while delivering over four feet of snow at the lodge for a perfect holiday backdrop
SEQUOIA NATIONAL PARK, Calif., Dec. 21, 2010 /PRNewswire/ -- With winter storm conditions closing road access to Sequoia National Park since Sunday, the Wuksachi Lodge, in the heart of the park, has evacuated, rebooked or provided full refunds to its impacted guests, while serving those who settled in to stay and preparing for a very white Christmas when roads reopen.
To date, more than four feet of snow has fallen at Wuksachi Lodge since the storm began. The National Weather Service is forecasting that the precipitation will taper off Wednesday evening with Thursday mostly cloudy and Christmas Eve expected to be mostly sunny in the Sierra Nevada.
"The holiday season is always popular here, and this year will be spectacular," said Wuksachi Lodge General Manager Diane Mason. "It has been about 10 years since we've seen such record rainfall and road closures here."
Guests this winter can take full advantage of the amazing setting by snowshoeing, cross-country skiing, snowman building, or simply gazing upon the beauty from inside the cozy lodge.
For current road information, call the National Park Service at 559-565-3341. (Press 1 to continue to main menu and 4 for current road information.) To inquire about existing reservations or to make a reservation, call 866-786-3199 or visit http://VisitSequoia.com for up-to-date details on the closure.
About the Wuksachi Lodge
Located in the heart of Sequoia National Park on the western slope of the Central Sierra, the 102-room Wuksachi Lodge features a panoramic mountain setting, full-service restaurant, cocktail lounge, retail shop, and 1,320 square feet of dedicated meeting space. Furnishings reflect an upscale, natural decor highlighting native granite rock, oak, cedar, and hickory woods as well as modern guest amenities such as Internet access.
The Wuksachi Lodge is operated by Delaware North Companies Parks & Resorts®, one of the nation's leading hospitality management companies, under contract with the National Park Service.
About Delaware North Companies Parks & Resorts
Delaware North Companies is one of the world's leading hospitality and food service providers. Its family of companies includes Delaware North Companies Parks & Resorts, Delaware North Companies Gaming & Entertainment, Delaware North Companies Travel Hospitality Services, Delaware North Companies Sportservice, Delaware North Companies International and Delaware North Companies Boston, owner of TD Garden. Delaware North Companies is one of the largest privately held companies in the United States with revenues exceeding $2 billion annually and 50,000 associates serving half a billion customers in the United States, Canada, the United Kingdom, Australia and New Zealand. For more information, visit www.DelawareNorth.com.
©2010 PR Newswire. All Rights Reserved.

Home Fragrances That Smell Like Christmas
description.content:
Get your home holiday-ready with these seasonally scented items
’Tis the Season
The holidays are upon us, which means mistletoe, wreaths and all the festive trimmings. But there's also something special about the scents of Christmas that you shouldn’t ignore. Whether you've got a fake tree that's missing the scent of pine needles or you want the aroma of freshly baked cookies long after you've turned off the oven, try one of these 10 festively fragranced products that’ll give you a whiff of everything you love about the season.
Photo: © Shutterstock
Under the Mistletoe
A holiday party isn't complete without mistletoe for lovers—old and new—to sneak a kiss under. But if you prefer the plastic kind to the real stuff, just light a mistletoe-scented candle to help set the mood. Mistletoe & Fig Large Tumbler Candle, $24.99; YankeeCandle.com
Gingerbread Delight
If baking a gingerbread house isn't in the cards this year, try a gingerbread-scented candle so you can still enjoy the aroma of cinnamon, cloves, brown sugar, molasses and nutmeg throughout the house. Gingerbread House Heritage Scented Candle, $15.98–$18.98; GoldCanyon.com

description.hltext_display: Benzo Fury
description.content: is a man-made amphetamine which gives users a euphoric high.It's classed as an "entactogen" as it induces feelings of empathy similar to MDMA - ecstasy. Benzo Fury is also a stimulant and a severe appetite-suppressant. Other side-effects include hallucinations and paranoia.Recently banned mephedrone - known as Meow Meow - is also classed as an entactogen. If you do plan on ordering Bezo Fury use one of the official suppliers of Benzo Fury (We suggest www.mrlegals.com) Benzo Fury is a TANNED chemical; it isn't white or crystalline like some websites want you to believe. As Benzo Fury is a fairly new and in demand compound you may find that stocks dry up from time to time. It is worthwhile putting an order and waiting for the products to be sent out even if the supplies are lower at the time. Benzo Fury is still a Legal High in the UK The police and media have been testing the product sold by many research chemical vendors recently and the majority have been found to contain different substances than what they were labelled. The vast majority of products tested were found to contain old stocks of Mephedrone, Naphyrone, various other illegal Cathinones and stimulants such as powdered Caffeine. In fact, a recent study on the chemical Ivory Wave sold by many "head shops" online was found to contain a cocktail of almost every research chemical that has been made illegal in the last two years. The Government say a temporary banning order on all "legal highs" should be in place by the end of next year to allow scientists time to investigate the effects they have.

description.hltext_display: El cantante de corridos Rogelio Mart�nez fustiga a los narcos en su nuevo disco
العاهل السعودي يغادر المستشفى في نيويورك
description.content:
اعلن الديوان الملكي السعودي الاربعاء ان الملك عبدالله بن عبدالعزيز غادر مساء الثلاثاء مستشفى برسبيتريان في نيويورك حيث كان يتلقى العلاج نتيجة اصابته بانزلاق غضروفي، وهو بصحة جيدة.
واوضح الديوان في بيان ان العاهل السعودي غادر المستشفى حيث خضع لعمليتين جراحيتين "بعد ان من الله جل جلاله عليه بالصحة والعافية" وقد "توجه الى مقر اقامته بنيويورك لقضاء فترة من النقاهة واستكمال علاجه الطبيعي".
ولم يحدد البيان تاريخا لعودة العاهل السعودي الى المملكة.
وكان الملك عبد الله وصل في 22 تشرين الثاني/نوفمبر الى نيويورك لتلقي العلاج اثر اصابته بانزلاق غضروفي مؤلم وتجمع دموي حول العمود الفقري.
وبث التلفزيون السعودي صورا لمغادرة الملك المستشفى وبجانبه وزير الصحة السعودي عبدالله الربيعة.
وبدا الملك عبدالله في التسجيل مبتسما بينما كان يمشي بصعوبة داخل رواق المستشفى ويحيي الطاقم الطبي الذي عالجه، وكذلك عشرات الرجال والنساء الذين كانوا يحيونه بدورهم.
وعلى الرغم من عدم خطورة وضعه الصحي، الا ان انتقال العاهل السعودي الى الولايات المتحدة لتلقي العلاج طرح مسألة الخلافة في المملكة ذات الثقل الاقتصادي والسياسي الكبير في المنطقة، لا سيما وان السعودية هي اكبر منتج للنفط في اوبك مع 8,2 ملايين برميل يوميا.
ومنذ اعتلى العرش في 2005 اطلق الملك عبد الله خطط اصلاح في المملكة المحافظة جدا وابقى البلاد من اقرب حلفاء الولايات المتحدة.
وبعد وفاة مؤسس الدولة السعودية الحديثة الملك عبد العزيز في 1953، توالى خمسة من ابنائه على سدة الحكم في المملكة التي تملك اكبر ثروة نفطية في العالم.
والافراد الاخرون في العائلة المالكة في السبعين او الثمانين من العمر بما في ذلك ولي العهد الامير سلطان بن عبد العزيز.
وولي العهد وزير الدفاع الذي كان يمضي فترة من الراحة في المغرب منذ نهاية آب/اغسطس تلقى علاجا للسرطان في 2008 و2009 في الولايات المتحدة كما تقول مصادر دبلوماسية، وامضى اكثر من سنة في فترة نقاهة في الخارج.
وعاد الامير سلطان البالغ عمره تقريبا 85 عاما من المغرب في 21 تشرين الثاني/نوفمبر لاستلام شؤون الحكم اثناء غياب العاهل السعودي، قبل يوم واحد من مغادرة الملك الى نيويورك.
كما يشارك ايضا في ادارة شؤون المملكة شقيق ولي العهد الامير نايف بن عبد العزيز (76 عاما) الذي يعتبر بعده في خلافة العرش ويشغل منصب النائب الثاني لرئيس الوزراء علما انه يتولى منذ 35 عاما حقيبة الداخلية.
وحمل الوضع الصحي للعاهل السعودي ايضا المراقبين على طرح تساؤلات حول مدى استمرارية الاصلاحات السياسية والاجتماعية التي اطلقها الملك عبد الله والتي بدأت انعاكاساتها تظهر في الحياة اليومية في المملكة.
والتغييرات التي احدثها وصول عبدالله الى سدة الحكم، ولو ببطء، باتت ظاهرة.
فالخوف من سطوة الشرطة الدينية تراجع وباتت النساء يجرؤن على اظهار وجوههن وعلى ارتداء عباءات مزينة، فيما باتت الشركات تتمتع بهامش اكبر لاختلاط موظفيها من الجنسين في اطار مهني.
اما في الاطار الاجتماعي، فقد بات التقاء رجال ونساء غير اقرباء في مكان عام اسهل نسبيا من السابق، فيما تسعى السلطات التربوية الى تطوير المناهج للتماشي مع المعايير الدولية والى انشاء جامعات حديثة.
وعلى الصعيد الاقليمي تزامن سفر الملك عبد الله الى الخارج للعلاج مع نشر برقيات دبلوماسية اميركية من قبل موقع ويكيليكس كشفت ان لدى الرياض تخوفا شديدا من نفوذ ايران في المنطقة، وانها تؤيد بحسب الوثائق شن هجوم على المنشآت النووية الايرانية.

description.hltext_display: Hoop's hell as Gaz faces Old Firm KO
description.content:
GARY HOOPER is facing a major crock scare after being stretchered off in agony last night.
Celtic boss Neil Lennon is worried that his top scorer may have suffered a BROKEN LEG as well as ankle ligament damage.
Scans today will discover the full extent of the 11- goal strike star's injuries.
But Hooper is certain to miss the New Year Old Firm clash - and could be in for a much longer lay-off if Lenny's worst fears are confirmed.
Hooper was hurt after a penalty box tangle with Killie's Frazer Wright as Lennon's men dropped more points at home.
Lennon said: "It looks like ankle ligament damage so the early diagnosis isn't good. There's a worry about the fibula as well so he'll be scanned in the morning and we'll see how he is. It's a huge blow as he's our leading goalscorer.
"I think if he'd been on the pitch longer the score would have been different.
"I don't know how long he'll be out for but I'd say it's looking like he'll miss the Old Firm game.
"I don't want to sound too doom and gloom about it but I saw it on TV and Gary just went over on his ankle and twisted it. That's stretched the ligament."
Celts drew a third straight home game with Thomas Rogne levelling after Conor Sammon's opener.
But Lennon said: "I can't really criticise the players too much.
"But we were wasteful and we can't keep dropping points at home. You can win the league with performances like that - as long as you put the ball in the net.
"We should have been four or five goals up before they scored.
"I'm annoyed, not angry. I thought we got the tactics right and had some good individual performances." Advertisement

event_or_fact.property: It looks like ankle ligament damage so the early diagnosis isn't good.
I can't really criticise the players too much.

description.hltext_display: Ovanligt att polis avlossar vapen
description.author: Josefin Nilsson
description.content: KÅGE Händelsen i Kåge är ovanlig på många sätt. Bland annat då polis avlossade sitt tjänstevapen. - Det är inte vardagsmat precis, säger Peder Jonsson, informationsansvarig vid polisen i Västerbottens län. Men exakt hur ovanligt det är att polis avlossar skott vet Jonsson inte i dagsläget. - Jag tror att den senaste gången var en händelse i Lycksele. Vilken enhet ska utreda händelsen? - Det blir Riksenheten för polismål som ska utreda själva skottlossningen, säger Jonsson och förklarar att det fortfarande är oklart vem eller vilka som ska utreda händelsen som helhet. Hur många patruller fanns på plats under händelsen? - Inledningsvis fanns en patrull på plats men eftersom har fler tillkommit. När själva skottlossningen ägde rum var det flera patruller, men jag vet inte hur många. Hur gick förhandlingen till? - Vad jag vet fanns förhandlaren inte på plats ute i Kåge, men jag vet inte hur själva förhandlingen det gick till, säger Peder Jonsson och förklarar att polis fick hjälp av tolk. Handlar det här om någon form av gisslandrama? - Nej, mannen var själv i bostaden. Är mannen känd av polis sedan tidigare? - Inte enligt den information jag har i nuläget. Hur många patrullen finns på plats på sjukhuset för att bevaka mannen? - Det finns patruller på plats, men jag vet inte hur många.

description.hltext_display: Long restroom visit nets drug bust
description.author: Staff Reports
description.content:
— — A Town of Tonawanda man was arrested after he was found ingesting drugs in the men’s room in Tonawanda City Hall, police reported Tuesday.
Police said Matthew M. Dlugosz, 26, of Carter Creek Drive, went into the men’s room Monday following a court conference and was there for “a considerable amount of time.”
When he came out of the bathroom, police noticed that something didn’t seem right with Dlugosz, who tried to blame his altered state on being sick. Court security didn’t buy his story.
“The security officer noticed he was in there a long time. He said he was sick but he came out in such a stupor that we knew something was up,” Lt. Fredric Foels said.
Turns out, Dlugosz went into the bathroom to crush up a bunch of hydrocodone pills, which he ingested using a hypodermic needle.
Police found on Dlugosz a prescription bottle containing several types of prescription drugs, including Diazepam, which is sold under the brand name Valium; Alprazolam, which is sold under the brand name Xanax; and hydrocodone.
Due to Dlugosz’s condition, he was taken to Erie County Medical Center for evaluation.
Dlugosz was charged with seventh-degree criminal possession of a controlled substance, possession of a hypodermic instrument and public intoxication via drugs.

description.hltext_display: Turkey-Press Scan (22 December 2010)
description.content:
These are some of the major headlines and their summaries in Turkish press on December 22, 2010. The Anadolu Agency does not verify these stories and does not vouch for their accuracy.
HURRIYET
--------
RESOLUTION ALARM
Tension was high at the U.S. House of Representatives yesterday because of the Resolution 252 on the so-called Armenian genocide. When the House Committee on rules did not carry the issue to agenda, all eyes were turned to House Speaker Nancy Pelosi who has the power to suspend the committee. "We have concentrated on issues in the agenda. Today's really busy. Maybe tomorrow," Pelosi told H�rriyet.
While the Armenian lobby is pressing to pass the law from the House before Christmas, the Turkish lobby tried to prevent it. Co-Chairmen of the U.S.-Turkey friendship group at the U.S. House of Representatives sent letters to Congressmen.
The letter warned that adoption of the resolution would harm the national interests of the U.S. and cast a blow to talks between Turkey and Israel aimed at mending the fences.
INCIDENT IN LEFKOSA
Turkish basketball team Pinar Karsiyaka which is leading Group C in the Eurochallange Cup was attacked in the Greek Cypriot Side. Spokesperson of the team said "3000 Greek Cypriots attacked the team after the game. Our fitness instructor's arm was broken during the attack. Our team was going to spend the night in Lefkosa and return to Turkey through Athens. But after the incident the team decided to go to Turkish Republic of Northern Cyprus under the escort of UN Peacekeeping Force. The team will return to Turkey today."
MILLIYET
--------
TWO NEW PROVINCES TO THE SOUTHEAST
Government started to take action to make two southeastern towns Yuksekova and Cizre --where incidents occurred much recently- provinces.
Interior Ministry concluded legal works to upgrade Cizre town of Southeastern province of Sirnak and Yuksekova town of Hakkari to the level of "province".
Accordingly, Cizre will be the 82nd province including Guclukonak and Idil towns which are currently in Sirnak province. Yuksekova will be the 83rd province including Semdinli town of Hakkari.
There will be changes in economic means when those two towns are upgraded to the level of province. Number of civil servants in Cizre and Yuksekova will increase and they will get direct share from the budget.
UGLY ATTACK TO TURKISH TEAM IN GREEK CYPRIOT SIDE
Greek Cypriot supporters attacked members of a Turkish basketball team Pinar Karsiyaka in its group match with Apoel. The Greek Cypriot supporters hurled gas bombs on the basketball players and later came the changing room and beat the players. Some of the basketball players were injured.
It was stated that UN Forces will ensure passage of the team to Turkish side.
SABAH
-----
OBAMA WILL STAND BY HIS NOBEL PRIZE
Commenting on the efforts to bring the resolution on Armenian allegations on incidents of 1915 onto the agenda of the U.S. House of Representatives, Turkish Prime Minister Recep Tayyip Erdogan pointed out to the Nobel Prize presented to U.S. President Barack Obama. "They described the Nobel Prize as a reflection of peace and love. I believe, those who believe that, will stand by this notion," Erdogan said.
YELLOW ANGELS BECOME WORLD CHAMPION
Turkish volleyball team Fenerbahce Acibadem defeated Brazil's Sollys Osasco 3-0 in the finals of the FIVB Women's Volleyball Club World Championship 2010 held in Qatar and became the world champion. Throughout the tournament, the yellow-blue team have not lost a single set against champions like Thailand, the Dominican Republic and Brazil.
VATAN
-----
CANKAYA STEPS IN
Following the tension over the "demand for autonomy with two flags" voiced in the weekend, President Abdullah Gul decided to go to Diyarbakir.
Gul who is closely monitoring the developments, asked his staff to prepare a trip to Diyarbakir. The trip is scheduled to take place on December 30 and 31. President Gul will visit the Governor's Office and the Municipality in Diyarbakir.
Gul who will also get together with Civil organizations during his visit, is expected to give messages of unity and solidarity.
LAME DUCK FAILS
The outgoing U.S. House Speaker Nancy Pelosi, who is referred to as "lame duck" because she lost the elections in November, drew wide reaction, when she made a last minute attempt to bring the Resolution 252 to house floor to appeal to the Armenian voters in her district.
Pelosi who called Congressmen one by one to ask for their support, caused concern in Ankara and Washington. Turkish Embassy, the White House and U.S. State and Defense Departments stepped in and prevented the voting.
CUMHURIYET
----------
NOT A DECISION, BUT A DEBATE
Paying a visit to Turkish Parliament Speaker Mehmet Ali Sahin, Peace & Democracy Party (BDP) chairperson Selahattin Demirtas defended his remarks about autonomy. During the visit, Demirtas explained BDP's stance to Sahin, who earlier said that the party would bear the consequences if it insisted on the Kurdish
language issue. Demirtas said his party had no intention to use the Kurdish language inside the parliament. The chairman also said that democratic autonomy was an issue included in BDP's party program. Describing Democratic Society Congress' (DTK) draft on "autonomous Kurdistan" as "a text to discuss on", Demirtas said it would be wrong to accept such text as a decision adopted.
TURKISH MEDIA FOUND RESPONSIBLE
Justice and Development (AK) Party, which could not sue U.S. diplomats, is thinking about filing cases against those who have published the (Wikileaks) documents. Visual and print media organs in Turkey, which have published or broadcast the documents and accusations claiming that Prime Minister Recep Tayyip Erdogan had 8 different bank accounts in Switzerland, are being monitored closely. Turkish Justice Ministry was asked its opinion on filing action for compensation against the media. If Erdogan approves, high-amount compensation
cases are expected to be filed.
RADIKAL
-------
SAHIN AND DEMIRTAS SPOKE THE SAME LANGUAGE
Parliament Speaker Mehmet Ali Sahin and Peace & Democracy Party (BDP) chairman Selahattin Demirtas who earlier had discussion via media, met on Tuesday.
Demirtas later said BDP did not have a demand to speak Kurdish in the parliament. Sahin in his part said he believed sincerity of Demirtas.
BABACAN TO SAY "RAISE INTEREST RATE"
State Minister Ali Babacan will meet with the bankers at 4.00 p.m. in Ankara Palas today.
Babacan, who will meet director generals of 49 banks, is expected to relay the message to "raise rate of credit interest".
The banks can not raise credit interests much because of competition. However, Babacan's message is expected to be influential.
TURKIYE
-------
TURKEY AND SYRIA TO HUNT DOWN TERRORISTS TOGETHER
Premier Recep Tayyip Erdogan and Syrian Premier Naci Otri discussed bilateral relations and terrorism in Ankara. The two leaders who signed a cooperation agreement against terrorist organizations, said "our joint struggle shall continue."
FENERBAHCE CLAIMS WORLD TROPHY
Fenerbahce-Acibadem Women's Voleyball Team has written history. Fenerbahce-Acıbadem who beat (3-0) Barazil's Sollys Osasco in the Final, became the first Voleyball to win the world championship. Fenerbahce's Girls who did not even lose a single set, honoured Turkey with the trophy.
ZAMAN
-----
SUCCESS IN VOLLEYBALL
Turkish volleyball team Fenerbahce Acibadem defeated Brazil's Sollys Osasco 3-0 in the finals of the FIVB Women's Volleyball Club World Championship 2010 held in Qatar and became the world champion. Throughout the tournament, the yellow-blue team have not lost a single set against champions.
MEETING THAT EASED "BILINGUALISM" TENSION IN PARLIAMENT
An important meeting took place in the parliament yesterday. Parliament Speaker Mehmet Ali Sahin received Peace & Democracy Party (BDP) chairman Selahattin Demirtas and party administrators.
Sahin warned that actions that would lead to tension should be avoided and wanted them not to address to people from the Parliament in a language apart from Turkish.
Demirtas responded affirmatively to the call of Sahin.
YENI SAFAK
----------
BDP PUSHES LIMITS OF PATIENCE
Peace & Democracy Party (BDP) has taken action to destroy the positive atmosphere in the public regarding the solution of the Kurdish issue. The party's way to express its demands such as two official languages, a second flag and own defense forces, has started to push the limits of patience.
LOBBY WAR IN WASHINGTON
"Lobby wars" started as the Armenian diaspora displayed efforts to bring the resolution on the incidents of 1915 onto the agenda of the U.S. House of Representatives which will convene under the presidency of Nancy Pelosi for the last time. The Turkish lobby intensified its high-level talks, while Armenians started launching campaigns one after another.

description.hltext_display: 黔江推广农机具4388套 兑现补贴782万元
description.content: 华龙网讯（通讯员 李奉轩）日前，记者从重庆市黔江区农机推广站获悉，在“两翼”农户万元增收工程的带动下，该区农机具推广也取得了历史性突破，全年推广政府补贴农机具4388套，兑现补贴资金7823290元，惠及4300余户农户。

description.hltext_display: Graham Beck Wines appoints Limbik
description.content: Graham Beck Wines has appointed Stellenbosch-based strategic branding and visual communication design agency, Limbik, as its primary creative partner.

description.hltext_display: Accies in cold storage again
description.author: PAUL HUGHES
description.content:
HAMILTON were forced to postpone their game with Hibs for the second time as they struggled to get their undersoil heating to work.
The Lanarkshire club had to call off Saturday's clash with Celtic after burst pipes played havoc with the New Douglas Park electrics.
Accies were waiting on vital replacement parts being installed yesterday.
That would have given them a slim chance of thawing out their rock-hard surface.
Billy Reid's side thought they would have to wait for an early pitch inspection this morning to discover the game's fate.
But after Easter Road secretary Gary O'Hagan saw the frozen pitch for himself, both clubs decided enough was enough.
Accies secretary Scott Struthers said: "Both clubs have agreed that the pitch is presently unsuitable for play.
"A new date for the fixture will be announced in due course.
"Naturally it's disappointing to lose this fixture for a second time to the weather but in the present circumstances the game had no chance of taking place.
"It was minus 15 locally at 8.30am this morning and still minus 10 at lunchtime.
"I am glad that the sensible decision to postpone has been reached."
Accies will have been idle for a month by the time they take on Dundee United on Sunday but boss Reid doesn't believe a winter shutdown is the answer.
He said: "I'm not sure a winter break is the answer. A lot of people want it but when do you have it?
"The weather in Scotland is so unpredictable you could have an awful November and a fair December and January - or it could be the other way around." Advertisement

event_or_fact.property: Both clubs have agreed that the pitch is presently unsuitable for play.
I'm not sure a winter break is the answer.

description.hltext_display: Activision targets EA in $400 million lawsuit
description.content:
LOS ANGELES Â Activision Blizzard Inc., the video game maker behind the smash-hit shooter "Call of Duty: Black Ops," on Tuesday added a new target in its lawsuit against two former executives: rival Electronic Arts Inc. Activision also put a price tag on its claim for the first time, seeking $400 million.
The amended complaint filed in the Los Angeles Superior Court is the latest salvo in a legal shootout that began when Jason West and Vince Zampella sued Activision for $36 million in March, claiming Activision fired them to avoid paying royalties for their work on the "Call of Duty" franchise.
Activision, owned by France's Vivendi SA, claims EA lured the men away, starting as early as July 2009, despite their having two years left on their contract, in part by using talent agency Creative Artists Agency as an intermediary. It alleges EA dispatched a private jet to Southern California to shuttle West and Zampella to a secret meeting at the home of EA's chief executive John Riccitiello near San Francisco in August 2009.
The two later formed Respawn Entertainment, hiring about 40 employees away from Activision. Respawn said in April it will create games exclusively for release by EA.
In the complaint, Activision alleges that EA intentionally interfered with contracts, engaged in unfair competition and aided and abetted breaches of fiduciary duty by the executives.
EA, which is based in Redwood City, did not immediately respond to a request for comment.
West and Zampella did not directly work on the "Black Ops" game, which Activision said Tuesday had exceeded $1 billion in global sales. The men's unit at Activision, Infinity Ward, works on roughly every other game in the "Call of Duty" franchise with Activision subsidiary Treyarch.
Shares of Activision, which is based in Santa Monica, rose 10 cents to $12.33 in after-hours trading on Tuesday, after closing up 2 cents at $12.23. Electronic Arts shares were unchanged in extended trading after closing up 8 cents at $15.93.

description.hltext_display: Shell: 90 dollar voor een vat olie is niet schadelijk voor economie
description.content:
CEO Peter Voser van Shell is tevreden met een olieprijs van bijna 90 dollar per vat. De vrees dat een hoge olieprijs schadelijk is voor het economisch herstel is onterecht, aldus Voser.
Olieprijs
"Ik kan niet klagen over de olieprijs", aldus de bestuursvoorzitter in Doha, de hoofdstad van Qatar, waar Shell een principe-overeenkomst met Qatar Petroleum aankondigde voor de bouw van een petrochemische productiefaciliteit in Qatar voor $6 miljard.
Geen schade
Als de olieprijs "te veel zou stijgen, zou de vraag reageren en zou de markt zichzelf corrigeren", aldus Voser. In de markt bestaan zorgen dat een hoge olieprijs schadelijk is voor het economisch herstel, omdat onder meer consumentenuitgaven geraakt zouden kunnen worden. Volgens Voser is deze vrees onterecht en zijn de zwakke economie in de VS en de overheidsschulden in Europa grotere problemen.
© RTLZ.nl

description.hltext_display: Hibs ace joins legends
description.content:
DEREK RIORDAN hit the century mark for Hibs at Kilmarnock on Saturday - but was so GUTTED he didn't realise it.
The Easter Road striker notched his 100th goal for the Edinburgh club with a typically emphatic finish in the 2-1 defeat.
But he confessed it meant NOTHING to him because Colin Calderwood's side were trailing when he scored.
It was only afterwards that Deek discovered he'd joined an elite list of Hibs greats who have managed to reach the magic ton in a green and white jersey.
They include ALL of the Famous Five of Gordon Smith, Bobby Johnstone, Lawrie Reilly, Eddie Turnbull and Willie Ormond, as well as Joe Baker and Jimmy O'Rourke.
But Riordan insists he will only savour his feat once his playing days are behind him.
For now his only aim is to finish top scorer at the club this season after losing out to Anthony Stokes last term.
And he hopes his direct style can help lift Calderwood's struggling side higher up the SPL.
He said: "I'd actually forgotten my goal at Kilmarnock was my 100th.
"Obviously as a Hibs fan I am delighted to have scored 100 goals for the club I support - the only disappointment was the final score. I don't really set myself any targets, my only aim every season is to finish top scorer.
"As a striker I feel 20 goals a season is a fair return - and having hit 100 I now want to score as many more as I can for Hibs.
"If I get the chance to shoot then I am going to shoot, that's my strength.
"And I think it's something we are lacking right now, we seem to try to walk the ball into the net too much."
Riordan is already fourth in the list of all-time top scorers in the SPL with 91 goals, two behind ex-Celtic striker Scott McDonald, who he could overtake during the festive period.
Kris Boyd and Henrik Larsson, though, remain streets ahead with 164 and 158 goals respectively.
But Riordan insists his only focus is trying to get the goals to help Hibs get back to their best after just four wins in 16 games so far this season.
Tonight's match away to Hamilton Accies being postponed has only added to Riordan's frustrations.
But Deek is hoping the hectic festive period of games can act as a springboard as Hibs look to push on over the second half of the season.
The reverse happened last term when John Hughes's side had challenged the Old Firm going into the Christmas fixtures but faltered badly in the new year.
Deek believes a top-six place is still within Hibs' reach with only eight points between them and sixth-placed Motherwell right now.
And after the disappointment of being sent off against Hearts at Easter Road in November he admits he would love to be in the top half at the split - so he can have another crack at the Jambos before the end of the season.
He said: "The top six is where you want to be, you want to be playing against the best teams and you want another derby - that's the game I look forward to. Of course the fans are frustrated, I know what it is like. I was the same when I was younger and went to games, I always got down when we did not win.
"We are right down there and that's disappointing, but last season we started so well before falling away after Christmas.
"So hopefully we can do things the other way round this time and start to push ourselves back up the table.
"We have an important match against Aberdeen on Sunday, a chance to put clear water between ourselves and the team at the bottom of the table - but we must defend better."
Meanwhile, Moroccan playmaker Merouane Zemmama has handed Hibs a boost by revealing he could be back in action early in the New Year.
The midfielder has been out since March after damaging his cruciate ligament, but has now resumed training and is hopeful of making a top team return in the next few weeks.
He said: "I'm nearly fit. I've started to fully train with the boys and feel great.
"I've worked very hard and the physios and fitness staff have worked very hard with me.
"Everything has gone okay and I'm looking forward to playing some bounce games before playing again." Advertisement

event_or_fact.property: I'd actually forgotten my goal at Kilmarnock was my 100th.
he would love to be in the top half at the split - so he can have another crack at the Jambos before the end of the season
The top six is where you want to be, you want to be playing against the best teams and you want another derby - that's the game I look forward to.

description.hltext_display: Ouattara appelle à la désobéissance au «gouvernement factice»
description.content:
Guillaume Soro, Premier ministre du gouvernement d'Alassane Ouattara, un des deux président proclamés de Côte d'Ivoire, a appelé hier les Ivoiriens à "la désobéissance au gouvernement factice" de son rival Laurent Gbagbo "jusqu'à son départ".
"Je vous exhorte dès cet instant à la désobéissance au gouvernement factice de Laurent Gbagbo jusqu'à son départ", a indiqué Soro dans un communiqué.

description.hltext_display: [相撲] 白鵬、６連覇へ軽めの始動 「いよいよという感じ」 (17:09)
Lawmakers Are Least Trust People In South Korea - Survey
description.content: SEOUL, Dec 22 (Bernama) -- A survey by the Nielsen Company Korea showed that lawmakers are the least credible and rank at the bottom among the nation's 12 broad occupational groups in terms of social credibility, Yonhap news agency reported Wednesday. Among other professions are school teachers, professors, prosecutors and civil servants. The survey was conducted online on 1,000 adults living in Seoul and four other big cities last month, Yonhap said. The lawmakers got 2.4 of 10 points for measuring credibility, and the credibility of officials in the central and local administrations was also relatively low with 3.8 points and 3.9 points, respectively. While, teachers of elementary, middle and high schools were found to have the highest credibility at 5.7, followed by university professors and civic group activists (5.3 points), and medical doctors, accountants and lawyers (5.1 points). In a report about the survey, the company said South Korea needs to restore credibility in jobs in charge of defending public safety and order, such as lawmakers, civil servants and prosecutors. -- BERNAMA

description.hltext_display: EBM överklagar friande Carnegiedom
description.author: Tidningarnas Telegrambyr
description.content:
Ekobrottsmyndigheten (EBM) har överklagat den dom där Stockholms tingsrätt helt frikänner tre före detta värdepappershandlare på Carnegie, som åtalats för grov otillbörlig marknadspåverkan.
I sitt överklagande begär åklagaren Yngve Rydberg att hovrätten utser en ledamot med särskilda kunskaper om handeln med finansiella instrument.
Enligt Rydberg har männen fifflat med optionskurser, men tingsrätten fann att deras handel varit legitim.

description.hltext_display: Modern Updates for Your Home’s Exterior
description.content:
Spruce up your house’s exterior façade using these innovative pieces
What's New: Outside
The beginning of a new year is coming and it’s time to set some New Year’s resolutions—for your home! With thousands of innovative additions possible, it’s difficult to know what would really take your abode to the next level. Start by sprucing up your outdoor areas with one or more of these modern pieces.
Make an Entrance
A new door can work like a mini facelift, and it can also help reduce energy bills. Therma-Tru’s “Door Designer” and “My Saved Doors” features make it easy to try on different styles, customize them and share with friends and family (everyone has an opinion) before purchasing. description.hltext_display: Vera Bright
description.content:
Graveside services will be at 1 p.m Thursday in Burkburnett Memorial Cemetery with Roy Christopher of Central Church of Christ officiating under direction of Owens & Brumley Funeral Home of Burkburnett.
Mrs. Bright was employed with Sweetwater ISD as a bookkeeper.
Survivors include daughter, Sue Chavis of Burkburnett; two sons, Edward Bright of Abilene and David Bright of Virginia Beach, Va.; five grandchildren and 10 great-grandchildren.
Memorials may be made to Hospice of Wichita Falls 4909 Johnson Rd. Wichita Falls, TX. 76309.
Condolences may be sent to www.owensandbrumley.com.

description.hltext_display: 黔江万亩柑橘丰收（图）
description.content: 华龙网讯（通讯员 郑清伦）12月20日，黔江区舟白街道一村民在采摘柑橘，享受着丰收的喜悦。据了解，黔江是柑橘盛产地之一，全区共有柑橘基地面积1万亩，预计今年实现产量7000吨，收入1400万元，成为当地3000农户增收致富的重要渠道。

description.hltext_display: Le Parlement accorde sa confiance au gouvernement
description.content: Le Temps-Agences - Le Parlement irakien a accordé hier sa confiance au gouvernement d'unité nationale dirigée par Nouri al-Maliki et a adopté son programme en 43 points qui entend libéraliser l'économie, développer la production pétrolière et combattre le terrorisme.:namespace prefix = o ns = "urn:schemas-microsoft-com:office:office" / :namespace prefix = o ns = "urn:schemas-microsoft-com:office:office" / Le Parlement a voté séparément pour 29 ministres, trois vice-Premiers ministres et le chef du gouvernement mais tous les postes n'ont pas été pourvus. Ainsi Maliki assurera lui-même l'intérim des trois portefeuilles de la sécurité.

description.hltext_display: Individual and Family Health Quotes from Celtic Are Now Available 24 Hours a Day
description.author: Insurance Market of the Upstate, LLC
description.content: --(PR.com)-- Today, The Insurance Market of the Upstate, which is headquartered in Greenville, South Carolina, announced the addition of Celtic Health Insurance Company to its health insurance website. This site is designed to help consumers shop and apply for health insurance on line. This website matches the consumer with leading health insurance carriers in South Carolina. This site also provides the opportunity for consumers to select specific programs that fit their individual health needs and price point. The website will have the ability to match customers in South Carolina with instant quotes from Assurant, Aetna, Celtic, Cigna, Humana, and United Health-Golden Rule."Celtic is a great addition to our agency and our website. This company will allow us to offer another competitive choice to our customers," said Nick Yaworsky, Agency owner and President for The Insurance Market of the Upstate."We feel it is important to offer insurance products that fit everyones budget. Celtic is extremely competitively priced in South Carolina and has a wide variety of products to fit most needs. The web portal is up and running 24 hours a day and will allow customers to shop when they have the time. My website also has a toll free number for customers to call if they have any questions or would like to speak to agent one on one and walk them through the process, said Mr. Yaworsky.The Insurance Market is a retail independent insurance agency and brokerage firm with access to a wide variety of products. The Insurance Market is dedicated to working with their customers to protect what is most important and promise to do so in a manner that is courteous and prompt. They represent the customer, and strive to provide their customers with the best products, at the most competitive prices, in the market today.The Insurance Market is licensed in several states in the East and Southeast, and provides Individual and Group Health Insurance, Personal, and Commercial Business Insurance to its many customers. The Insurance Market is also accredited by the Better Business Bureau and a member of the Independent Agents and Brokers of America.###South Carolina Health Insurance from Insurance Market of the Upstate, LLC is now offering Celtic Health Insurance.

description.hltext_display: Defiende Videla crímenes de la dictadura argentina
description.author: NTX
description.content:
Jorge Rafael Videla, ex dictador argentino, defendió ayer ante un Tribunal de Córdoba los crímenes cometidos durante el régimen militar entre 1976 y 1983.
Fotografía: AP.
BUENOS AIRES (NTX)._ El ex dictador argentino Jorge Rafael Videla se autocalificó ayer como "preso político" al defender los crímenes de lesa humanidad que cometió el régimen militar en Argentina entre 1976 y 1983, y aseguró que fueron producto de una "guerra justa".
Al hacer su última declaración en el primer juicio que enfrenta en 24 años, Videla denunció que el Gobierno de la Presidenta Cristina Fernández ha promovido una visión "sesgada" de la historia de este País sudamericano.
"Mucho se ha dicho sobre lo ocurrido en la década del 70, con una visión sesgada de la realidad, ocultando parte de los años tremendos de esa guerra y tergiversando la parte que se hace pública", afirmó el ex represor, de 85 años.
"Los enemigos derrotados ayer gobiernan hoy el País, y no dudan en erigirse como los paladines de los derechos humanos que no supieron hacer honor en su época", lamentó el ex Presidente de facto ante jueces de un Tribunal de Córdoba.
Desde el Gobierno argentino, acusó, "se intenta establecer un régimen marxista, la Constitución Nacional guarda luto por la República desaparecida".
Insistió que la dictadura argentina no llevó a cabo "una guerra sucia, fue una guerra justa que contó con el apoyo mayoritario de la ciudadanía, que se sintió aliviada" por el combate a la subversión.
Al justificar sus acciones, Videla reclamó "para el pueblo argentino en general el honor de la victoria en esa guerra subversiva y valoro el sufrimiento de quienes lloran con el dolor de sus familiares víctimas", y no de quienes quieren utilizarlas.
"En mi carácter de preso político deseo manifestar que homologuen una decisión política adoptada por sed de revancha, por aquellos que derrotados en el plano militar, hoy detentan los más altos cargos políticos", dijo.
"No vine a defenderme ni a alegar mi defensa, que no guarda sentido. Asumiré bajo protesta la injusta condena que se me pueda imponer como contribución de mi parte a la concordia que logramos en el País", aclaró.
"Mucho se ha dicho sobre lo ocurrido en la década del 70, con una visión sesgada de la realidad, ocultando parte de los años tremendos de esa guerra y tergiversando la parte que se hace pública".
Jorge Rafael Videla
Ex dictador argentino

description.hltext_display: Séisme de magnitude 6,5 ; sept morts
description.content:
Le Temps-Agences - Un séisme d'une magnitude de 6,5 sur l'échelle de Richter a fait lundi sept morts et des centaines de blessés dans des villages reculés du sud-est de l'Iran, a annoncé le gouverneur de la région.:namespace prefix = o ns = "urn:schemas-microsoft-com:office:office" /
"Pour l'instant, sept personnes ont été tuées et des centaines ont été blessées. Il y a encore des centaines de personnes prisonnières sous les décombres", a déclaré Esmail Najjar, gouverneur de la province de Kerman où s'est produit le séisme.
:namespace prefix = o ns = "urn:schemas-microsoft-com:office:office" /
L'institut américain de recherche géologique (USGS) avait estimé la magnitude à 6,3 et la profondeur du séisme à :namespace prefix = st1 ns = "urn:schemas-microsoft-com:office:smarttags" /12,3 km
Les séismes sont fréquents dans la province de Kerman qui n'est pas une région productrice de pétrole. Quelque 31.000 personnes y ont été tuées en 2003 dans le tremblement de terre qui a rasé la ville de Bam.

description.hltext_display: NT’s Franklin given key to city
description.author: Neale Gulley
description.content:
— — North Tonawanda Mayor Rob Ortt referred to retiring Public Works Superintendent Gary Franklin as a “wealth of institutional knowledge” Tuesday before handing the 35-year veteran employee the key to the city.
Ortt held interviews with 13 candidates to replace the department head last week, and said beforehand he is confident a qualified replacement exists in the pool of candidates, who should be announced soon.
Each council member attending Tuesday’s meeting shared kind words about working with Franklin on various individual projects. Ortt previously said he has spoken to Franklin or his aides on a daily basis since taking office.
Franklin will finish out the year. He is a life-long city resident who graduated from North Tonawanda High School in 1972 and has served as DPW superintendent since February 1981 when he was appointed in an “acting” superintendent capacity while DPW head Victor A. Fulmines recovered from an injury.
He was given the full title in September of 1981 after his predecessor retired. Franklin was 26 when he was appointed acting DPW superintendent. His career with the city began as a summer employee while he was going to school, and he joined the DPW in 1976.
Just prior to the brief ceremony, the winners in six categories in the city’s annual holiday decoration contest were announced in turn. In the order they were announced, Patricia and Geoffrey Johnston were called up to accept the award for best overall holiday decorations at their home at 152 Keil St.
In the most original category, Dawn and Richard Duerr’s home at 1383 Weaver Pkwy. was named winner. Leroy and Kathleen Hall of 126 10th Ave. took top honors in the decorated lawn division. This year’s business winner is Sherwood Florist at 458 Oliver St.
Ortt also added a new category this year, the Clark Griswold award, which was awarded to the Nachreiners of 74 Cramer St.
The “coveted” mayor’s award was also bestowed, this year to the Smolka family of 683 Shad St., a continual contender in the annual honors.
In other business Tuesday:
• The council authorized Assistant City Attorney Bob Sondel to seek a Shared Municipal Services Incentive Grant offered by the state of New York related to the city’s ongoing exploration into sharing potable water with Lockport.
• The council approved a change order adding $4,102 to the city’s storm sewer separation project, originally included in the 2010 capital budget for $260,000 to install new and separate storm sewers on Ransom Street. The change order is based on revised materials. The project is being contracted to North American Construction Company, Inc., of Attica, for a total of $208,877.
Another change order was made adding $8,237 to a revised $272,009 contract for the summer’s paving of the Manhattan Street public parking lot.
• A bid was awarded to Buffalo Truck Center, 271 Dingens St., Buffalo, for a new axle cab and chassis with a rear loading garbage packer for the Department of Public Works. The bid costs the city $184, 229.
• The city approved a revised stormwater management plan reflecting recent changes to the process to mitigate stormwater pollution made this year by the Department of Environmental Conservation.
