description.hltext_display: Presiden SBY: Harga Tiket Jangan Terlalu Mahal
description.content:
Rabu, 22 Desember 2010 15:28 WIB 0 Komentar 0 0
JAKARTA--MICOM: Presiden Susilo Bambang Yudhoyono meminta pihak panitia penyelenggara final piala AFF leg kedua di Stadion Gelora Bung Karno agar tidak menetapkan harga tiket dua kali lipat lebih mahal khususnya bagi penonton bukan VVIP dan VIP.
"Tentang tiket, tadi pagi banyak sms harga tiket naik, saya berharap PSSI dengan semangat kebersamaan, tiket untuk rakyat tolong diatur jangan sampai terlalu tinggi sehingga di luar jangkauan sebagian rakyat kita, jangan kejar keuntungan semata," kata Presiden kepada wartawan di sela acara peringatan hari Ibu ke-82 di Jakarta, Rabu siang (22/12).
Presiden mengatakan PSSI dan panitia penyelenggara hendaknya tidak semata-mata memikirkan keuntungan namun juga harus memperhatikan suara rakyat yang keberatan atas meningkatnya harga tiket final dibandingkan pertandingan sebelumnya bahkan semifinal.
"Perhatikan suara rakyat jangan berlebihan harga karcisnya," kata Presiden.
Selain itu, Kepala Negara juga mengimbau berbagai pihak bisa memfasilitasi warga yang tidak tertampung untuk menyaksikan pertandingan final di dalam Stadion Gelora Bung Karno dengan menyediakan layar lebar atau program nonton bersama.
"Tidak mungkin semua ke Senayan. Yang bisa sediakan nonton bareng atau layar lebar, sehingga tidak semua berbondong-bondong datang," kata Presiden.
Timnas sepak bola Indonesia akan berhadapan dengan timnas sepak bola Malaysia di Stadion Bukit Jalil Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia pada leg pertama final Piala AFF, 26 Desember. Adapun pertandingan kedua akan berlangsung di Stadion Utama Gelora Bung Karno pada 29 Desember mendatang. (Ant/rj/OL-5)

description.hltext_display: Polovica do práce nedošla!
description.content:
Zdroj: Plus JEDEN DEŇ/nb 22. december 2010, 07:55
Zdroj: MARTIN RINČO V sále bolo iba 79 poslancov. Prezentácia ani druhý pokus začať schôdzu nevyšiel, chýbal jeden poslanec.
Podobné stránky
Na poslednej predvianočnej schôdzi chýbala takmer polovica poslancov. Devätnástim, ktorí sa ospravedlnili, predvianočne naladený predseda parlamentu Richard Sulík plat nestrhne.
Poslednú predvianočnú schôdzu sa predsedovi parlamentu podarilo otvoriť až na tretíkrát. Neprišla totiž takmer polovica poslancov, medzi nimi predseda SNS Ján Slota a takmer dvadsať poslancov strany Smer.
Šéf parlamentu sa veľkodušne rozhodol, že plat im nestrhne, veď idú Vianoce. „Keďže ide o schôdzu, ktorá bola s veľmi krátkym predstihom zvolaná a aj o jej predpokladanú dĺžku, tak všetky tieto ospravedlnenia budú mnou uznané,“ potešil poslancov Sulík.
Poslanec Ivan Švejna si listoval v našom denníku.
Foto: MARTIN RINČO
Väčšina z neprítomných smerákov uviedla ako dôvod neúčasti zasadnutie mestského zastupiteľstva v Košiciach, poslankyne Košútovú a Vaľovú skolila predvianočná choroba. Zo 79 prítomných poslancov 77 hlasovalo za prelomenie prezidentovho veta a novelu zákona o dani z príjmov, ktorej súčasťou je aj daň z emisných kvót, poslanci pred Vianocami schválili.
Niektorí poslanci dostali DVD s filmom Smrteľný omyl. Prečo asi?
Foto: MARTIN RINČO

description.hltext_display: Saudi's geschokt door sportende meisjes
description.content:
De regering van Saudi-Arabië begint een onderzoek naar een sporttoernooi tussen zes meisjesscholen. De scholen hielden vorige week voor het eerst een toernooi met tweehonderd meisjes.
Tegen de regels
Dat was tegen de regels, aldus een woordvoerder van het ministerie van Onderwijs dinsdag op de site arabnews.com. Dat de meisjes geheel bedekt waren, maakte geen verschil.
'Alleen voor jongens, niet voor meisjes'
''Tot mijn verrassing kreeg ik een brief van het ministerie met vragen over het toernooi en de reden daarvoor. Ik kreeg ook veel brieven en telefoontjes van conservatieve Saudi's die zeiden dat ik beter zou moeten weten", aldus directievoorzitter Farida Farsi van de Al-Hamra scholen in Jeddah. ''Sport zou alleen voor jongens zijn en niet voor meisjes.''
Belachelijk
Aanvoerder Lina Almaeena van het meisjes-basketbalteam noemde de klachten belachelijk. ''Willen ze dan dat de meisjes roken en rondhangen in cafés en winkelcentra in hun vrije tijd?".
© RTLZ.nl

description.hltext_display: Bling in the New Year
description.content:
Your quick access to our picks for sweet shops, restaurants and services.
Gabrielle Johnson
About Gabrielle Johnson
When shopping finally becomes an Olympic event, editor Gabrielle Johnson is pretty sure she’ll take home the gold medal for Canada – after inquiring about the availability of other colours (lilac? chartreuse?) and politely requesting a discount. Every week, she shares a glimpse into what’s on her style radar. life/style t.o.: best new year's eve jewellery canada (Dec.22.10)
Unless you're going to the Oscars — or Senior Prom — it can be tough finding appropriate occasions to wear jewellery that makes a major statement. Luckily, New Year's Eve is the one night of the year when over-the-top glamour isn't just encouraged; it's expected. Don't be afraid to pile on the bling this December 31st. You want to look good ushering in 2011, don't you?
J.Crew's stunning FENTON and FALLON Carrington Crystal Bow Necklace is an exquisite mix of Swarovski crystals, gold- and copper-plated brass chains and hand-dyed silk ribbons. I'd pair this beauty with a dress in cream or muted gold (nothing sequined or sparkly) to let the necklace take centre stage.

description.hltext_display: Historic Photo Event Comes to Sacramento
description.author: I AM EQUAL FOUNDATION
description.content: --(PR.com)-- The ambitious I AM EQUAL photo project will officially launch its 29 city, 2011 U.S. tour at The Citizen Hotel in downtown Sacramento on 6-January-2011 and open the doors to people of all walks of life who are stepping up for human rights & equality in our community and around the world.Were excited to open this project in, what TIME Magazine has called, the most diverse city in the country, explained project creator, Jason Beckett. Mayor Johnsons office has been instrumental in connecting us with all the different community leaders to ensure a successful event that truly represents the diversity of this city and we couldnt be happier with the response.The I AM EQUAL photo project is open to the public from 11:00am through 9:00pm and more than 600 people are expected to participate in support of various causes related to human rights & equality. We see people coming in support of childrens rights, or to end domestic violence, explains project photographer, Matt Spencer. There are some who are standing up for gay and lesbian issues, and others who are survivors of abuse or disease. Each person has a story and this project is here to empower people to stand up and tell their story.Connecting with the personal stories and causes of each community is the cornerstone of this project and a major reason why its viral expansion is so effective. Participants are encouraged to share their I AM EQUAL photo with friends, family, and co-workers through social media, email, blogging, and other methods in order to start a conversation about the issues and causes that mean the most to the individual.The photos are most effective as a conversation starter, said Mr. Beckett. In the moment these people share this photo, they invite a conversation with those around them and thats when the magic happens. These participants find that they are talking about issues with people they never would have guessed would be interested. The power of the project is in the persons willingness to open up and talk when someone asks about the photo or project.Participants are asked to wear a brightly colored shirt and come to the event ready for their photo with hair and makeup complete. A $20.00 donation is suggested to support the efforts of the I AM EQUAL FOUNDATION and the photo tour, but the event is free to participate. Event organizers have said that anyone who is registered for a photo before 9:00pm will get a photo, and recommends that those who wish to participate in the project come early in the day to avoid the last-minute rush at the end of the event. As this is a project to showcase individuals stepping up for human right and equality, there are no group pictures at this event.ABOUT THE I AM EQUAL PROJECTThe I AM EQUAL PROJECT was created by Jason Beckett and fashion photographer Matt Spencer in January 2010 in an effort to empower individuals to speak out about the causes that inspire them. The project goal is to capture more than 100,000 photos of people from all walks of life with the I AM EQUAL logo emblazoned on the palm of their hand as a symbol of their commitment stand up for their rights, and the rights of others around the world.Learn more at: http://www.iamequalproject.orgSee the photo collection at: http://photos.iamequalproject.orgFind event details at: http://www.iamequalproject.org/events###The I AM EQUAL photo project shines light on human rights in state capitol.

description.hltext_display: Lakers look like deer in headlights against Bucks
description.author: Elliott Teaford
description.content:
In last game before Christmas Day affair with Heat, L.A. looks nothing like champs in loss to Milwaukee; Bryant gets ejected
Posted: 12/21/2010 11:52:48 PM PST
Updated: 12/21/2010 11:53:08 PM PST
In last game before Christmas Day affair with Heat, L.A. looks nothing like champs in loss to Milwaukee; Bryant gets ejected
Updated: 12/21/2010 11:53:08 PM PST
Kobe Bryant looks back and has a few choice words to the referee, who then called a double technical foul on the Lakers star and ejected him. The Lakers were defeated by the Milwaukee Bucks 98-79 Tuesday at Staples Center. (John McCoy/Staff Photographer)
The Lakers forgot about the game before THE GAME.
It was such an obvious trap game the Lakers huddled after their morning shootaround Tuesday to remind themselves they had to play against the Milwaukee Bucks that night at Staples Center before meeting the Miami Heat on Saturday.
Lakers coach Phil Jackson said he didn't have to say a word about looking past Milwaukee to Miami and about handling their business against the lackluster Bucks before their possible NBA Finals preview against the Heat.
"They did it on their own, at the huddle, after the walkthrough this morning," Jackson said. "It was mentioned, like, 'Don't mess around and let this game get away from us and ruin what we're trying to do on Christmas.'"
In
GO INSIDE THE LAKERS:
For the best around-the-clock coverage of the Lakers, visit our Inside the Lakers blog.
the end, the Lakers talked a far better game than they played in falling to the Bucks 98-79 and ending their five-game winning streak with a lifeless clunker that had many in a sellout crowd of 18,997 booing in the closing minutes.
The Bucks outscored the Lakers 26-13 in the fourth quarter.
The Lakers had more turnovers (18) than assists (17).
"I told them I didn't think they could play any worse than that," Jackson said.
Kobe Bryant's day started and ended poorly. He was involved in what Jackson called a "fender-bender" and arrived about 30 minutes late to the team's shootaround. Then he didn't stick around for the finish of the game.
Bryant drew two technical fouls and an automatic ejection after he was
called for an offensive foul with the Lakers trailing the Bucks 92-77 with 2:07 remaining. He scored a team-leading 21 points on 9-for-16 shooting.
He left the arena without speaking to reporters after his first ejection since March 26, 2008, against the Charlotte Bobcats.
"Frustration," Jackson said when asked about Bryant's late-game outburst. "Just being frustrated. The referees are only human. They see the other team outwork you, they're going to give them the benefit of the doubt."
Lamar Odom, who didn't attend the team's shootaround because he was feeling ill, also tried to make a hasty postgame exit. But a group of reporters stopped him in the hallway before he could leave the locker room.
"We just didn't play well," he said. "We could have lost to anybody tonight, anybody in the league. We've played in big games before.
"We understand you've got to take care of the game that's in front of you, but we didn't."
Odom scored 12 points, grabbed 10 rebounds and added six assists in a team-leading 37:44. Pau Gasol had 15 points and 11 rebounds.
Bryant, Gasol and Odom were the only Lakers to score in double figures.
After treading water for the better part of the game, the Lakers were within 72-66 going into the fourth quarter. Instead of surging, as they so often have this season when it matters most, the Lakers went ker-plunk down the stretch.
They trailed 82-72 after Earl Boykins hit a 3-pointer and Luc Richard Mbah a Moute followed with a jumper on consecutive possessions midway through the fourth quarter. Moments later, Andrew Bogut's layup extended Milwaukee's lead to 85-72.
The Lakers paid a steep price for their inattention to details. For instance, their offense went stagnant far too often, particularly after they fell behind by double digits in the fourth quarter and failed to catch up.
"We stopped moving the ball," Jackson said, pinpointing what went wrong. "We started playing individual basketball. I think one of the things about us is we have to analyze our individual games and how it applies to what we're doing as a group."
Asked to expand on his final thought, Jackson said, "It's a part of these things that are self-evident that can be corrections that teams go through. Then you can use some of the things that happened in the game as a starting point to get better, or whatever you want to do to help a team along. But this game was a wake-up game of sorts for our team."
Milwaukee ended a six-game losing streak against the Lakers, thanks in large part to the 5-foot-5 Boykins, who scored 13 of his team-high 22 points in the fourth quarter. John Salmons added 20 points and Ersan Ilyasova had 17 points and 11 rebounds.

description.hltext_display: Clint Small move OK’d
description.author: John J. Hopkins
description.content:
— — It’s official. The Tonawanda City School Board wants to build a new Clint Small Stadium on the grounds at Tonawanda High School.
Superintendent Whitney Vantine was directed Tuesday by the board to proceed with Phase I of a capital improvement project which includes relocating the stadium along with building modifications to the middle/high school complex.
The district also approved retaining Wendel Duchscherer Architects and Engineers to serve as the architect for Phase I. Wendel Duchscherer was one of four firms that offered their design concepts to the board at an October meeting.
Vantine will now work to secure a contract with Wendel Duchscherer for their services.
Both measures passed by a 5-1 vote with board member Jackie Smilinich casting the only vote against the project.
Joe Giarizzo, administrator for business and financial services, told the board before the vote that Tuesday’s action was only the beginning. There will be many steps to take after Wendel Duchscherer is retained.
“There are still a lot of questions to be answered,” Giarizzo said. “Turf or natural grass? What do you want with the band rooms? You will have to decide on an ultimate dollar amount and then go to the public with a referendum.”
Giarizzo suggested the district host regular meetings “right up to the referendum” as board members decide what is ultimately desired.
Board President Sharon Stuart said there was no one point at which the board decided to tab Wendel Duchscherer.
“They incorporated Tonawanda tradition wit the ticket booth and the memorial wall,” Stuart said, “and they had a great design for the music and art wing.”
“They captured what we were looking for,” Vantine said, adding Rainbow Transportation Services, which provides busing for students, gave high marks to Wendel Duchscherer’s redesign of the high school bus loop.
Both Stuart and Vantine said the district wants the facilities, when they are completed, to be accessible to the public as much as possible.
“This is not just for the district,” Vantine said. “We know our facilities are for the community.”
In another matter, students at the district’s three elementary schools are bringing home letters from their principals today, alerting parents to a strep throat outbreak.
Robert Breidenstein, assistant superintendent for pupil personnel services, said the number of absences at Fletcher, Mullen and Riverview elementary schools has been on the rise since Thanksgiving recess.
“Right now we’re still monitoring it,” Breidenstein said. “It seems to be localized at Riverview.”
Breidenstein said he’s discussed the situation with Erie County health officials, who have advised the district to continue with classes as scheduled and to encourage good hygiene, such as hand washing and covering the mouth when sneezing, because the bacteria can be picked up from door knobs and other surfaces.
Breidenstein thanked
Strep throat is a bacterial infection spread by person-to-person contact with nasal secretions or saliva. According to mayoclinic.com, It is most common in children between the ages of 5 and 15.
Although letters are only being delivered from the elementary schools, Breidenstein said information will be shared with the middle and high school administrators so that they may take preventative measures.

Autor: Adi Dobre
Fußball-Club Gelsenkirchen-Schalke 04 şi Turn- und Sportgemeinschaft 1899 Hoffenheim e.V. sunt primele două sfert-finaliste ale Cupei Germaniei (DFB-Pokal) ediţia 2010-2011.
Schalke 04 şi Hoffenheim s-au calificat aseară în sferturile de finală ale Cupei Germaniei la fotbal. Schalke a învins în deplasare, scor 1-0, divizionara secundă FC Augsburg.
Internaţionalul român Ciprian Deac, fotbalistul echipei Schalke 04 nu a făcut deplasarea la Augsburg.

description.hltext_display: 7 Nederlandse fondsen op kooplijst 2011 van KBC
description.content:
KBC Securities heeft de lijst met favoriete aandelen voor de Benelux voor 2011 gepubliceerd.
Klik verder voor de favorieten van KBC en de motivatie achter het advies
Favorieten
Aalberts, Akzo Nobel, DSM, Heineken, Imtech, ING en Randstad zijn de Nederlandse fondsen op de lijst. Aalberts Bij Aalberts geloven de analisten in een voorspoedig 2011, na het sterke herstel in 2010. Nieuwe overnames kunnen het aandeel extra ondersteunen.
AkzoNobel
Bij Akzo Nobel noemt KBC de sterke aanwezigheid in opkomende markten een positief punt. Daarnaast wordt het aandeel ten opzichte van sectorgenoten ondergewaardeerd.
DSM
Ook DSM wordt ondergewaardeerd, stellen de analisten, die het fonds verder prijzen vanwege de succesvolle focus op Life and Materials Sciences en de sterke balans.
Heineken
Bij Heineken ziet KBC sterk potentieel voor winstverbetering, terwijl Imtech zou moeten blijven profiteren van de technologische kennis en de focus op energiebesparing.
ING
ING moet begin 2011 klaar zijn met de voorbereidingen op een succesvolle desinvestering van de verzekeringsactiviteiten en analisten stellen tenslotte dat de markt de marktpositie van Randstad onderschat.

description.hltext_display: 上海住宅の平均価格が、２．３万元を再び超える
Venezuela Imposes Broadcast Media Clamp On Internet
description.content: CARACAS, Dec 22 (BERNAMA-NNN-MERCOPRESS) -- Venezuela's lawmakers have imposed broadcast-type regulations on the Internet barring some types of online messages under measures that opponents say are a threat to freedom of speech. President Hugo Chavez's allies in the National Assembly approved the revised Social Responsibility Law which extends rules for broadcast media to the internet. The law prohibits messages and images that "disrespect public authorities", ''incite or promote hatred" or crimes, or could create "anxiety in the citizenry or alter public order". It also says electronic media must establish procedures to "allow the restricting, without delay" of content deemed objectionable. Those breaking the rules may be punished with fines, though questions remain about how enforcement will be carried out. The body also gave final approval to a revised telecommunications law that declares radio and television airwaves to be "of public service and interest" and expands the executive branch's power to control the sector. The measure changes the duration of broadcast licences from 20 to 15 years and gives the government the power to pull the licence of any broadcaster that is found to have violated the law on more than one occasion. That could threaten the licence of the country's last stridently anti-Chavez television channel, Globovision, which has at least six such cases pending against it. Chavez opponents and press freedom groups have strongly criticised the laws, saying they are more in a line of legal changes that they fear could be used to clamp down on freedoms. Chavez has defended the internet law saying it is intended to help protect citizens against online crimes. "We aren't eliminating the internet here ... nor censoring the internet," Chavez said. "What we're doing is protecting ourselves against crimes, cybercrimes". -- BERNAMA-NNN-MERCOPRESS

event_or_fact.property: We aren't eliminating the internet here ... nor censoring the internet; What we're doing is protecting ourselves against crimes, cybercrimes

description.hltext_display: Christmas tree season makes way for fireworks sales
description.author: Bobbie J. Clark
description.content:
Christmas may only be a few days away, but people were still buying Christmas trees on the Sunday before the big day. Charlie Gledhill, manager of Reed's Trees on East 70th Street in Shreveport, said sales were down about 10 percent this year compared to last.
"The economy made it a little tight for some folks," Gledhill said. "We also had a lot more competition."
Most of the trees at Reed's come from Oregon, the nation's biggest producer of Christmas trees. However, Gledhill said they get their firs from North Carolina.
Oregon is the nation's biggest producer of Christmas trees, harvesting about 7.8 million annually and supporting an industry with a value of $110 million.
Overall, the top destination continues to be California, with about half of the 2009 sales going to that state. Mexico is the state's biggest foreign customer of trees. Trees are also trucked to many other states in the United States and to several Pacific Rim countries, with deliveries beginning early in November.
Considered a farm crop, trees need six to nine years to reach a harvestable size, depending on the species and the height required. Trees that are grown locally are Douglas fir, grand fir, noble fir, Nordmann fir, blue spruce, Scotch pine, Frazier fir and concolor fir. Douglas and noble firs account for 92 percent of all tree sales in Oregon.
Reed's Trees has 10 locations across the Shreveport-Bossier City area.
Now that Christmas tree season is over, all those locations have transformed to Uncle Sam's Fireworks.
As the last 11 trees sat under the tent on East 70th Street, waiting for a home Sunday, Angel Nuckolls and some workers were setting up tables and unloading a trailer full of fireworks.
Nuckolls is the manager of the Uncle Sam's location on East 70th Street. Her father, Wayne Reed, is the owner of Uncle Sam's.
She said she expects to have a good fireworks season, especially considering New Year's Eve falls on a Friday this year.
"As long as the weather is good," she said, "it's going to be a great season."

description.hltext_display: Firmenkonkurse nur wegen Gesetzesänderung auf Rekordniveau
description.author: redaktion@handelszeitung.ch
description.content:
Die fast leere Fabrikhalle einer Firma, die Konkurs anmelden musste (Archiv)
Keystone
Die Zahl der Firmenpleiten in der Schweiz hat im November um 24,3 Prozent auf 553 zugenommen. Für das ganze Jahr zeichnet sich ein Rekord von rund 6300 Konkurseröffnungen ab. Die Zunahme um 15,8 Prozent geht aber zu einem grossen Teil nicht auf Insolvenzen zurück.
Denn seit Anfang 2008 können die Handelsregisterämter nach einer Änderung des Obligationenrechts (Art. 731b) bei so genannten Karteileichen die Auflösung via Konkursverfahren veranlassen, wie die Gläubigervereinigung Creditreform in einem Communiqué vom Mittwoch festhält.
Allerdings gibt es statistische Probleme: Die Konkursgerichte liefern nämlich nicht immer den Hinweis, dass es sich nicht um eine Insolvenz im eigentlichen Sinn handelt, sondern um eine Liquidation wegen Organisationsmängeln.
Von den publizierten Konkursen ist rund ein Viertel erkennbar auf Löschung gemäss Art. 731b zurückzuführen. Hinzu kommt eine Dunkelziffer. Diese Unternehmen seien zwar grösstenteils bereits inaktiv gewesen, und ein Verlust von Arbeitsplätzen dürfte nicht Folge davon gewesen sein, schreibt Creditreform. Allerdings hätten einige dieser Firmen einen Schuldenberg hinterlassen.
Bei Insolvenzen kein Rekord
Creditreform geht davon aus, dass 2009 wegen Insolvenz rund 3600 Firmen Konkurs anmelden mussten. Im laufenden Jahr dürften es wegen Spätfolgen der Finanzkrise rund 3900 werden, ein Anstieg um gut 8 Prozent. Allerdings war die Zahl in den Jahren 2002 bis 2007 höher gewesen.
Klarer ist die Lage bei Neueintragungen vom Firmen im Handelsregister. Diese Einträge nahmen im Zuge der Wirtschaftserholung im November um 8 Prozent zu auf 3197. Seit Anfang Jahr beträgt das Wachstum 5,9 Prozent auf 33'563.
Bei den Privatkonkursen resultierte in den ersten elf Monaten 2010 gegenüber der Vorjahresperiode eine Abnahme um 0,5 Prozent auf 5223. Während die Zahl in der Region Zürich um 7,5 Prozent abnahm, gab es am anderen Ende in der Nordwestschweiz eine Zunahme um 15,5 Prozent. Im November nahmen die Privatkonkurse schweizweit um 12,1 Prozent auf 509 zu.

description.hltext_display: The Big Give: Part III
description.content:
About Michaelle LeManne
Calgary City Editor Michaelle LeManne believes that every writer has to have a bit of an ego to think that others truly care about what they have to say. She promises to keep hers in check however, and simply tell it how she sees it out in the wild west.
christmas giving Calgary, canada (Dec.22.10)
While Calgary is a city of plenty, there are still many families that go without. While giving throughout the year is always a good idea, the over sentimentality of the holiday season just makes you want to share your (relative) good fortune with others.
So just like last year, (and the year before) I sought out the help of the Calgary Immigrant Educational Society, to see if there was a student in need of our help.
I was directed to Agnes, a Ugandan immigrant, and single mother to four girls ages 4, 6, 8, and 10.
Their needs were sizeable, as was to be expected given the circumstances. But the wants were modest.
Four-year-old Monica wanted a doll, while eight-year-old Priscilla wanted a brown teddy bear—‘a girl one’. Ten-year-old Amy wanted a tea set, and six-year-old Isabella just wanted a toy.
Mom Agnes asked for nothing, as much as I tried to pry some kind of wish list item from her. I later found out from one of her teachers that she needed winter clothes.
So the call for help went out to colleagues, family and friends, who once again made me smile with their generosity and thoughtfulness. Not only were all wish list items taken care of and then some, all of the girls (and mom) were outfitted with brand new winter boots, jackets and snow pants. Clothes, toys, game systems, books, food, toiletries and dishes were amassed, as was $725 in cash and grocery store gift cards.
Going over to Agnes’s apartment to deliver Santa’s goodies tonight was once again a lesson in humility, and just how much happiness can be brought to an entire family when a few people pull together.
While the kids unloaded present after present under their tree (it was explained that Santa made an early stop because he was busier than usual this year), Agnes stood back and watched her girls. She turned to me, gave me a heartfelt hug, and thanked me for making her girls so happy.
I share that hug with my amazing circle of family, friends, and colleagues, who once again warmed my heart with their willingness to help. And I share it with anyone and everyone who knows the simple joy that comes with giving, and putting a smile on someone else’s face.
Merry Christmas to you all.
Tags: cal gal, city living
Sweet Insider Comments:
Login Here
Share This
Previous Articles:
Holiday in the City
Checking it Twice
Girls Just Wanna Have Fun

description.hltext_display: Set up your new computer safely and securely
description.content:
Next Page 1 | 2 Previous Page Don't you love that new computer smell? To be sure you and your computer get off to a good start, proper set up is key. Before you put a new Mac or Windows machine online, there's work to do. Otherwise, your new computer could become loaded with viruses and malware in a matter of minutes. You can find links to free security software and other programs mentioned at www.komando.com/news. WindowsStart by unpacking the computer and connecting the keyboard, mouse and monitor. A quick-start guide likely came with the computer. It will help you connect everything properly. Plug the computer into a surge suppressor or uninterruptible power supply (UPS).
Next, turn on the computer and follow the set up wizard. It will help you establish your user account and connect to the Internet. You may need additional user accounts. Click Start, then Control Panel and double-click User Accounts. Click "Manage another account." Click "Create a new account" and follow the prompts.
Before hopping online, install security software. I recommend downloading a firewall and an antivirus program from a different computer, if you have another machine. Install them on the new machine and update the programs. Then, go online and download two or more anti-spyware programs.
If you can't use a different computer, use the included security software. The built-in Windows firewall is turned on by default. A trial antivirus program is probably also installed. You can then go online to download free software, including a better firewall.
Next, run Windows Update. Click Start and enter "Windows Update" (minus quotes) in the Search box. Click "Check for updates." Install critical updates at the minimum. From the Windows Update options, you can also set up automatic updates. Click "Change settings" and specify your options.
You'll also want to remove preinstalled trial programs using the free software program CCleaner. Finally, move your data from the old machine to the new machine and install your software. Use an external drive or online backup service to move the data. You'll need your installation discs for the software.(2 of 2)Macs
Set up is much easier for Macs. Just remove the computer from the box. Attach the keyboard, mouse and monitor. Plug it in to a surge suppressor or UPS and turn it on. You're done! OK, things aren't quite so simple. There are a few other things to do. When you turn on your new Mac, Setup Assistant starts. This will help you set up your Internet and e-mail accounts. It will help you set up a user account. It will even help you transfer data from an old Mac. Just follow the prompts.
Next, check for software updates. Click the Apple logo and then System Preferences. Select Software Update. You'll find options for setting up automatic updates. You'll can also check for updates immediately.
Despite popular belief, Macs need security software. OS X includes a firewall, but it is disabled by default. To turn it on, click the Apple logo and select System Preferences. Click Security and then Firewall. Click the padlock and enter your password. Then click the Start button.
You'll also want an antivirus program. I recommend ClamXav or Sophos Anti-Virus for Mac Home Edition. Some programs may not have transferred from your old Mac. In that case, use your installation discs.
If you're switching from Windows, there's one more thing you may want to do. Set up Boot Camp. This allows you to install a Windows partition on your Mac. You can then run most Windows programs on your Mac.
You'll need a copy of Windows to set up Boot Camp. Installation takes a little work. There's not enough room for me to tell you how here, but you'll find complete, step-by-step instructions at www.komando.com/news.
Kim Komando can be contacted at C1Tech@

description.hltext_display: Honed for the holidays
description.content:
Judith Norton gets things done. Where others see quandaries, she envisions creative solutions. If a task requires endless energy, that's never a problem.
Before the holiday season last year, her Weight Watchers group was developing strategies to avoid packing on pounds at parties.
Norton, an accomplished cook and a senior corporate trainer, thought it would be a great if members had a collection of healthy recipes that could be used for holiday entertaining. To make sure everyone understood how delicious and easy-to-make the recipes she had chosen were, she invited them to her home for a cooking party.
A sign-up list for ingredients was circulated at the meeting, so everyone contributed to the cost of the event. And when they showed up, all the components for each dish were ready at work stations in her home.
I wrangled an invitation to this year's cookathon, what she calls the second "healthful cooking adventure."
Twenty participants showed up. They divided into groups and set out to tackle 12 recipes.
"This close-knit group has been together for over two years, and they are really unique. They are so supportive of one another, and they interact so well," said Lorraine Clausen, the Weight Watchers leader of Norton's group, which meets in Long Beach. "The event shows that you can give a party and not overdo."
Joining the faction in the kitchen, I watched as Norton gave a quick tutorial on poaching salmon. She explained that she uses a turkey roasting pan that has a lid because she doesn't like to buy specialized pieces of equipment if she already owns something that works.
"Everyone thinks it's difficult to poach salmon, but it is so easy," she said, lopping off a small portion of tail end and wrapping the skin-off salmon fillet in a double layer of cheesecloth (creating handles with excess cheesecloth on both ends). She lowered the fish into the roaster, submerging it in a mixture of water, white wine and fresh dill. She placed the pan over two burners and put on the lid. She turned the burners on high and set a timer for 12 minutes.
"If it isn't cooked after 12 minutes, you can always return it to the pan and cook it some more," she said.
Without missing a beat, she removed cold poached salmon from the refrigerator. It had some fissures in it, but she instructed the team to fill those in with sauce and adorn with garnishes. She assured them it would look gorgeous.
Judy Gesicki, Veronica Espinoza and Pat Norton joined Clausen to make two slathering sauces as well as thinly slicing cucumbers and limes to use as garnish.
Another team was making cold avocado soup to be served in shot glasses. Another made flatbread atop strips of thin lavash. Yet another made beet-boosted hummus and red pepper dip to be served with toasted pita triangles.
Soup-makers Lupe Hemauer and Cheryl Carter took advice from Peggy Giavanti and added more coconut milk. Hummus-makers Kris Margetts and Angie Ocheltree pureed, sampled and seasoned. Ocheltree told me she has lost 107 pounds in the Weight Watchers program.
Mary Holzgang and her team assembled flatbreads at a station that was popular; everyone seemed to stop by to put their signature on these tasty appetizers.
Soon the flatbreads were out of the oven. Piping hot, the cheese had melted around the figs and melded with caramelized onion. The scent was divine.
Everyone sampled, then moved on to create more dishes: coconut shrimp, goat cheese with spicy peach sauce, some skewered chicken with satay sauce and a salad with fuyu persimmon, jicama and mango. Plus, a lemony dessert with angel food cake.
The dessert group looked puzzled. They didn't have a recipe, just a tray with ingredients. Norton explained that the dish was so simple, no recipe was required. She told them she had seen Giada De Laurentiis do a similar dish on TV. But instead of making a lemon sponge cake from scratch, Giada-style, they were going to use store-bought angel food.
After they cut the cake into cubes, Norton added nonfat Greek yogurt, lemon zest and juice and agave syrup to taste. Nothing was measured — she simply added, tasted and added more as needed. I sampled. It had an irresistible tart, lemon pie kind of flavor.
Spooned into shot glasses, each dessert was garnished with a little whipped cream.
The team arranged the buffet on a huge table, where the group squeezed in for a photograph.
"We're all so thin from Weight Watchers, that's why we can fit behind this table," Giavanti said with a giggle.
Soon their plates held the fruits of their labor, a glorious assortment of holiday fare.
Me? I was eating from a rubber spatula, cleaning the bowl that held the remnants of that lemony dessert.
Probably wrong, but I couldn't help it.
JUDITH'S POACHED SALMON
Yield: eight to 10 servings as part of a buffet
Cheesecloth
1 skinless salmon fillet, left whole (about 3 pounds)
2 cups dry white wine
2 sprigs fresh dill
For yogurt topping and side sauce:
4 cups nonfat, Greek-style yogurt
2 to 3 tablespoons minced fresh dill
1 garlic clove, minced
1 green onion, minced, using half of dark green stalk
Salt, to taste
1 hothouse (English) cucumber, unpeeled, thinly sliced
2 tablespoons drained capers
Optional garnish: sprigs of Italian parsley or cilantro
Procedure
Double a large piece of cheesecloth. It should be big enough to enclose the salmon, with enough left over on each end (about 6 inches on both sides) to serve as a handle. Wrap salmon in cheesecloth.
In a large, deep pan, such as a turkey roasting pan with a lid, place 2 inches of water, the wine and dill. Add salmon, pulling the excess cheesecloth on both ends to come up and over the side of the deep pan (the cheesecloth should hang over the side just long enough to form a handle, but not so long that it might catch fire). Cover pan.
Turn heat to high and set timer for 12 minutes. If it starts to boil over, reduce heat to medium, or partially uncover pan.
Turn off heat and check for doneness. Salmon should be uniformly opaque. If not, cover and cook on low for a few additional minutes.
When salmon is done, remove from seasoned water using the ends of the cheesecloth as handles. Place on the serving dish — cheesecloth and all. Open cheesecloth and place a cookie sheet on top of salmon. Invert to turn fish, remove cheesecloth from fish, place serving dish on top and turn fish over again. Place plastic wrap on salmon and chill until ready to decorate.
Just before serving, combine yogurt, dill, garlic and green onion in a small bowl. Spread mixture in a thin layer over top and sides of fish. Top with cucumber slices, overlapping them to look like fish scales. Garnish with sprigs of Italian parsley or cilantro. Add capers to remaining yogurt mixture in bowl; stir to combine. Serve on the side as a sauce for optional topping.
Source: Judith Norton
• • •
Or, rather than using the yogurt sauce, you can top the poached salmon with this mustard sauce.
MUSTARD SAUCE
1⁄2 cup Dijon mustard
3 tablespoons honey
1 tablespoon light-brown sugar
3 tablespoons rice-wine vinegar or cider vinegar
1 teaspoon soy sauce
Few dashes Tabasco sauce
1⁄4 teaspoon kosher salt
1⁄4 teaspoon freshly ground black pepper
Procedure
Whisk together all ingredients in a bowl; cover and refrigerate for at least one hour, or up to 24 hours. The longer the sauce sits in the refrigerator, the better the flavor becomes. Bring to room temperature before using.
Source: parade.com
GOLDEN HUMMUS
Yield: about six to eight servings
1 large golden beet (or 2 medium), baked, peeled, sliced
1 (15-ounce) can garbanzo beans, drained, rinsed
2 tablespoons plain nonfat yogurt, Greek-style preferred
2 tablespoons fresh lemon juice
1 tablespoon tahini
1 teaspoon ground cumin
For serving: toasted pita triangles
Procedure
In a food processor fitted with the metal blade, combine beet(s) and garbanzo beans; process until smooth. Add yogurt, juice, tahini and cumin; process until smooth. Taste and adjust seasoning as needed. Serve as a dip accompanied with toasted pita triangles.
Source: "Melissa's Everyday Cooking with Organic Produce" by Cathy Thomas (Wiley, $29.95)
GOAT CHEESE WITH SPICY PEACH SAUCE
No formal recipe here. Log-style goat cheese was cut into 1⁄4-inch slices (use dental floss to cut it and place the slices on a platter, slightly overlapping). Jam made by participants Ocheltree and Sandra de la Fuente was spooned over the top. Melissa's brand Organic Chili Seasoning was ground over the top; it's a storebought grinder filled with dried red chilies, black pepper, paprika and ginger (sold at melissas.com).
Norton suggested that a substitute for the homemade jam could be Trader Joe's Organic Reduced Sugar Apricot Preserves mixed with some drained crushed pineapple. Accompany dish with crackers or thinly sliced baguette.
FLATBREAD WITH CARAMELIZED ONION, FIG AND FONTINA CHEESE
Yield: 24 servings
2 medium-size brown- or yellow-skinned onions, sliced
Olive oil
Salt, to taste
2 sheets of lavash (9- by 12-inch), such as Trader Joe's lavash
8 fresh figs, cut into crosswise slices about 1⁄4-inch thick
4 to 6 thin slices of Fontina cheese, torn into very small pieces
Procedure
Caramelize the onions: Generously spray a medium-size deep skillet with olive oil spray, or pour in a little oil in skillet and distribute it over surface using a paper towel. Heat over medium-high heat. Add onion slices and stir to coat with a little oil.
When onions start to brown, reduce heat to medium low. Spread the onions out evenly over the pan and let cook, stirring occasionally. After 10 minutes, sprinkle some salt over the onions. Allow to cook until richly browned. (Stir when they stick to the pan, allowing them to brown a little first, but stir them before they burn). Remove from heat.
Preheat oven to 400 degrees.
Cut each sheet of lavash into 3-inch wide, elongated rectangles. If lavash is 9 by 12 inches (such as Trader Joe's), cut it into thirds to make three 3- by 12-inch pieces. Spray rimmed baking sheets with nonstick olive oil spray. Top each lavash with caramelized onion, fig slices and a little Fontina. Drizzle with a smidgen of olive oil.
Bake in preheated oven until lavash is crisp and cheese melts. Cut each into 2-inch long pieces and serve.
COCONUT SHRIMP
Yield: 24 medium shrimp
Nonstick cooking spray
6 tablespoons flaked unsweetened coconut
1⁄4 cup panko (Japanese bread crumbs)
2 tablespoons all-purpose flour
1⁄2 teaspoon salt
4 large egg whites
24 medium shrimp (about 1⁄2 pound) peeled with tails left on, deveined, butterflied and patted dry
Procedure
Preheat oven to 450 degrees. Spray baking sheet with nonstick spray.
Combine coconut, panko, flour and salt on piece of wax paper. Beat egg whites in large bowl until frothy; add shrimp to egg whites and toss to coat. Lift shrimp from egg whites one at a time, letting excess drip back into bowl; coat with coconut mixture, pressing gently to help it adhere. Place shrimp in single layer on baking sheet. Spray shrimp lightly with nonstick spray. Bake until golden outside and opaque inside, eight to 10 minutes.
Source: "Weight Watchers Healthy & Happy Celebrations"
ROASTED RED PEPPER DIP
Yield: 1 to 1-1⁄2 cups
2 large red peppers, roasted, peeled, seeded
2 teaspoons tomato paste
2 teaspoons balsamic vinegar
1 garlic clove, crushed
1⁄8 teaspoons ground cayenne
Cook's notes: Buy roasted bell peppers in a jar. Or to roast peppers at home, adjust oven rack to about 6 to 8 inches below broiler element. Line a baking sheet with foil and arrange peppers on baking sheet. Broil, turning with tongs as each side chars. Remove from oven. Pull up sides of foil to enclose peppers; let sit five minutes, then open foil. When cool enough to handle, peel and seed, reserving juices from peppers.
Procedure
In a food processor, purée the peppers, tomato paste, vinegar, garlic and cayenne until almost smooth. Add enough of the reserved juice from the peppers to make a dippable consistency. Serve with toasted pita triangles and hummus.
Source: adapted from "Weight Watchers New Complete Cookbook" (Wiley, $29.95)
SKEWERED CHICKEN WITH SATAY SAUCE
Yield: 15 servings
Bamboo skewers
15 chicken tenders
Nonstick spray
For satay sauce:
1 tablespoon soy sauce
2 tablespoon reduced-fat peanut butter
2 tablespoons honey
1 tablespoon molasses
1 tablespoon lemon juice
1 tablespoon chopped fresh ginger
1 tablespoon finely chopped Serrano chili
3 cloves garlic, minced
1⁄2 teaspoon Asian sesame oil
Procedure
Soak 15 bamboo skewers in water to cover for 20 to 30 minutes.
Meanwhile, prepare satay sauce. Place all sauce ingredients in blender and whirl until pureed. Taste and adjust seasoning if desired.
Preheat barbecue. Thread chicken on skewers. Spray skewers lightly with nonstick spray. Grill on both sides until cooked through and lightly caramelized on exterior. Place on serving platter and drizzle with satay sauce.
Source: "1,001 Low-fat Vegetarian Recipes" by Sue Spitler (Surrey, $19.95)

description.hltext_display: Wells done
description.content:
University of New Mexico receivers coach Matt Wells left the Lobos to become the quarterbacks coach at Utah State. Wells played quarterback at Utah State from 1993-1996.
Wells returns to Utah State after coaching at New Mexico, where he coached the wide receivers and kick off return unit last season. In 2009, Wells was the quarterbacks coach and passing game coordinator at Louisville. In 2007 and 2008, Wells was New Mexico's wide receivers coach and recruiting coordinator, coaching alongside current USU offensive coordinator Dave Baldwin and current Aggie offensive line coach T.J. Woods with the Lobos.
If you're counting at home, UNM head coach Mike Locksley will have new offensive & defensive coordinators, a new offensive line coach and a new special teams coach next season.

description.hltext_display: Komando's Q&A: Get a GPS on the cheap
description.content:
Question: I'm looking for a good inexpensive GPS unit. What would you recommend? Answer: GPS units are much less expensive these days. Prices start around $70. Any of them will work well. Just choose one that speaks street names. That way you can keep your eyes on the road. More expensive units have additional features like real-time traffic and multi-destination route optimization. They can also have free map updates and photo or music playback. The Garmin Nuvi 295 ($90) and Nuvi 1350 ($140) are good choices. Your choice will depend on your budget. Smart phones can also be used as GPS units. You just need a navigation app. They work well, and it's one less thing to carry. Smart phones running the latest version of Google's Android operating system include Google's free navigation app.
Q: I'm having family over for Christmas. How can I keep them from messing up Windows my computer?
A: The best thing to do is to create a Guest account. Do this by clicking Start, then Control Panel, and then User Accounts. Click "Manage another account." Click Guest and then click the Turn on button. Additionally, make sure you password-protect your main account. In the User Accounts panel, click "Create a password for your account." Enter and confirm the password. Create a password hint. Then click the "Create password" button. Finally, make sure your security software is up to date. Even with a limited account, guests can still download viruses.
E-mail questions to Komando@C1Tech@gannett.com.

description.hltext_display: Koran of Bijbel?
Aktivismus zahlt sich nicht aus
description.author: redaktion@handelszeitung.ch
description.content: Die Weltwirtschaft verzeichnete im laufenden Jahr ein robustes Wachstum, wobei es jedoch erhebliche regionale Unterschiede gab. 2011 könnte es zu einer ähnlichen Entwicklung kommen. So rechnet die Mehrzahl der Marktteilnehmer mit einer anhaltenden globalen Konjunkturerholung. Davon geht auch die Credit Suisse aus, trotz einer erhöhten Wahrscheinlichkeit von Kreditausfällen in der Euro-Zone. Allerdings gehen die Meinungen verschiedener Experten und Akteure an den Kapitalmärkten auf der zeitlichen...

description.hltext_display: 2011 looks positive for north La.
description.content:
Tis the season when people reflect on the past year and look ahead to the coming year. During a recent state meeting of regional economic development organizations, the discussion turned to Louisiana's economic outlook for 2011. The good news is everyone was convinced Louisiana will experience more economic opportunities and a stronger economy next year. While most economic developers across the nation found this to be a challenging year, 2010 was not a bad year for north Louisiana. As our staff and partners continue to work with companies in determining their potential plans, 2010 has turned out to be more positive than we first thought. Currently, NLEP is working with more existing companies than new businesses in the region. Typically, existing companies generate more jobs over time than new firms.
From an impact standpoint, the companies that received assistance from NLEP and its partners expect to create or retain an estimated 1,400 jobs and to invest a projected $127.7 million in the coming years.
Our area's housing market received confirmation once again that it performed among the best in the nation. Louisiana received higher rankings for its business and economic development initiatives. Most recently, Louisiana was named the ninth best business climate in 2010 by Site Selection magazine. This is the first top 10 placement for the state. Barksdale Air Force is growing due to the decision to locate the Air Force's Global Strike Command in Bossier City. Haynesville Shale activity continues to bolster the oil and gas sector. CenturyLink is moving toward completing its acquisition initiatives and adding more jobs at its Monroe headquarters. Next Autoworks remains in the hunt for its funding to manufacture an innovative car in north Louisiana.
While I am bullish on 2011, we should remember to celebrate the accomplishments of 2010 and all the assets our region has to offer. As we take time to enjoy the holidays, let us reflect on and be thankful for our good fortune in 2010 while looking forward to a very positive 2011.
Kurt Foreman is the president of the North Louisiana Economic Partnership. To contact him, call (318) 677-2536.

description.hltext_display: Das Wachstumsdreieck der Zukunft
description.author: redaktion@handelszeitung.ch
description.content: Asien geht als Gewinner aus der Finanzkrise 2008 hervor. Dank einer lockeren Geldpolitik, niedrigem Verschuldungsgrad und anhaltend hohen Investitionen und Konsumausgaben konnte die Unsicherheit an den Märkten rasch überwunden werden. Insbesondere China, Indien und Indonesien avancieren zunehmend zum Rückgrat der aufstrebenden Wirtschaftsregion Asien: Bereits heute entspricht die wirtschaftliche Aktivität in «Chindonesien» 47 Prozent der US-Wirtschaftsleistung. Die Unternehmen der drei Länder...

description.hltext_display: «Wir wollen in der Schweiz wachsen»
description.author: redaktion@handelszeitung.ch
description.content: Tiefes Wachstum und hohe Verschuldung in den Industrieländern machten 2010 die Schwellenländer zu den grossen Hoffnungsträgern der Anleger. Laufen wir hier 2011 in eine Emerging Markets Bubble? Heinz B. Rothacher: Emerging Markets bieten auch weiterhin die besseren Wachstumsaussichten als die westlichen Industrieländer. Das wird die Aktienkurse positiv beeinflussen, und zu den Kapitalgewinnen kommt die Aussicht auf Währungsgewinne der Schwellenländerwährungen. Aber auch über das Jahr 2011 hinaus...

description.hltext_display: Emisná kauza pokračuje
description.content:
Zdroj: Plus JEDEN DEŇ/ ib 22. december 2010, 08:00
Zdroj: MARTIN RINČO József Nagy
Podobné stránky
Minister životného prostredia József Nagy včera podal trestné oznámenie na predstaviteľov garážovej firmy Interblue Group. Kauzu, ktorá vypukla ešte v roku 2009, vyšetruje už polícia aj švajčiarski a americkí vyšetrovatelia.
Nagy sa tak rozhodol po stretnutí so špeciálnym prokurátorom. V súčasnosti prebieha konanie voči neznámemu páchateľovi za poškodenie Slovenska za nevýhodný predaj emisných kvót. Podanie prišlo týždeň po tom, čo minister vzdal boj o 15 miliónov eur od Interblue v obchodnom spore. Ten teraz presunul do trestnoprávnej roviny .
V minulosti podali trestné oznámenia poslanci za SDKÚ. Ministerstvo pod vedením nominanta SNS podľa nich totiž nevyužilo všetky právne možnosti, aby zrušilo nevýhodnú zmluvu. V kauze podali vlani trestné oznámenie aj dvaja občania.

description.hltext_display: The Year in Reflection
description.content:
Vancouver City Editor May Globus is obsessed with the sartorial and all that surrounds it: art, design, culture, music and film. Oh, and she really likes writing about it, too. A left coast girl at heart, her Sweetspot finds just might show why the westside really is the best side.
the view from vancity: the year in reflection canada (Dec.22.10)
There's nothing quite like the holidays.
But it also gives us a chance to reflect on the last twelves months, remembering things that made the past year happy, inspiring, challenging and, hopefully, peppered with moments of clarity and growth.
Instead of making my final Sweetspot City Editor blog a personal retrospective, I'm turning it into a walk down memory lane with Vancouver, a city that warmly welcomed me back into its pristine arms in 2007, after a few years of masquerading as an Angeleno.
To say 2010 was a big year for Vancouver is an understatement. After all, we did host one of the world's biggest events last February: the Winter Olympics. And although those intense international lenses slightly shifted away post-Olympics, our west coast metropolis continued to morph and change into the kind of city we always knew it could be.
So without further ado, here are a few of what I believe were Vancouver's most significant moments this year.
To my family and friends, colleagues, strangers and you, my dear Sweetspot readers, I wish each of you the happiest of happy holidays. I also wish each of you much love, continued happiness and even more poignant moments that make you laugh, cry, smile and remember that life really is that sweet.
Winter Olympics 2010. Never have I seen this city so alive, brimming with vibrancy, arts, culture, acceptance and patriotism. When Canada won the men's hockey gold medal game, never have I seen such fierce national pride, a pride that rippled right across the country. I've also never seen so many people wear red mittens with white maple leafs all at once.
Eco Fashion Week. The city, in the past, has sadly been plagued with Fashion Weeks gone wrong. Then industry veteran and Montrealer-cum-Vancouverite Myriam Laroche made it her mission to host a well-run international Eco Fashion Week in Vancouver, a city that plans to be the greenest by 2020. Through her dedication and hard work, she got Gisele Bundchen to design an exclusive Sigg water bottle, Nobel Peace Prize winner Dr. Andrew Weaver to speak on global warming and a roster of highly-regarded green designers to show their newest collections. I can't wait to see what Laroche and her team bring to the table this coming February.
Street food carts. At first, there was Japadog. Then this year brought an onslaught of new food carts and trucks, thanks to a program approved by the city. Now we have Roaming Dragon, The Re-Up BBQ, Kimono Koi Crepes, Fresh Local Wild and more. Now that's your meals on wheels.
Major retail openings: Louis Vuitton Maison, The Bay's White Space and Joe Fresh. The Louis Vuitton Maison opening was the splashiest affair this town has ever seen—it also brought LV's male model of the moment (and Halle Berry's baby daddy) Gabriel Aubry to the bash. The Bay's White Space brought a killer shoe department and hip labels, like Paris-based Sandro. And the Joe Fresh store opening brought DJ Mia Moretti from New York to us, playing a set with her fiddling cohort Caitlin Moe. Oh, the clothes, shoes and accessories!
W2: Community Media Arts. Opening this past September and residing in the Woodwards Building, it's a spot for downtown eastside artists and residents (and everyone else interested) to come together for the sake of knowledge, arts, culture and media in the form of parties and shows (in the adjoining W2 Storyeum), readings and workshops. It's people like W2 leader Irwin Oostindie and his team—and other local bloggers and personalities like Bob Kronbauer of Vancouver Is Awesome and Rebecca Bollwit of Miss 604—that help shape the cultural personality of this city.
Tags: vancouver living

description.hltext_display: Gayus Siap Dengarkan Tuntutan Jaksa
description.content:
TERDAKWA Gayus Halomoan Partahanan Tambunan akan menjalani sidang dengan agenda tuntutan oleh Jaksa Penuntut Umum (JPU) di Pengadilan Negeri Jakarta Selatan, Rabu (22/12).
Salah satu kuasa hukum Gayus, Pia Akbar Nasution menyatakan kliennya dalam keadaan sehat untuk mendengarkan tuntutan JPU. "Hari ini, sidang tuntutan. Insya allah Gayus sehat kok," kata Pia melalui pesan singkatnya, Rabu (22/12).
Hakim ketua, Albertina Ho sebelumnya memberikan kesempatan dua pekan kepada JPU untuk menyiapkan tuntutannya. Pada sidang dua pekan lalu tersebut, kuasa hukum Gayus, Adnan Buyung Nasution menghadirkan saksi bidang administrasi negara, Bagir Manan.
Dalam sidang yang digelar perdana pada Rabu, 8 September 2010 di Pengadilan Negeri Jakarta Selatan ini, Gayus didakwa dengan empat perbuatan, yaitu kasus pajak PT Surya Alam Tunggal yang telah merugikan negara sebesar Rp570.952.000, kasus penyuapan penyidik kepolisian, kasus penyuapan hakim, dan didakwa tidak memberi keterangan atau memberi keterangan yang tidak benar untuk kepentingan penyidikan. Roswita Oktavianti

description.hltext_display: Hypotheekrente: lang vastleggen of niet?
description.content:
De rentetarieven voor langere looptijden zijn de afgelopen maanden behoorlijk opgelopen. Wat te doen als je nu voor de keuze staat voor het vastzetten van je hypotheek, vraagt RTL Z beurscommentator Hans de Geus zich af.
Kapitaalmarkt
''Het ijkpunt voor de banken bij het bepalen van de hypotheektarieven is de rente die de Staat der Nederlanden moet betalen voor de financiering van de tekorten'', aldus Hans de Geus. ''Die rente is de afgelopen weken scherp opgelopen, net als overigens de rente in Duitsland en de VS. De rente op Nederlandse tienjaars staatsleningen is in 3 maanden gestegen van 2,4% naar nu 3,3%.''
Hypotheekrente
''Het wordt dus steeds duurder om geld te lenen'', aldus Hans. ''De tienjaars hypotheekrente (aflossingsvrij) is opgelopen van 4,8% (op 20 september) naar 5,4% nu. Het zal voor mensen een lastige afweging zijn: de rente lang vastleggen of de hypotheekrente juist variabel houden.''
Rendement op 10-jarige Nederlandse staatsobligaties:

description.hltext_display: 玻璃门被砸 民警倾情协调
description.content:
廊坊新闻网讯（通讯员 张俊英 刘浩）11月17日上午10时许，大城县南赵扶派出所接110指挥中心称：冯庄村孙某家玻璃门被砸。该所民警迅速出警，经调查，今年8月28日大城县人民法院作出判决，让孙某每月给公公李某300元的赡养费，且规定今年后半年一次性给清。自判决下达后至今孙某一直未付钱，后李某多次到她孙某家索要赡养费，孙某未给。遂李某拿铁锤把儿媳孙某家门店玻璃门砸破。
民警了解事情的整个过程后，对孙某讲解了法律知识，并指出敬老爱老是中华民族的传统美德，要求孙某承担赡养老人的义务。经过多次的说服教育，在民警的主持下，孙某同意付清李某的赡养费1800元，后每年9月一次性给清，双方不在因此事发生纠纷。孙某同意在今后和公公和睦相处，尽职尽孝。双方对此调解都很满意。

description.hltext_display: Una dintre victimele exploziei de la Bacău, operată. Cauza incidentului - scurgeri de gaze
description.author: ana.zidarescu@evz.ro(Ana Zidărescu
description.content:
Un bărbat, rănit grav în urma exploziei într-un bloc din Bacău, a fost operat azi-noapte de la Spitalul de Urgenţă Floreasca, din Bucureşti.
O explozie puternică s-a produs ieri, într-un bloc din Bacău, din cauza unor scurgeri de gaze. Parterul şi primul etaj al unui bloc au fost complet distruse, iar apartamentele de pe scara blocului unde s-a produs deflagraţia nu va putea fi locuită o perioadă.
Trei persoane au fost rănite, dintre care una a suferit intoxicaţii cu fum. Alte două persoane au suferit arsuri, iar medicii din Bacău declarau ieri că starea lor era gravă. Un bărbat a fost transportat ieri la Spitalul de Urgenţă Floreasca, unde a fost supus unei intervenţii chirurgicale, anunţă Agerpres.
Doctorul Ioan Lascăr, şeful Clinicii de Chirurgie Plastică şi Reparatorie din cadrul spitalului, a declarat că victima prezenta la internare mai multe traumatisme. Acesta a mai adăugat că pacientului i-au fost toaletate arsurile. În acest moment, bărbatul se află la internat la secţia de Terapie Intensivă, sub atentă supraveghere.
Scurgerile de gaze au condus la producerea exploziei de la Bacău
Primele concluzii ale anchetei arată că explozia de ieri a avut loc în urma unei scurgeri de gaze din reţeaua de transport. Informaţia a fost oferită pentru mediafax.ro de prefectul judeţului Bacău, Constantin Scripăţ. Acesta a precizat că ancheta este în desfăşurare, dar aceasta pare să fie cauza producerii exploziei.
La început s-a mers pe două variante: defecţiuni la centrala termică din apartamentul în care s-a produs deflagraţia sau manipulare defectuoasă a centralei şi scurgeri de la reţeaua de gaze. Prefectul a declarat că prima ipoteză "a căzut".
"Cu toate că în acest stadiu incipient al anchetei nu se poate vorbi de o cauză certă a acumulării de gaze naturale, E.ON a decis să se implice în ajutorarea persoanelor afectate prin sprijinirea demersurilor medicale de urgenţă pentru cei afectaţi. Totodată, compania va acorda un sprijin financiar de urgenţă pentru a acoperi nevoile imediate ale persoanelor evacuate, acesta fiind un act umanitar şi fără vreo legătură cu rezultatele anchetei în curs", se precizează în comunicatul de presă transmis aseară de E ON Gaz.

description.content: Auf die Festtage hin werden die Handelsvolumen immer dünner unerwartete Kurssprünge sind aber dennoch nicht auszuschliessen: Für die Aktienbewegungen wie von Geisterhand wird ein Phänomen verantwortlich gemacht, das den Börsianern als «Window Dressing» geläufig ist. Um die Portefeuilles der Kunden auf den Jahresabschluss hin zu schönen, kaufen Vermögensverwalter gelegentlich im November und Dezember noch Aktien hinzu, die im Jahr gut performt haben. Dagegen werden Aktien mit schlechter Rendite...

description.hltext_display: 大城县举行“送温暖、献爱心”
description.content:
廊坊新闻网讯 （通讯员 王一 刘亮）为大力弘扬中华民族扶贫济困、团结友爱的传统美德，关爱困难群众，12月21日下午，大城县举行了“送温暖、献爱心”集中捐赠仪式。该县四大班子领导、各级各部门干部、职工和社会各界人士参加了捐赠仪式。
该活动号召全县各级各部门干部群众伸出援助之手，情系弱势群体，以热情、爱心帮助困难群众渡过难关，努力改善他们的生产生活条件，努力在全县创造稳定和谐的社会局面。自“送温暖、献爱心”捐助活动开展以来，大城县各级干部群众积极参与活动，以实际行动影响和带动干部职工和社会各界的积极参与，使活动顺利开展，在全县范围内掀起了一个向社会弱势群体奉献爱心的热潮。
截止目前，该县已捐款35万余元。
廊坊新闻网 - 大城县委县政府 22

description.hltext_display: Ditjen Pajak Perlu Dilibatkan Usut Gayus
description.content:
SATUAN Tugas (Satgas) Pemberantasan Mafia Hukum menyatakan bahwa Direktorat Jenderal (Ditjen) Pajak Kementerian Keuangan perlu digandeng dalam pengusutan kasus Gayus.
Data dan informasi dari Ditjen Pajak sangatlah dibutuhkan untuk membongkar kasus tersebut hingga tuntas. "Dalam kaitan mafia pajak penting untuk keterlibatan Ditjen Pajak," kata Sekretaris Satgas, Denny Indrayana usai pertemuan dengan Polri di gedung Mabes Polri, Selasa (21/12) malam.
Denny mengakui alat bukti dalam kasus Gayus ini sulit ditelusuri. Namun bukan berarti suap yang diduga diterima mantan pegawai Ditjen Pajak tersebut tidak bisa dibuktikan.
Ia berpendapat bahwa proses pembuktian dugaan tindak pidana suap yang dilakukan Gayus menjadi tantangan tersendiri bagi lembaga penegak hukum. "Suap bila tidak tertangkap tangan sangat sulit untuk diungkap. Apalagi dalam waktu yang sudah lama, tahun-tahun ke belakang," tandas Staf Khusus Presiden Bidang Hukum tersebut.
Kapolri Jenderal Polisi Timur Pradopo mengisyaratkan kemungkinan kerjasama dengan Ditjen Pajak dalam pengusutan kasus Gayus. Kerja sama tersebut untuk memudahkan perolehan data terkait skandal mafia pajak yang dilakukan eks pegawai eselon III itu. "Semua sudah punya kewenangan masing-masing. Artinya kita fokus kepada yang kita tangani. Hal-hal yang belum bisa kita temui itu bagian yang bisa dikerjasamakan," ujar Timur.
Anggota Satgas Yunus Hussein mengungkapkan bahwa aliran dana dalam kasus Gayus sulit untuk diungkap. Ketua Pusat Pelaporan Analisis dan Transaksi Keuangan itu menilai hanya pengakuan Gayus yang bisa membuat terang aliran dana yang diduga berasal dari perusahaan pengemplang pajak itu.
"Dananya ada yang di bank asing dan dalam negeri, campur-campur. Tidak semudah itu (dilacak), kecuali dia (Gayus) bercerita," imbuh Yunus. Melati Hasanah Elandis

description.hltext_display: ХИШГИЙН МӨНГИЙГ ЗӨВ ЗА� ЦУУЛАХЫГ ХҮСЛЭЭ
description.content:
УИХ-ын гишүүн С.Бямбацогт “Хүний хөгжил сан”-гаас бэлнээр олгож байгаа мөнгийг үр дүнтэй зарцуулах асуудлаар Ерөнхий сайдад асуулга тавив.
Уг асуулгад 2011 онд Монгол Улсын иргэн бүрт сар бүр 21 мянган төгрөгийг хувь, хишиг хэлбэрээр олгохоор тооцсон бөгөөд иргэд өөрсдийн санаачилгаар жижиг дунд үйлдвэрлэл эрхлэх болон бусад хөрөнгө оруулалтын хэлбэрээр авах тохиолдолд бэлэн бусаар бөөн дүнгээр нь олгохоор УИХ-аас шийдвэрлэлээ. Энэ нь иргэдийнхээ амьжиргааны түвшин, хишиг хувь олгосноор эдийн засагт үзүүлэх нөлөөлөл, улс орны цаашдын хөгжлийн бодлого зэргийг харгалзан үзсэн шийдвэр билээ.
Ажлын байр бий болгох, хөрөнгө оруулалтын зориулалтаар хувь, хишгээ зарцуулах хүсэлтэй иргэдээ дэмжиж, хамтарч бизнес эрхлэх боломжийг нь бүрдүүлэхэд онцгой анхаарч, 2011 онд олгохоор төлөвлөсөн 702,5 тэрбум төгрөгийг үр дүнтэй зарцуулах шаардлагатай байна.
Иймд УИХ-ын хуулийн 7 дугаар зүйлийн 1-ийн 13 дахь заалтыг үндэслэн асуулга тавьж байна.
1. 702,5 тэрбум төгрөгийг жижиг дунд бизнесийг дэмжих чиглэлээр олговол ойролцоогоор 200-гаад мянган ажлын байр бий болгох боломжтой гэсэн эдийн засгийн тооцоо байна.
2. Хувь хишгийг бэлэн бусаар бөөнд нь олгох асуудлыг хэдийд, ямар арга замаар, ямар субьектуудын оролцоотойгоор, хэрхэн шийдвэрлэх гэж байгаа талаар дэлгэрэнгүй мэдээлэл өгнө үү.
3. Монгол Улсад үйлдвэрлэл хөгжүүлэх төлөвлөлт, тооцоо судалгааг нарийвчлан гаргаж, үйлдвэрлэлийн ямар салбарыг хөгжүүлэх, хэдэн ажлын байр бий болгох, хөрөнгө санхүүжилтын асуудлыг хэрхэн шийдвэрлэх зэрэг олон чухал асуудлыг тодорхой болгож, эдийн засгийн бусад бодлого хөтөлбөртэйгээ уялдуулах шаардлага эн тэргүүнд тулгарч байна. Энэ тал дээр тодорхой төлөвлөсөн буюу хийж хэрэгжүүлж байгаа ажлынхаа талаар мэдээлэл өгнө үү гэж дурдсан байна.

description.hltext_display: Auf Gold setzen
description.author: redaktion@handelszeitung.ch
description.content: Szenario: Tracker-Zertifikate sind an die Entwicklung des jeweiligen Basiswertes gekoppelt, daher entspricht das Risiko dem einer Direktanlage. Als Basiswert kommen einzelne oder mehrere in einem Basket zusammengefasste Valoren in Frage. Häufig sind Tracker auf Indizes, Branchen oder spezielle Themen abgestellt. Tracker-Zertifikat: Edelmetalle bleiben ein Thema bei den Emittenten. Julius Bär emittiert neu einen Tracker auf einen Gold-Basket. Der Korb setzt sich aus 19 internationalen Unternehmen...

description.hltext_display: Sprint über fünf Monate
description.author: redaktion@handelszeitung.ch
description.content: Szenario: Outperformance-Zertifikate können in steigenden Märkten ihre Vorteile ausspielen. Aufgrund einer eingebauten Hebelfunktion sattelt dieses Produkt auf die Performance des Basiswertes noch etwas drauf. Für die erhöhte Gewinnchance müssen Anleger auf eine Seitwärtsrendite und auf einen Risikopuffer verzichten. Bei Produkten mit Cap ist die Renditemöglichkeit nach oben begrenzt. Die Risiken fallen nicht höher aus als bei einem Direktinvestment, da das Zertifikat an Kursrückgängen unter den...

description.hltext_display: NewProductHelp.com Set to Represent Shirley's Idea Concept to Industry
description.author: New Product Help, Inc
description.content: --(PR.com)-- Shirley W., a Florida resident and inventor, has contracted South Florida invention assistance leader NewProductHelp.com to represent her Shirley's Idea invention to industry for potential licensing. An innovative new product that brings some eye-catching functionality to a standard hair brush, Shirley's Idea boasts a unique design that provides its users with a hair brush that works effectively for its intended purpose but also offers additional benefits.Shirley's Idea will be easy and comfortable to use and will make for an attractive gift as well due to its enhanced features. It will also be competitively priced, adding to its appeal. With its collection of attractive qualities, Shirley's Idea should have no trouble finding success through outlets and catalogs selling hair care products.This original idea is now being made available for licensing to manufacturers interested in new product development, especially in the hair care products industry. Shirley W. is hoping to have Shirley's Idea in full production and available to the public within the very near future.After including the inventor and preliminary, non-confidential information about her product idea at no charge for a 1 year term in their proprietary database of invention information, the National Directory of American Inventors, NewProductHelp.coms professional staff of writers and graphic illustrators then created a New Product Portfolio and Online Product Presentation for the Dry Space, helping to clarify how the invention works and looks. A General Field-of-Art search through the database of the United States Patent and Trademark Office was also completed by an independent, registered patent attorney in order to provide the inventor with perspective on some prior art within the general category of her idea.Having had an opportunity to review and approve the New Product Portfolio and Online Product Presentation, Shirley W. made a decision to accept NewProductHelp.com's New Product Publicity and Marketing Program proposal. Consequently, NewProductHelp.com will represent Shirley W.'s Dry Space for 2 years through a collection of dynamic promotional materials such as press releases, product brochures, digital renditions, a password-protected website, and other visual mediums such as a New Product DVD and potentially, an interactive virtual reality presentation.Shirley's Idea will also be represented at industry-leading trade shows throughout the 2 year period by the exclusive licensing agent for NewProductHelp.com inventors, Licensing Direct. All necessary follow-up with leads garnered at these events, as well as negotiations with any manufacturers that express an advanced level of interest in Shirley's Idea, will also be managed by Licensing Direct.For more information on how you can get your idea to NewProductHelp.com, visit: www.newproducthelp.comContact: 1-877-445-0494About NewProductHelp.com: NewProductHelp.com is a Miami, Florida-based invention assistance firm that represents independent inventors who typically lack the resources and experience to pursue the commercialization of their product concepts on their own. NewProductHelp.com utilizes dynamic promotional materials such as digital renditions, press releases, invention websites, and interactive virtual reality presentations, as well as representation at industry-leading trade shows, to achieve valuable exposure for the inventions it represents.###

description.hltext_display: Monopoly mit dem Volksgeld
description.author: redaktion@handelszeitung.ch
description.content: Von null auf 400 Millionen Dollar. So hoch ist inzwischen schon das globale Tagesvolumen im Handel mit der chinesischen Währung. Bis vor wenigen Monaten war das Geschäft noch inexistent. Denn Peking hatte bis dahin den Handel mit dem Renminbi (Volksgeld) ausserhalb der Grenzen der Volksrepublik streng verboten. Im Juli hat die Regierung die Devisenmärkte jedoch liberalisiert, um der Landeswährung ein Gewicht an den Weltfinanzmärkten zu geben. Der Kurs des Renminbi oder Yuan, wie seine grösste...

description.hltext_display: La Luna se enciende
description.author: UNIV
description.content:
La noche del lunes el satélite cambió de un brillante plateado a un rojo encendido todo debido a que en su superficie se reflejaron simultáneamente el amanecer y el atardecer
WASHINGTON (UNIV)._La noche del lunes para el martes se engalanó con un eclipse total lunar que permitió admirar la transformación de la Luna de un brillante plateado a un rojo encendido, al reflejar en su superficie el amanecer y atardecer simultáneos en diferentes partes del mundo.
Tony Phillips de la NASA explica el fenómeno con mayor detalle.
"Imagínate a ti mismo de pie sobre una Luna polvorienta mirando al cielo. La Tierra cuelga hacia abajo, completamente oculta detrás del Sol. El eclipse está en marcha. Se podría esperar que la Tierra no se vea, pero no es así. El borde del Planeta está en llamas.
"A medida que se observa la circunferencia de la Tierra el color se torna más rojo.Esto es porque se está viendo cada amanecer y cada atardecer en el mundo, todos ellos, a la vez. Este increíble resplandor alumbra en el corazón de la sombra de la Tierra, llenándolo con un brillo cobrizo y la transformación de la Luna en una gran esfera roja", explicó.
El espectáculo celeste de tres horas y media de duración se pudo ver en Norte y Centroamérica, en las regiones donde el cielo era claro. Algunas partes de Europa y Asia pudieron apreciar parte del fenómeno.
Durante un eclipse lunar total, la Luna llena pasa por la sombra creada por la Tierra que cubre la luz del Sol. Un poco de luz indirecta logra pasar y esto le da a la Luna un color espectral.
Destaca que este eclipse lunar total, el único del año, coincidió con la entrada del solsticio de invierno. Esto ha ocurrido en sólo tres ocasiones en los últimos 10 años.
La última ocasión que ocurrió un eclipse de solsticio invernal fue hace más de tres siglos, el 21 de diciembre de 1638 y volverá a ocurrir el 21 de diciembre del 2094, dijo el vocero del Observatorio Naval Estadounidense Geoff Chester.
Los eclipses lunares se pueden observar sin protección en los ojos, a diferencia de los eclipses solares.
El próximo eclipse lunar total llegará en junio de 2011, pero no se podrá observar en Norteamérica.
En nuestro País el fenómeno ocurrió en punto de las 23:29 horas de la noche del lunes.

description.hltext_display: 1,150 will work to build on Hemlock plant in Clarksville
description.content:
CLARKSVILLE, Tenn. Officials say 1,150 workers are being employed to build a polysilicon plant in Clarksville, and that number is expected to increase. The $1.2 billion Hemlock Semiconductor facility is scheduled to be finished in 2012, with production expected to start later that year.
Meanwhile, officials say the construction work force at the site is expected to peak at 1,500 by the middle of next year.
Hemlock has also started a training program for production operators.
Michigan-based Hemlock Semiconductor is a joint venture between Dow Corning Corp. and two Japanese companies, Shin-Etsu Handotai Co. and Mitsubishi Materials Corp.
Polysilicon is a raw material used to make solar cells and semiconductor devices.

description.hltext_display: Ansturm der Jungen und Deutschen
description.author: redaktion@handelszeitung.ch
description.content: Nichts entgeht ihren Augen. Elsbeth Kretz betreut seit 15 Jahren im Club Baur au Lac, der in Sichtweite des Fünfsternehotels Baur au Lac in der klassizistischen Villa Rosau residiert, die rund 500 Mitglieder. An Elsbeth Kretz kommt niemand vorbei. Jeder Gast wird mit einem unüberhörbaren fröhlichen «Grüezi, Herr ...» begrüsst. Das ist mehr als nur Höflichkeit, denn wenn sich der Ankömmling zu ihr umdreht, um den Gruss zu erwidern, ist das für Kretz der Moment festzustellen, ob er eine Krawatte...

삼성전자가 장중 95만원을 돌파하는 등 이틀 연속 사상 최고가를 경신하고 있다.
유가증권 시장에서 삼성전자는 22일 오전 10시 33분 현재 전날보다 1.50% 오른 95만원에 거래되고 있다.
거래량은 11만7000여주로 JP모간, 모건스탠리 등 외국계 증권사를 중심으로 매수물량이 들어오고 있다.
장 중 한때 95만3000원까지 오르면서 전날에 이어 이틀 연속 사상 최고가를 갈아치웠다.
이처럼 삼성전자 주가가 연일 고공행진을 하고 있는 것은 D램 가격 하락에 따른 경쟁업체의 대규모 감산이 삼성전자에게 긍정적이라는 평가 때문이다.
재무구조가 상대적으로 취약한 경쟁사들이 감산할 경우 삼성전자 경쟁력과 기술 격차는 더욱 벌어진다는 것.
진성혜 현대증권 연구원은 "12월 하반월 1Gb DDR3 고정가격은 상반월 대비 11% 하락한 0.97달러를 기록했다"며 "12월 상반월 하락을 멈추었던 1Gb DDR2 고정가격도 12월 하반월에 재차 떨어졌다"고 말했다.
진 연구원은 "PC 업체들이 PC당 D램 탑재량에 대해 다소 보수적인 전략을 유지하고 있기 때문에 D램 가격 바닥에 대한 눈높이는 낮춰야 할 것"이라며 "D램 가격 하락으로 메모리 업체들의 영업이익은 감소할 것이나 업황 바닥을 확인하는 시점은 앞당겨질 것"이라고 전망했다.
그는 따라서 내년 하반기에는 본격적으로 메모리 업황이 반등할 것이라고 내다봤다.
[이상규 기자]
[ⓒ 매일경제 & mk.co.kr, 무단전재 및 재배포 금지]

description.hltext_display: Ftáčnik dostane mesačne 4 741 eur
description.content:
Zdroj: TASR Milan Ftáčnik
Zložením slávnostného sľubu sa včera v Bratislave ujalo svojich funkcií nových 45 mestských poslancov aj nový primátor Bratislavy Milan Ftáčnik. Oproti svojmu platu z čias starostovania v Petržalke si polepší o 700 eur.
Nový prvý muž Bratislavy bude mesačne brať 4 741 eur. Rozhodlo o tom 39 zo 41 prítomných mestských poslancov. Jeho predchodca Andrej Ďurkovský zarábal 5 765 eur a pri odchode má zákonný nárok na päťmesačné odstupné – vyše 28-tisíc eur.
Ftáčnik ťahá v plate za kratší koniec aj za novozvolenou starostk o u bratislavského Starého Mesta Tatianou Rosovou, ktorej miestni poslanci v pondelok odklepli mzdu 4 780 eur.
Chce vyriešiť PKO
Ftáčnik chce prednostne riešiť kauzu PKO, nosný dopravný systém, stavbu nultého obchvatu okolo Bratislavy či budovanie cyklotrás. „Mali by sme byť mestom otvorenosti, kde sa zásadné rozhodnutia robia na základe demokratickej diskusie a volení predstavitelia stoja na strane verejnosti,“ povedal. Novým riaditeľom bratislavského magistrátu bude poslanec Národnej rady za Smer Viktor Stromček.
„Svoje aktivity teraz musím prehodnotiť, aby som svoju prácu robil dobre a načas,“ reagoval Stromček na otázku, ako zvládne dve funkcie naraz.
Samé známe tváre
Až 30 kresiel v 45-člennom mestskom zastupiteľstve bude mať pravica. V mestskom zastupiteľstve budú sedieť aj poslanci Národnej rady Robert Kaliňák a Dušan Čaplovič, aktivista Ján Budaj, spisovateľka Petra Nagyová Džerengová či hudobník Marian Greksa.
Aj títo primátori sa včera ujali funkcie
Košice
Richard Raši
PLAT: 2964eur
Viceprimátor Ladislav Lazar mu pôvodne navrhol
plat 5 039 eur. S tým nesúhlasila väčšina poslancov,
pretože Raši je aj poslancom parlamentu
a podľa opozície „nebude schopný fyzicky dôkladne
vykonávať aj primátorskú funkciu“.
CIELE: Za svoje priority označil pohodlnú
a kultúrnu dopravu, nové pracovné príležitosti,
bezpečnosť a poriadok, zdravé, čisté a zelené
Košice. Chce, aby bol otvorený a transparentný
magistrát.
Trnava
Vladimír Butko
PLAT: 3 950 eur
CIELE: „Skončili sa časy, keď sme dávali
sľuby, nastal čas, keď ideme tie sľuby splniť,“
vyhlásil po prevzatí funkcie nový primátor.
ZAUJÍMAVOSTI: medzi novými poslancami
dominuje známy trnavský futbalový búrlivák
Jozef Adamec. „S futbalom nekončím,
verím, že dokážem byť dobrým politikom,
ako som bol futbalistom,“ povedal Jozef
Adamec.
Trenčín
Richard Rybníček
PLAT: odhlasuje ho mimoriadne zastupiteľstvo
28. decembra
CIELE: Tvrdí, že jeho prioritou je prijať rozhodnutie
o vyhlásení elektronických verejných
obstarávaní a aukcií, aby sa on ani poslanci
nemuseli dostávať pod tlak investorov. Z Trenčína
chce urobiť transparentné mesto.
Chce sa čo najskôr zbaviť šéfov odborov na
mestskom úrade: „Zmeny na úrade sa chystajú.
Chcem mať svoj tím. Nový manažment včas
predstavím,“ spresnil primátor.
